这会儿正是饭口，你饿不饿？
Zhèhuìr zhèngshì fànkǒu，nǐ èbu\'è?
It is meal time, are you hungry now?
他已经超过了饥饿线的最低线，饿晕过去了。
Tā yǐjing chāoguò le jīèxiàn de zuì dī xiàn，è yūn guòqù le。
He reached the starvation line and fainted due to hunger.
挨饿
ái\'è 
suffer from hunger; go hungry
孩子饿了。
Háizi è le。
The child is hungry.
可把我饿坏了。
Kě bǎ wǒ èhuài le。
I feel famished. or I\'m starving.
别饿着小猪。
Bié èzhe xiǎozhū。
Don\'t starve the piglets.
好好饿他一顿就好了。
Hǎohǎo è tā yídùn jiù hǎo le。
He\'ll feel better if you let him miss a meal.
守门员来了个饿虎扑食，把球扑住了。
Shǒuményuán lái le gè èhǔpūshí，bǎ qiú pūzhù le。
The goalkeeper pounced like a tiger and caught the ball.
挣扎在饥饿线上
zhēngzhá zài jī\'èxiàn shàng
struggling along on the verge of starvation
我们都饿坏了，得尽先解决吃饭问题。
Wǒmen dōu èhuài le，děi jǐnxiān jiějué chīfàn wèntí。
We are starving—see to our meals first.
饿得精瘦
è de jīngshòu
be bony from hunger
小猫一饿就咪咪叫。
Xiǎomāo yí è jiù mīmī jiào。
The kittens mewed when they were hungry.
饥饿难熬
jī\'è nán áo
can hardly bear (or stand) the hunger
在饥饿线上
zài jī\'èxiàn shàng
on the brink of starvation
饥饿游行
jī\'è yóuxíng
hunger march
解放前，每年都有因为春荒饿死的人。
Jiěfàng qián，měinián dōu yǒu yīnwèi chūnhuāng èsǐ de rén。
Before liberation, there were people dying from spring famine every year.
如果你饿了，就先点补一下吧。
Rúguǒ nǐ è le，jiù xiān diǎnbǔ yíxià ba。
Eat some food before the meal if you are hungry.
看你吃饭的样子，就像几天没吃饭了，简直是个饿鬼！
Kàn nǐ chīfàn de yàngzi，jiù xiàng jǐtiān méi chīfàn le，jiǎnzhí shì gè èguǐ！
From your way of eating, I guess you must have been starving for days, you glutton!
她一天没吃饭，饿得两眼发黑。
Tā yìtiān méi chīfàn，è de liǎng yǎn fāhēi。
She hadn\'t eaten anything for a whole day and blacked out.
他是光棍儿一条，一人吃饱全家不饿。
Tā shì guānggùnr yì tiáo，yì rén chībǎo quánjiā búè。
He is a bachelor; once he is fed, no one is hungry in his family.
我饿极了，一连吃了三个荷叶饼。
Wǒ è jí le，yìlián chī le sāngè héyèbǐng。
I was so hungry that I ate three thin pancakes in succession.
饿了很久了，他脸上已呈现饥色，但是因为没有钱只有撑着。
È le hěnjiǔ le，tā liǎnshàng yǐ chéngxiàn jīsè，dànshì yīnwèi méiyǒu qián zhǐyǒu chēng zhe。
His face is already sallow due to  long-term hunger, but he forced himself not to eat just for lack of money.
出外旅游的时候，应该带一些即食食品以备饥饿时食用。
Chūwài lǚyóu de shíhou，yīnggāi dài yìxiē jíshí shípǐn yǐbèi jīè shí shíyòng。
One should take some ready to eat food to satisfy one\'s hunger when traveling.
看你饿成那样，先吃个馒头暂时疗饥吧。
Kàn nǐ èchéng nàyàng，xiān chī gè mántou zànshí liáojī ba。
Look how hungry you are. Eat a piece of steamed bread first to allay your hunger.
我刚刚吃了两个麻团，现在已经不饿了。
Wǒ gānggāng chī le liǎnggè mátuán，xiànzài yǐjing búè le。
I ate two deep-fried sesame seed balls just now, so I feel full.
你真耐饥，早上只吃两片面包，到中午了竟还不饿？
Nǐ zhēn nàijī，zǎoshàng zhǐ chī liǎng piàn miànbāo，dào zhōng wǔ le jìng hái búè？
You are able to endure hunger. Since you ate only two pieces of bread for the breakfast. Aren’t you hungry at noon?

Zāihuāng niányuè，èsǐ de qiánshǒu chéngqiān shàngwàn。
In these famine years, tens of thousands of common people starved to death.
他宁愿饿着肚子也不出来要饭，真是个穷棒子。
Tā nìngyuàn è zhe dùzi yě bùchūlái yàofàn，zhēnshì gè qióngbàngzi。
He prefers to be hungry rather than beg for food, he is really a poor person with high aspirations.
他们饿了，把餐桌上的食物一扫而空。
Tāmen è le，bǎ cānzhuō shàng de shíwù yísǎo érkōng。
They were hungry, so they ate up all the food on the table.
由于母兽出去觅事，子兽在小巢里饿得嗷嗷叫。
Yóuyú mǔshòu chūqù mìshì，zǐshòu zài xiǎocháo lǐ è de áoáojiào。
As the mother animal went out looking for food, the baby animal cried in its nest.

to be/remain silent about sth
对某事守口如瓶
Her tight-lipped friend had kept it a secret.
她那守口如瓶的朋友对这事一直保密。
She kept close about the information and none found out.
Tā duì zhège xìnxī shǒukǒurúpíng，méiyǒu rén fāxiàn。
她对这个信息守口如瓶，没有人发现。
The Labour Party may have led him to button his lip on these issues.
Gōngdǎng méizhǔner yǐ lìng tā zài zhèxiē wèntí shàng yào shǒukǒurúpíng。
工党没准儿已令他在这些问题上要守口如瓶。
He will keep him buttoned up.
Tā huì shǒukǒurúpíng。
他会守口如瓶。
Because Sam kept his mouth shut, they didn\'t know anything about me.
Yóuyú Sàmǔ shǒukǒurúpíng，tāmen yìdiǎn yě bù zhīdào wǒ de shì。
由于萨姆守口如瓶，他们一点也不知道我的事。
I know what it was but my lips are sealed.
Suīrán wǒ qīngchu nà shì zěnme yìhuíshì，kě wǒ děi shǒukǒurúpíng。
虽然我清楚那是怎么一回事，可我得守口如瓶。
He holds his cards close to his chest. You can totally trust him.
Tā shì gè shǒukǒurúpíng de rén，nǐ kěyǐ wánquán xìnrèn tā。
他是个守口如瓶的人，你可以完全信任他。
Employers are looking for buttoned-up types.
Gùzhǔ zài xúnzhǎo shǒukǒurúpíng lèixíng de rén。
雇主在寻找守口如瓶类型的人。
警方在爆炸现场发现了燃烧瓶的残骸。
Jǐngfāng zài bàozhà xiànchǎng fāxiàn le ránshāopíng de cánhái。
The police found debris from the Molotov cocktail at the site of the explosion.
在陶瓷坯胎上画些图案，就可以烧出漂亮的花瓶啦！
Zài táocí pītāi shàng huà xiē tú\'àn，jiù kěyǐ shāochū piàoliàng de huāpíng la！
Draw some pictures on the enamelware mould and bake it, then a beautiful vase will appear.
工匠们正在制作花瓶原坯，估计不久就能烧制了。
Gōngjiàngmen zhèngzài zhìzuò huāpíng yuánpī，gūjì bùjiǔ jiùnéng shāozhì le。
The craftsmen are making original moulds of the vases; it probably won\'t take long before they begin to bake them.
经过晾晒和烧制，这些泥坯将会变成美丽的花瓶。
Jīngguò liàngshài hé shāozhì，zhèxiē nípī jiāng huì biànchéng měilì de huāpíng。
After drying in the sun and baking, this molded pottery will be made into beautiful vases.
The flask comes gift boxed and with a funnel for ease of use.
Shāopíng sònglái shízhuāng zài lǐpǐn hé lǐ，tóngshí hái dàile gè lòudǒu，fāngbiàn shǐyòng。
烧瓶送来时装在礼品盒里，同时还带了个漏斗，方便使用。
The molotov cocktail exploded.
Ránshāopíng bàozhà le。
燃烧瓶爆炸了。
The flask holds one gallon.
Zhège shāopíng de róngjī wéi yì jiālún。
这个烧瓶的容积为一加仑。
这种热水瓶能保暖二十四小时。

This kind of thermos flask keeps water hot for 24 hours.

她几乎无法走路了，她的卧室里装上了氧气瓶。

pínggàizi

Tā de dábiàn zài xuānpàn shí bìngwèi tǐxiàn chūlái。
他的答辩在宣判时并未体现出来。
This question was posed to the audience at the end of the debate.
Zhège wèntí zài biànlùn jiéshù shí liúgěile zàizuò de guānzhòng lái huídá。
这个问题在辩论结束时留给了在座的观众来回答。
不容置辩
用辩证唯物主义的观点去观察事物
yòng biànzhèng wéiwùzhǔyì de guāndiǎn qù guānchá shìwù
look at things from a dialectical-materialist point of view
这次会议的重点是探讨脂肪肝的辩证施治。
Zhècì huìyì de zhòngdiǎn shì tàntǎo zhīfánggān de biànzhèng shīzhì。
The focus of this meeting is to discuss the diagnosis and treatment of adiposis hepatica based on the overall analysis of the illness, and the patient\'s condition.
事物本来的辩证法
shìwù běnlái de biànzhèngfǎ 
the dialectics inherent in things
辩证法的核心
biànzhèngfǎ de héxīn
the kernel of dialectics
唯物辩证法认为，外因通过内因而起作用。
Wéiwù biànzhèngfǎ rènwéi，wàiyīn tōngguò nèiyīn ér qǐ zuòyòng。
Materialist dialectics holds that external causes become operative through internal causes.
历史的辩证法是无情的。
Lìshǐ de biànzhèngfǎ shì wúqíng de。
The dialectics of history is inexorable.
唯物辩证法认为，运动永远不会息止。
Wéiwù biànzhèngfǎ rènwéi，yùndòng yǒngyuǎn búhuì xīzhǐ。
According to the dialectical materialism, things are forever in the process of changes.
用辩证法来看待问题会更全面一些。
Yòng biànzhèngfǎ lái kàndài wèntí huì gèng quánmiàn yìxiē。
Dialectics affords a broader overall view of the world.
这段话摘引自恩格斯的《自然辩证法》。
The judge dismissed the evidence presented by the defense.
Fǎguān bóhuíle biànhù zhōng tígōng de zhèngcí。
法官驳回了辩护中提供的证词。
事物本来的辩证法
shìwù běnlái de biànzhèngfǎ 
the dialectics inherent in things
辩证的统一
biànzhèng de tǒngyī
dialectical unity
辩证地看问题
biànzhèng de kàn wèntí 
look at things dialectically
辩证法的核心
biànzhèngfǎ de héxīn
the kernel of dialectics
唯物辩证法认为，外因通过内因而起作用。
Wéiwù biànzhèngfǎ rènwéi，wàiyīn tōngguò nèiyīn ér qǐ zuòyòng。
Materialist dialectics holds that external causes become operative through internal causes.
用辩证唯物主义的观点去观察事物
yòng biànzhèng wéiwùzhǔyì de guāndiǎn qù guānchá shìwù
look at things from a dialectical-materialist point of view
历史的辩证法是无情的。
Lìshǐ de biànzhèngfǎ shì wúqíng de。
The dialectics of history is inexorable.
我们要用辩证的观点来看待周围的世界。
Wǒmen yào yòng biànzhèng de guāndiǎn lái kàndài zhōuwéi de shìjiè。
We should use a dialectic perspective to view the world.
这次会议的重点是探讨脂肪肝的辩证施治。
Zhècì huìyì de zhòngdiǎn shì tàntǎo zhīfánggān de biànzhèng shīzhì。
The focus of this meeting is to discuss the diagnosis and treatment of adiposis hepatica based on the overall analysis of the illness, and the patient\'s condition.
对于所谓的“世风日下”的现象，我们要辩证地看。
Duìyú suǒwèi de“shìfēngrìxià”de xiàn xiàng，wǒmen yào biànzhèng de kàn。
We should have a dialectical attitude towards the phenomenon of the so-called &quot;day by day worsening of the moral values of society&quot;.
唯物辩证法认为，运动永远不会息止。
Wéiwù biànzhèngfǎ rènwéi，yùndòng yǒngyuǎn búhuì xīzhǐ。
According to the dialectical materialism, things are forever in the process of changes.
用辩证法来看待问题会更全面一些。
Yòng biànzhèngfǎ lái kàndài wèntí huì gèng quánmiàn yìxiē。
Dialectics affords a broader overall view of the world.
无可辩驳的论证
wúkěbiànbó de lùnzhèng
irrefutable proof
辩证观点
看问题不够辩证。
这段话摘引自恩格斯的《自然辩证法》。
雄辩地证明。
His religiousness is dialectically related to his sinfulness.
Tā duì zōngjiào de qiánchéng hé tā de zuì\'è shì biànzhèng de liánxì zài yìqǐ de。
他对宗教的虔诚和他的罪恶是辩证地联系在一起的。
witness for the defence
辩方证人
He gave evidence for the defense.
Tā tíchūle biànhù zhèngjù。
他提出了辩护证据。
The last argument proved to be the most decisive point in the case.
Zuìhòu yì chǎng biànlùn bèi zhèngmíngle shì běn\'àn zhōng zuì guānjiàn de yìdiǎn。
最后一场辩论被证明了是本案中最关键的一点。
The judge dismissed the evidence presented by the defense.
Fǎguān bóhuíle biànhù zhōng tígōng de zhèngcí。
法官驳回了辩护中提供的证词。
The debate is therefore steered into identifying the evidence.
Biànlùn yóu cǐ jìnrù dào le zhèngjù jiànbié jiēduàn。
辩论由此进入到了证据鉴别阶段。
这件事情是非分明，无可争辩。
Zhèjiàn shìqingshìfēifēnmíng，wúkězhēngbiàn。
The rights and wrongs of the case are perfectly clear and admit of no dispute.
去跟他争辩是徒劳的。
Qù gēn tā zhēngbiàn shì túláo de。
It would be futile to argue with him.
既然他不讲理，跟他争辩也是枉然。
Jìrán tā bù jiǎnɡlǐ, ɡēn tā zhēnɡbiàn yě shì wǎnɡrán。 
It\'s no use arguing with him when he refuses to listen to reason.
无可争辩的事实
wúkězhēngbiàn de shìshí 
an indisputable (or irrefutable) fact
无休止的争辩
wúxiūzhǐ de zhēngbiàn 
an endless debate
真理不怕争辩。
Zhēnlǐ bú pà zhēnɡbiàn。
Truth does not fear contention.
人们都骂他臭狗屎，他也不去争辩。
Rénmen dōu mà tā chòugǒushǐ，tā yě bùqù zhēngbiàn。
People speak very low of him, but he never challenges them.
争辩
zhēngbiàn
contend
她老为孩子的教育问题与丈夫争辩。
Tā lǎo wèi háizi de jiàoyù wèntí yǔ zhàngfu zhēngbiàn。
She\'s constantly arguing with her husband about the children\'s education.
争辩
不屑与之争辩
激烈争辩。
a verbal duel
争辩，舌战
Argue it out.
把问题争辩清楚。
to argue with a friend
与朋友争辩
Paula argued that the decision had been made according to the results we gave her.
保拉争辩说，这是根据我们给她的结果做出的决定。
She remained silent, it was pointless arguing with her father.
和父亲的争辩是毫无意义的，所以她始终保持沉默。
I can\'t quarrel with that
我对此无可争辩
to split hairs
在鸡毛蒜皮上争辩
The defendant argued the plaintiff\'s opinion was unauthentic in the court.
在法庭上被告争辩原告的想法毫无根据。
The right to communicate privately and interpersonally is hardly disputed.
Rénmen sīxià de hé gōngkāi de tōngxùn quánlì shì jīhū shì wúkězhēngbiàn de。
人们私下的和公开的通讯权利是几乎是无可争辩的。
They contended with me in a discussion about the proposal.
Tāmen zài yí cì guānyú zhège tíyì de tǎolùn zhōng gēn wǒ zhēngbiàn。
他们在一次关于这个提议的讨论中跟我争辩。
She seems to revel in arguments and loses no opportunity to declare her political principles.
Tā sìhū táozuì zài zhēngbiàn zhōng，cuòguòle xuānbù tā de zhèngzhì xìntiáo de jīhuì。
她似乎陶醉在争辩中，错过了宣布她的政治信条的机会。
Single parents are a fact of life and should not have to feel ashamed.
Dānqīn jiātíng shì yí gè wúkězhēngbiàn de shìshí，bù xūyào gǎndào xiūkuì。
单亲家庭是一个无可争辩的事实，不需要感到羞愧。
They both went into orbit during the heated argument.
Zài jīliè de zhēngbiàn zhōng，tāmen dōu dàfāpíqì。
在激烈的争辩中，他们都大发脾气。
I argued with him but he just laughed in my face.
Wǒ hé tā zhēngbiàn，dànshì tā zhǐshì cháoxiào wǒ。
我和他争辩，但是他只是嘲笑我。
The concept cannot be accepted without question.
Zhège gàiniàn bù kěnéng háowúzhēngbiàn jiù bèi jiēshòu。
这个概念不可能毫无争辩就被接受。
It \'s true he wasn\'t standing, but we won\'t split hairs.
Shì zhēn de，tā méiyǒu zhàn qǐlái，dàn wǒmen jiāng búhuì wèi zhèxiē suǒshì zhēngbiàn。
是真的，他没有站起来，但我们将不会为这些琐事争辩。
It splits hairs over non-essential points and ignores the fact that it wouldn\'t matter.
Zhè búguòs hì zài wèi suǒshì ér zhēngbiàn，hūlüèle zhè bìng bú zhòngyào de shìshí。
这不过是在为琐事而争辩，忽略了这并不重要的事实。
They contested the outcome of the race.
Tāmen duì bǐsài de jiéguǒ zhēngbiàn bùxiū。
他们对比赛的结果争辩不休。
For years tobacco companies have contended that tobacco is nonaddictive.
Duōnián lái，yāncǎogōngsī fǎnfù zhēngbiànshuō，yāncǎo bú huì ràng rén shàngyǐn。
多年来，烟草公司反复争辩说，烟草不会让人上瘾。
They argued whether or not adam had a navel.
Tāmen zhēngbiàn yàdāng shìfǒu yǒu dùqí。
他们争辩亚当是否有肚脐。
The two historians polemicized for years.
Zhè liǎn gwèi lìshǐxuéjiā zhēngbiànle hǎo duō nián。
这两位历史学家争辩了好多年。
The lawyer argued spuriously that his client knew nothing of the burglary.
Zhège lǜshī xūjiǎ de zhēngbiàn shuō tā de dāngshìrén duì dàoqiè yìwúsuǒzhī。
这个律师虚假地争辩说他的当事人对盗窃一无所知。
Ten delegates were selected to contest the recent controversial reform on public transportation at the meeting.
十位代表被选出，在会上对最近颇受争议的公交改革进行辩论。
Their mighty spells and fiery blasts have prevailed many battles.
Tāmen xióngbiàn de mèilì hé yǒulì de pēngjī zài xǔduō dòuzhēng zhōng dōu huòdéle shènglì。
他们雄辩的魅力和有力的抨击在许多斗争中都获得了胜利。
他很善于口辩，同学们都说他应该去当律师。
Tā hěnshànyú kǒubiàn，tóngxuémen dōu shuō tā yīnggāi qù dāng lǜshī。
He has a talent for speaking. His classmates say that he should be a lawyer.
他论辩有力，把对方说得哑口无言。
Tā lùnbiàn yǒulì，bǎ duìfāngshuō de yǎkǒuwúyán。
His forceful arguments silenced his opponent.
他能说会道，善于巧辩。

果断对于辩论来说会起到激励作用。
The defence counsel said the girls\' mother had no knowledge of what had been happening.
Biànhùlǜshī shuō zhège nǚhái de mǔqīn bù zhīdào fāshēngle shénme。
辩护律师说这个女孩的母亲不知道发生了什么。
The force of his eloquence easily persuaded them.
Tā yòng tāotāo xióngbiàn qīngyì de shuōfúle tāmen。
他用滔滔雄辩轻易地说服了他们。
In defense he said the other man started it.
Zài biànhù zhōng tā shuō shì lìng yī gè rén xiān dòngshǒu de。
在辩护中他说是另一个人先动手的。
Jane tries to argue down everyone she meets.
Jiǎn xiǎng yào bǎ tā yùdào de měi yí gè rén dōu biàn de wúhuàkěshuō。
简想要把她遇到的每一个人都辩得无话可说。

He argued unconvincingly.
Tā de biànlùn bú jùyǒu shuōfúlì。
他的辩论不具有说服力。
an argument lacking force
缺乏说服力的辩词
He offered a persuasive defense of the theory.

他对这一理论进行了有说服力的辩护。

chōngdāng biànhùshì 
play the part of an apologist

Criminal defense lawyers can help convicts escape punishment for their crimes.

Which do you think was the strongest side in today\'s debate?
The first organelle to be identified was the nucleus.

to concede a point in arg ument

His admission was part of a plea bargain with the prosecutor.

Don’t make taunting retorts to each other, as it can not help solve the problem.
她受到了莫大的冤屈，却有口难辩。
Tā shòudào le mòdà de yuānqū，què yǒukǒu nánbiàn。
She is suffering a huge injustice, but finds it hard to defend herself.
辩论会上，双方唇枪舌剑，互相辩难。
这种事有口难辩，真憋气。
She warned him that it would be a tough debate.
Tā yùxiān gàozhīle tā nà jiāng shì yì chǎng jiānnán de biànlùn。
她预先告知了他那将是一场艰难的辩论。
真理愈辩愈明。
Zhēnlǐ yù biàn yù mínɡ。

这件事情是非分明，无可争辩。

I\'m going to defend my thesis tomorrow.
我明天论文答辩。
Wǒ míngtiān lùnwén dábiàn。
Tomorrow I have the viva for my thesis.

真理愈辩愈明

她的申辩经不起检验，这一点已经越来越明显了。
辩论个水落石出
biànlùn gè shuǐluòshíchū 
argue the matter out
经过长时间的辩论，大家的意见归于一致。
Jīngguò chángshíjiān de biànlùn，dàjiā de yìjiàn guīyú yízhì。
The long debate finally ended in agreement. or Agreement was reached after a long debate.
辩论的题目
biànlùn de tímù 
subject (or topic) for a debate
就这个问题掀起了一场激烈的辩论。
Jiù zhège wèntí xiānqǐ le yìchǎng jīliè de biànlùn。
This question set off a fierce debate.
这场大辩论酝酿已久。
Zhè chǎngdà biànlùn yùnniàngyǐ jiǔ。
This great debate has been brewing for a long time.
辩论
biànlùn
argue; debate
我们年级举行了一场辩论赛。
Wǒmen niánjí jǔxíng le yìchǎng biànlùnsài。
We had a debate competition in our grade.
经过激烈的法庭辩论，我们终于胜诉了。
Jīngguò jīliè de fǎtíng biànlùn，wǒmen zhōng yú shèngsù le。
After a heated court debate, we won the appeal.
这次辩论赛，我们抽签抽到了“反方”。
zhècì biànlùnsài，wǒmen chōuqiān chōu dào le“fǎnfāng”。
By drawing lots, we become the opposing team in this debate contest.
他很有口辩，每次学校有辩论比赛，他都要参加。
Tā hěnyǒu kǒubiàn，měi cì xuéxiào yǒu biànlùn bǐsài，tā dōuyào cānjiā。
He is eloquent and takes part in every debate in school.
他是有名的铁嘴，你肯定辩论不过他。
Tā shì yǒumíng de tiězuǐ，nǐ kěndìng biànlùn búguò tā。

Wǒ bùxiǎng jiù zhègewèntí yǔ nǐ biànlùn。

论辩有力。
Lùnbiàn yǒulì。
The argument is strong.
无可辩驳的论证
wúkěbiànbó de lùnzhèng
irrefutable proof
他论辩有力，把对方说得哑口无言。

无可辩驳的论证
wúkěbiànbó de lùnzhèng
irrefutable proof

bù róng tā rén shēngbiàn
not allow others to present their arguments

subject (or topic) for a debate

wākōngxīnsi wèi zìjǐ biànhù

wúkězhēngbiàn de shìshí 
an indisputable (or irrefutable) fact

Lìshǐ de biànzhèngfǎ shì wúqíng de。
The dialectics of history is inexorable.

最雄辩的莫过于事实。

这场大辩论酝酿已久。
Zhè chǎngdà biànlùn yùnniàngyǐ jiǔ。

无休止的争辩
wúxiūzhǐ de zhēngbiàn 
an endless debate
真理不怕争辩。
Zhēnlǐ bú pà zhēnɡbiàn。

biànlùn
argue; debate
事实胜于雄辩
shìshí shèngyú xióngbiàn
facts are stronger than rhetoric; facts speak louder than words
面对周围人的误会，他百口莫辩。
Miànduì zhōuwéi rén de wùhuì，tā bǎikǒu mòbiàn。

Criminal defense lawyers can help convicts escape punishment for their crimes.

His defended himself with an argument full of loopholes.

Tā de jīngjìrén chūxí le jìzhě zhāodàihuì，wèi tā biànwū。
His manager attended the press conference to defend him against false accusations.
人们都骂他臭狗屎，他也不去争辩。
Rénmen dōu mà tā chòugǒushǐ，tā yě bùqù zhēngbiàn。
People speak very low of him, but he never challenges them.
请各部门准时参加下午的竞选答辩会。

All departments should participate in the election defense this afternoon.
经过激烈的法庭辩论，我们终于胜诉了。
Jīngguò jīliè de fǎtíng biànlùn，wǒmen zhōng yú shèngsù le。
After a heated court debate, we won the appeal.
这次辩论赛，我们抽签抽到了“反方”。
zhècì biànlùnsài，wǒmen chōuqiān chōu dào le“fǎnfāng”。
By drawing lots, we become the opposing team in this debate contest.
请允许我分辩一下，这件事不是我做的。

Please allow me to defend myself. I didn\'t do it.
经过审讯，他当场写下了伏辩。
Jīngguò shěnxùn，tā dāngchǎng xiěxià le fúbiàn。
He wrote his confession on the spot after being interrogated.
他已在服辩上签字画押。
Tā yǐ zài fúbiàn shàng qiānzì huàyā。
He has signed his confession.
他很善于口辩，同学们都说他应该去当律师。
Tā hěnshànyú kǒubiàn，tóngxuémen dōu shuō tā yīnggāi qù dāng lǜshī。
He has a talent for speaking. His classmates say that he should be a lawyer.
对于所谓的“世风日下”的现象，我们要辩证地看。

他是有名的铁嘴，你肯定辩论不过他。
Tā shì yǒumíng de tiězuǐ，nǐ kěndìng biànlùn búguò tā。
He has a silver tongue. I bet you will never beat him in debate.
唯物辩证法认为，运动永远不会息止。

According to the dialectical materialism, things are forever in the process of changes.
我们学校赢得了校际辩论会的胜利。

Our school won the inter-school debate competition.

She is suffering a huge injustice, but finds it hard to defend herself.
她自己错了，还振振有辞地为自己辩解。

Though she was wrong, she still spoke plausibly, and volubly to defend herself.
你不必置辩，我们已了解了详情。

You don\'t have to argue, we already know all the details.
比赛中，我方主辩始终面带微笑。

Our first speaker kept smiling throughout the entire contest.

màinongxiǎocōngming
show off one\'s smartness
耍小聪明
shuǎ xiǎocōnɡminɡ
play petty tricks
有点儿小聪明
yǒudiǎnr xiǎocōngming
be clever in some small ways

Tā cóngxiǎo cōngming，wǔsuì fāmēng。
He was intelligent as a child, and was taught to read and write when he was five years old.
别再耍小聪明了。
Bié zài shuǎxiǎocōngmíngle。
Don\'t play those petty tricks again.
小明很聪明，不仅学过绘画，还旁通音乐。
Xiǎo Míng hěncōngmíng，bùjǐn xuéguò huìhuà，hái pángtōng yīnyuè。
Xiao Ming is smart, he knows how to paint and he is also proficient in musicology.
他自小就聪明能干。
Tā zì xiǎo jiù cōngmíngnénggàn。
From an early age he has been clever and capable.
小明从小就脑瓜儿聪明，可惜就是不喜欢学习。
Xiǎo Míng cóng xiǎo jiù nǎoguār cōngmíng，kěxī jiùshì bùxǐhuan xuéxí。
Xiaoming has been clever since he was young, but he doesn’t like studying.
我家小狗特别聪明，只用它自己的盆子吃饭。
Wǒjiā xiǎogǒu tèbié cōngmíng，zhǐyòng tā zìjǐ de pénzi chī fàn。
Our puppy is very smart, he only uses his own bowl to eat.
小李是个聪明人，对事情总是能够先知先觉。
Xiǎo Lǐ shì gè cōngmíngrén，duì shìqing zǒngshì nénggòu xiānzhī xiānjué。
Xiao Li is a smart person with foresight.
毕业时，老师给小明的考语中有这么一句话：“该生聪明但不好学”。

When graduating, there was a sentence in the comments that the teacher gave Xiaoming: &quot;this student is smart but not willing to study.&quot;
这个小孩儿，非徒漂亮，而且聪明！
Zhège xiǎoháir，fēitú piàoliang，érqiě cōngming！

他就爱搬弄自己那点儿小聪明。

别对我耍小聪明！

zuǒ\'ěr shīcōng

双耳失聪
shuāng\'ěr shīcōng

失聪

juédǐnɡ cōnɡmínɡ
extremely intelligent
绝顶聪明
juédǐng cōngmíng

聪明绝顶。

聪明过头
cōngmíngguòtóu
be too clever by half
he\'s too clever by half!
他聪明过头了！
禀赋聪明
bǐngfù cōngmíng 
be gifted with keen intelligence
充分发挥人民群众的聪明才智
chōngfèn fāhuī rénmínqúnzhòng de cōngmíngcáizhì
give full play to the wisdom and creativity of the people
聪明能干
cōngmíng nénggàn 
bright and capable
这孩子很聪明。
Zhè háizi hěn cōngmíng。
This child is very clever.
这孩子用功但不怎么聪明。
Zhè háizi yònggōng dàn bùzěnme cōngmíng。
He\'s a hardworking but not very intelligent boy.
聪明过头
cōngmíngguòtóu
be too clever by half
聪明好学
cōngmínghàoxué
be intelligent and fond of learning
绝顶聪明
juédǐnɡ cōnɡmínɡ
extremely intelligent
他人倒聪明，就是路道没有走对。
Tā rén dào cōngmíng，jiùshì lùdào méiyǒu zǒuduì。
He\'s quite intelligent, but he doesn\'t have a correct approach to things.
卖弄小聪明
màinongxiǎocōngming
show off one\'s smartness
我弟弟没有他聪明。
Wǒ dìdi méiyǒu tā cōngmíng。
My younger brother is not so clever as he.
你的孩子又聪明又用功，一定前程远大。
Nǐ de háizi yòu cōngmíngyòu yònggōng，yídìngqiánchéngyuǎndà。
Your son is smart and diligent; he definitely has a bright future before him.
他确乎非常聪明。
Tā quèhū fēicháng cōngmíng。
He is very clever indeed.
如此聪明的孩子很少见。
Rúcǐ cōngmíng de háizi hěn shǎojiàn。
Such an intellingent child is rarely seen.
天性聪明
tiānxìnɡ cōnɡmínɡ 
be intelligent by nature
耍小聪明
shuǎ xiǎocōnɡminɡ
play petty tricks
有点儿小聪明
yǒudiǎnr xiǎocōngming
be clever in some small ways
这只八哥特别聪明。
Zhèzhī bāgē tèbié cōngmíng。
This myna is smart.
她是个冰雪聪明的女孩，很招人喜欢。
Tā shì gè bīngxuě cōngmíng de nǚhái，hěnzhāorén xǐhuan。
She is a smart, innocent, and lovely girl.
他脑子不谓不聪明。
Tā nǎozi búwèi bùcōngmíng。
He is smart.
她很聪明，所以考第一是不足为怪的。
Tā hěncōngmíng，suǒyǐ kǎo dìyī shì bùzú wéiguài de。
Smart as she is, it wasn\'t surprising for her to earn the top score on the test.
这件事之所以吹灯，就是因为你总自作聪明。
Zhèjiànshì zhīsuǒyǐ chuīdēng，jiùshì yīnwèi nǐ zǒng zìzuò cōngmíng。
The whole thing was ruined because you always think you are so clever.
春水盈盈的姑娘透着聪明伶俐。
Chūnshuǐ yíngyíng de gūniang tòu zhe cōngmíng línglì。
The girl with bright eyes seems to be very clever and smart.
他从小聪明，5岁发蒙。
Tā cóngxiǎo cōngming，wǔsuì fāmēng。
He was intelligent as a child, and was taught to read and write when he was five years old.
这个小孩儿，非徒漂亮，而且聪明！
Zhège xiǎoháir，fēitú piàoliang，érqiě cōngming！
This child is not only handsome but also very smart.
她过去是我们家的管家婆，又聪明又勤劳。
Tā guòqù shì wǒmen jiā de guǎnjiāpó，yòu cōngmíng yòu qínláo。
She used to be our housekeeper; she\'s very smart and hard-working.
多吃海产品能够补充大脑消耗，使人变聪明。
Duōchī hǎichǎnpǐn nénggòu bǔchōng dànǎo xiāohào，shǐ rén biàn cōngmíng。
Eating sea products frequently can supplement cerebral consumption, and make people cleverer.
人是活物中最具灵性的，也是最聪明的。
Rén shì huówù zhōng zuì jù língxìng de，yěshì zuì cōngmíng de。
Man is the most intelligent and cleverest among all living things.
上天这么眷爱她，让她生得这么聪明美丽！
Shàngtiān zhème juànài tā，ràng tā shēng de zhème cōngmíng měilì！
God appreciated her so much that she was born smart and beautiful.
他看上去挺聪明的，做起事来竟然这么笨。
Tā kànshàngqù tǐng cōngmíng de，zuòqǐshìlái jìngrán zhème bèn。
He seems to be smart, but behaves so stupidly.
毕业时，老师给小明的考语中有这么一句话：“该生聪明但不好学”。
Bìyè shí，lǎoshī gěi Xiǎo Míng de kǎoyǔ zhōng yǒu zhème yíjùhuà：“Gāishēng cōngmíng dàn búhàoxué”。
When graduating, there was a sentence in the comments that the teacher gave Xiaoming: &quot;this student is smart but not willing to study.&quot;
她那么聪明漂亮，是他心中的可人儿！
Tā nàme cōngmíng piàoliàng，shì tā xīn zhōng de kěrénr！
She is so beautiful and smart, she\'s exactly as he likes.
我老姐不仅聪明还很善解人意，你是不是很想认识一下啊？
Wǒ lǎojiě bùjǐn cōngmíng hái hěnshànjiě rényì，nǐ shìbushì hěnxiǎng rènshi yíxià a？
My elder sister is kind as well as clever. Are you eager to know her?
听说令爱聪明过人，真让人羡慕呀。
Tīngshuō lìngài cōngmíng guòrén，zhēn ràng rén xiànmù ya。
It is said that your daughter is very clever, which brings my admiration.
小明从小就脑瓜儿聪明，可惜就是不喜欢学习。
Xiǎo Míng cóng xiǎo jiù nǎoguār cōngmíng，kěxī jiùshì bùxǐhuan xuéxí。
Xiaoming has been clever since he was young, but he doesn’t like studying.
宝宝的脑门儿很圆，看着就像个聪明孩子！
Bǎobao de nǎoménr hěnyuán，kànzhe jiù xiàng gè cōngmíng háizi！
The forehead of the baby is quite round, which signifies cleverness at first sight.
小明很聪明，不仅学过绘画，还旁通音乐。
Xiǎo Míng hěncōngmíng，bùjǐn xuéguò huìhuà，hái pángtōng yīnyuè。
Xiao Ming is smart, he knows how to paint and he is also proficient in musicology.
他虽然聪明但不够专心，学习中时常心有旁骛。
Tā suīrán cōngmíng dàn búgòu zhuānxīn，xuéxí zhōng shícháng xīnyǒu pángwù。
He is smart but inattentive, he sometimes fails to concentrate when he is studying.
我家小狗特别聪明，只用它自己的盆子吃饭。
Wǒjiā xiǎogǒu tèbié cōngmíng，zhǐyòng tā zìjǐ de pénzi chī fàn。
Our puppy is very smart, he only uses his own bowl to eat.
我对于其人的评价是：聪明但不爱学习。
Wǒ duìyú qírén de píngjià shì：cōngmíng dàn búài xuéxí。
My judgment of that person is that he is smart but not fond of studying.
他前庭饱满，看上去就很聪明。
Tā qiántíng bǎomǎn，kànshàngqù jiù hěncōngmíng。
With a prominent forehead, he looks smart.
他太聪明伶俐了，真是个人精。
Tā tài cōngmíng línglì le，zhēnshì gè rénjīng。
He is an exceedingly clever child.
这个孩子真聪明，几天就把三字经背下来了。
Zhège háizi zhēn cōngming，jǐtiān jiù bǎ sānzìjīng bèi xiàlai le。
How clever the child is. He can recite the three character primer a few days later.
他是个很聪明的人，但才华不外溢。
Tā shì gè hěncōngmíng de rén，dàn cáihuá bú wàiyì。
He is a clever person, but does not often show his intelligence.
小李是个聪明人，对事情总是能够先知先觉。
Xiǎo Lǐ shì gè cōngmíngrén，duì shìqing zǒngshì nénggòu xiānzhī xiānjué。
Xiao Li is a smart person with foresight.
在这种危机重重的时候，向来聪明的他也只能装傻充愣。
Zài zhèzhǒng wēijī chóngchóng de shíhou，xiàng lái cōngming de tā yě zhǐnéng zhuāngshǎ chōnglèng。
Being bogged down in crises, he who was always very clever had no choice but to feign confusion over the current situation.
她聪明并且用功。
Tā cōngmíng bìngqiě yònggōng。
She is clever and diligent.
她不很聪明，但很努力。
Tā bùhěncōngmíng，dàn hěnnǔlì。
She wasn\'t very clever, but she was very hardworking.
他其貌不扬，倒是很聪明。
Tā qímàobùyáng，dàoshì hěncōngmíng。
He\'s not very attractive, but he\'s clever.
这女孩儿多聪明啊！
Zhè nǚháir duōcōngmíng ā！
This girl is so clever!
他到底有多么聪明？
Tā dàodǐ yǒu duōmecōngmíng？
How clever is he really?
美丽而聪明
měilì ér cōngmíng
beautiful and clever
她不聪明，但还算老实。
Tā bùcōngmíng，dàn háisuàn lǎoshí。
She\'s no great brain, but still, she\'s honest.
东立就是聪明。
Dōnglì jiùshì cōngmíng.
Dong Li is really clever.
他挺聪明的，就是不够勤勉。
Tā tǐng cōngmíng de，jiùshì búgòu qínmiǎn.
He\'s very clever, only he doesn\'t work hard enough.
绝顶聪明
juédǐng cōngmíng
extremely intelligent
他儿子可是真聪明。
Tā érzǐ kěshì zhēn cōngmíng.
His son is really clever.
李太太总夸口说自己的女儿聪明。
Lǐtàitài zǒng kuākǒu shuō zìjǐ de nǚ\'ér cōngmíng.
Mrs. Li is always boasting about how clever her daughter is.
他确实聪明。
Tā quèshí cōngmíng.
He ‘ s really clever.
别再耍小聪明了。
Bié zài shuǎxiǎocōngmíngle。
Don\'t play those petty tricks again.
他特别聪明，也很能干。
Tā tèbié cōngmíng，yě hěn nénggàn。
He\'s highly intelligent, and also very competent.
他自小就聪明能干。
Tā zì xiǎo jiù cōngmíngnénggàn。
From an early age he has been clever and capable.
他聪明能干，却早早地走了。
Tā cōngmíngnénggàn，què zǎozǎo de zǒu le。
He was clever and able, but died very young.

ěrcōng mùmíng

He has his wits about him and is rarely fooled.

我们再也找不到像莱西那么聪明的狗了。

我认为她很聪明，但是工作方法有问题。

她是个聪明的女孩，懂得人情世故，我不用为她操太多心。

如果他聪明一点儿，就可以猜出我的反应。

这个聪明的家伙很快就明白了她的意图。

我以前从来都不存钱，但现在学聪明点儿了。
Ann is the most intelligent girl in her class.
安是班上最聪明的女孩。

他已经过了那个界定聪明和天才的临界点了。

不要妄自菲薄，你很聪明的。

He is even more intelligent than his classmates.
他比他的同学都要聪明。

有人说我妹妹很聪明，但我认为她很笨。

我是大学里公认的聪明脑瓜。

He is not very clever, besides, he is also lazy.
他不很聪明还比较懒。

她很聪明，什么东西读一遍就能懂。
That boy is really clever, you should talk to him.
那个孩子真的聪明，你应该跟他谈谈。

Jack is a wiseacre who hears the grass grow.
杰克是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。

艾伦是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。
Tom is a witling who hears the grass grow.
汤姆是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。

一个瑜伽行者的饮食应该有节制，否则即使再聪明，他也不会成功。

他用了个聪明的方法就解决了那件棘手的问题，而且没有和别人起冲突。
He is not clever enough to deal with the intellectual problem of unemployment.
要解决待业这个需要动脑筋的问题，他还不够聪明。
A wise man can judge the merits of the matter reasonably.
聪明人可以合理地判断是非。
She believes that naughty children are usually smarter.
她觉得调皮的孩子更聪明。
Don\'t worry, he is a sensible person and he will make the right decision.
不用担心，他是个聪明人，会做出正确决定的。
She is a smart and pretty girl with a good temper.
她聪明漂亮，脾气也好。
Only the brightest students are admitted into our prestigous university.

只有最聪明的学生才能被像我们这样的名牌大学录取。
She was an extremely serious, clever, studious young woman.
Tā shì yí gè fēicháng rènzhēn，cōngmíng，qínfèn de niánqīng nǚzǐ。
她是一个非常认真，聪明，勤奋的年轻女子。
I congratulated myself on yet another brilliant idea.
Wǒ wèi zìjǐ xiǎngdào lìng yī gè cōngmíng de diǎnzǐ ér zìháo。
我为自己想到另一个聪明的点子而自豪。
You\'ll have to be cunning, devious, smart.
Nǐ bìxū de jiǎozhà，yīnxiǎn hé cōngmíng。
你必须得狡诈，阴险和聪明。
She was a woman of great wit and wisdom.
Tā shì yí gè cōngmínglínglì de nǚrén。
她是一个聪明伶俐的女人。
I think nearly all the top sportsmen are reasonably intelligent people.
Wǒ rènwéi jīhū suǒyǒu de dǐngjí yùndòngyuán dōushì fēicháng cōngmíng de rén。
我认为几乎所有的顶级运动员都是非常聪明的人。
He remained as bright as a button.
Tā háishì fēicháng huópo cōngmíng。
他还是非常活泼聪明。
You\'re not a bright spark!
Nǐ búshì gè cōngmíngrén。
你不是个聪明人。
Common sense should tell you I\'m simply reacting in the most intelligent way.
Chángshí yīnggāi huì gàosu nǐ，wǒ zhǐshì zài yǐ zuì cōngmíng de fāngshì zuòchū fǎnyìng。
常识应该会告诉你，我只是在以最聪明的方式做出反应。
He\'s smart and would get the message.
Tā hěn cōngmíng， huì míngbai de。
他很聪明，会明白的。
Brain size and cleverness do not go together.
Dànǎo chǐcùn hé cōngmíng bìng wú guānxi。
大脑尺寸和聪明并无关系。
Tom is very clever and always knows what to say when he is in a jam.
Tāngmǔ fēicháng cōngmíng， chǔyú kùnjìng shí， zǒng zhīdào gāi zěnmeshuō。
汤姆非常聪明，处于困境时，总知道该怎么说。
The wise woman lashed the carpet with the whip until it rose in the air and carried her to the forest.
Zhège cōngmíng de nǚrén yòng biānzi chōudǎzhe dìtǎn，dìtǎn shēngdào le kōngzhōng，bǎ tā dàidào sēnlín。
这个聪明的女人用鞭子抽打着地毯，地毯升到了空中，把她带到森林。
The idea of smartening up had simply never occurred to him.
tā jiù cónglái méiyǒu biàn cōngmíng de xiǎngfǎ。
他就从来没有变聪明的想法。
The writer also often profited by his own ingenuity.
Nà wèi zuòjiā hái jīngcháng déyìyú zìjǐ de cōngmíngcáizhì。
那位作家还经常得益于自己的聪明才智。
He is able to act quickly and intelligently，so there are no flies on him.
Tā xíngdòng mǐnjié ér cōngmíng，bú huì shàngdàngshòupiàn。
他行动敏捷而聪明，不会上当受骗。
We taught our children to be wiser before instead of being wise after the event.
Wǒmen jiàodǎo háizi yào shìqián cōngmíng yìdiǎn，ér búyào shìhòuzhūgěliàng。
我们教导孩子要事前聪明一点，而不要事后诸葛亮。
I have to swallow my words and admit that she\'s really smart.
Wǒ bùdébù chéngrèn shuōcuò le huà，tā zhēn de hěn cōngmíng。
我不得不承认说错了话，她真的很聪明。
He gets his brains from his father\'s side.
Tā de cōngmíng yíchuán zì tā de fùqīn。
他的聪明遗传自他的父亲。
Resourcefully he mingled music and dance.
Tā fēicháng cōngmíng de bǎ yīnyuè hé wǔdǎo jiéhé zài yìqǐ。
他非常聪明地把音乐和舞蹈结合在一起。
My students range from very bright to dull.
Wǒ de xuésheng jì yǒu fēicháng cōngmíng de，yě yǒu hěn chídùn de。
我的学生既有非常聪明的，也有很迟钝的。
You are a clever man...you reason well and your wit is bold.
Nǐ shì yí gè cōngmíng de rén……Nǐ luójì sīwéi hǎo，bìngqiě jīzhì yǒnggǎn。
你是一个聪明的人……你逻辑思维好，并且机智勇敢。
Great wealth is not a sign of great intelligence.
Jùdà de cáifù bìngbúshì gāodù cōngmíng de biāozhì。

He has a keen intellect.
Tā hěn cōngmíng。
他很聪明。

狡黠的人经常冒充聪明人。
Smart children talk earlier than the average.
Cōngmíng de értóng shuōhuà bǐ yìbānrén zǎo。
聪明的儿童说话比一般人早。
I think he is very smart.
Wǒ rènwéi tā hěn cōngmíng。
我认为他很聪明。
I believe her to be very smart.
Wǒ rènwéi tā hěn cōngmíng。
我认为她很聪明。
He is fairly clever with computers.
Tā zài jìsuànjī fāngmiàn xiāngdāng cōngmíng。
他在计算机方面相当聪明。
However he did it，it was very clever.
Bùguǎn tā shì zěnme zuò de，tā dōu zuò de hěn cōngmíng。
不管他是怎么做的，他都做得很聪明。
He is intelligent but too impractical for commercial work.
Zài shāngyè huódòng zhōng tā cōngmíng yǒuyú què guòyú búqièshíjì。
在商业活动中他聪明有余却过于不切实际。
She is an extremely voluble young woman who engages in soliloquies not conversations.
Tā shì yí wèi cōngmíngjuédǐng de niánqīng nǚzǐ，zhīdào zìshēn de jiàzhí bìng wèi cǐ gǎndào jiāo\'ào。
她是一位聪明绝顶的年轻女子，知道自身的价值并为此感到骄傲。
She was by far the smartest student.
Tā shì mùqián wéizhǐ zuì cōngmíng de xuésheng。
她是目前为止最聪明的学生。
People impute great cleverness to cats.
Rénmen rènwéi māo hěn cōngmíng。
人们认为猫很聪明。
He is reputed to be intelligent.
Tā yǐ cōngmíng jiàn chēng。
他以聪明见称。
She interjected clever remarks.
Tā chārù yí duàn cōngmíng de jiǎnghuà。
她插入一段聪明的讲话。
The socialists are further handicapped if they believe that capitalists are not only wicked but also devilishly clever.
Rúguǒ shèhuìzhǔyìzhě rènwéi zīběnjiā búdàn shì zuì\'è érqiě shì jíwéi cōngmíng de huà，nàme shèhuìzhǔyìzhě zé gèng niǔqū。
如果社会主义者认为资本家不但是罪恶而且是极为聪明的话，那么社会主义者则更扭曲。
He was too politic to quarrel with so important a personage.
Tā hěn cōngmíng，búhuì yǔ zhème zhòngyào de rén zhēngchǎo。
他很聪明，不会与这么重要的人争吵。
True, she is the smartest in her class.
Zhēn de，tā shì tā bān zhōng zuì cōngmíng de xuésheng。
真的，她是她班中最聪明的学生。
She was inordinately smart.
Tā fēicháng cōngmíng。
她非常聪明。
他自小聪敏好学，成绩一直遥遥领先。
Tā zì xiǎo cōngmǐn hàoxué，chéngjì yìzhí yáoyáo lǐngxiān。
He has been clever and fond of studying since he was young, and way ahead of his peers in study.
这孩子不仅聪敏而且反应快，是个捷才。
Zhè háizi bùjǐn cōngmǐn érqiě fǎnyìng kuài，shì gè jiécái。
This child is intelligent and swift.

聪敏

He is able to act quickly and intelligently，so there are no flies on him.

他行动敏捷而聪明，不会上当受骗。
Jack is a wiseacre who hears the grass grow.
杰克是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。

艾伦是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。
Tom is a witling who hears the grass grow.
汤姆是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。

聪慧。

he\'s got brains

bǐngfù cōngmíng 
be gifted with keen intelligence
充分发挥人民群众的聪明才智
chōngfèn fāhuī rénmínqúnzhòng de cōngmíngcáizhì

左耳失聪
zuǒ\'ěr shīcōng

聪明能干
cōngmíng nénggàn

聪颖过人
cōngyǐngguòrén 
far surpass others in intelligence; be exceptionally bright
这孩子用功但不怎么聪明。

聪明过头
cōngmíngguòtóu

cōngmínghàoxué

juédǐnɡ cōnɡmínɡ
extremely intelligent

Tā rén dào cōngmíng，jiùshì lùdào méiyǒu zǒuduì。
He\'s quite intelligent, but he doesn\'t have a correct approach to things.
卖弄小聪明
màinongxiǎocōngming
show off one\'s smartness
我弟弟没有他聪明。
Wǒ dìdi méiyǒu tā cōngmíng。
My younger brother is not so clever as he.
你的孩子又聪明又用功，一定前程远大。
Nǐ de háizi yòu cōngmíngyòu yònggōng，yídìngqiánchéngyuǎndà。
Your son is smart and diligent; he definitely has a bright future before him.
他确乎非常聪明。
Tā quèhū fēicháng cōngmíng。
He is very clever indeed.

Rúcǐ cōngmíng de háizi hěn shǎojiàn。
Such an intellingent child is rarely seen.

shuāng\'ěr shīcōng

ěrcōng mùmíng

yǒudiǎnr xiǎocōngming

cōngyǐng
intelligent; bright; clever
这只八哥特别聪明。
Zhèzhī bāgē tèbié cōngmíng。
This myna is smart.
她是个冰雪聪明的女孩，很招人喜欢。

She is a smart, innocent, and lovely girl.
他脑子不谓不聪明。

He is smart.
她很聪明，所以考第一是不足为怪的。
Tā hěncōngmíng，suǒyǐ kǎo dìyī shì bùzú wéiguài de。

这件事之所以吹灯，就是因为你总自作聪明。

The whole thing was ruined because you always think you are so clever.
春水盈盈的姑娘透着聪明伶俐。

The girl with bright eyes seems to be very clever and smart.
聪俊的孩子就是招人喜欢。
Cōngjùn de háizi jiùshì zhāorén xǐhuan。
Clever and pretty children are always very popular.
他自小聪敏好学，成绩一直遥遥领先。

He has been clever and fond of studying since he was young, and way ahead of his peers in study.
这孩子聪悟得很，将来一定有出息。

This child is so clever that he must have a promising future.
他从小聪明，5岁发蒙。
Tā cóngxiǎo cōngming，wǔsuì fāmēng。
He was intelligent as a child, and was taught to read and write when he was five years old.
这个小孩儿，非徒漂亮，而且聪明！
Zhège xiǎoháir，fēitú piàoliang，érqiě cōngming！
This child is not only handsome but also very smart.
这位医生妙手回春，不少耳聋的人经治疗复聪了。
Zhèwèi yīshēng miàoshǒuhuíchūn，bùshǎo ěrlóng de rén jīng zhìliáo fùcōng le。
The doctor is highly competent, many patients recover their lost hearing after receiving treatment.
她过去是我们家的管家婆，又聪明又勤劳。
Tā guòqù shì wǒmen jiā de guǎnjiāpó，yòu cōngmíng yòu qínláo。
She used to be our housekeeper; she\'s very smart and hard-working.
多吃海产品能够补充大脑消耗，使人变聪明。

Eating sea products frequently can supplement cerebral consumption, and make people cleverer.
人是活物中最具灵性的，也是最聪明的。
Rén shì huówù zhōng zuì jù língxìng de，yěshì zuì cōngmíng de。
Man is the most intelligent and cleverest among all living things.
这孩子不仅聪敏而且反应快，是个捷才。

This child is intelligent and swift.
上天这么眷爱她，让她生得这么聪明美丽！

God appreciated her so much that she was born smart and beautiful.
历史上的唐伯虎，聪慧绝世，一生坎坷。

Tangbohu from the history was extremely smart, with a troublesome life.
他看上去挺聪明的，做起事来竟然这么笨。

He seems to be smart, but behaves so stupidly.
毕业时，老师给小明的考语中有这么一句话：“该生聪明但不好学”。
Bìyè shí，lǎoshī gěi Xiǎo Míng de kǎoyǔ zhōng yǒu zhème yíjùhuà：“Gāishēng cōngmíng dàn búhàoxué”。
When graduating, there was a sentence in the comments that the teacher gave Xiaoming: &quot;this student is smart but not willing to study.&quot;
她那么聪明漂亮，是他心中的可人儿！
Tā nàme cōngmíng piàoliàng，shì tā xīn zhōng de kěrénr！
She is so beautiful and smart, she\'s exactly as he likes.
我老姐不仅聪明还很善解人意，你是不是很想认识一下啊？

My elder sister is kind as well as clever. Are you eager to know her?
听说令爱聪明过人，真让人羡慕呀。
Tīngshuō lìngài cōngmíng guòrén，zhēn ràng rén xiànmù ya。
It is said that your daughter is very clever, which brings my admiration.
小明从小就脑瓜儿聪明，可惜就是不喜欢学习。
Xiǎo Míng cóng xiǎo jiù nǎoguār cōngmíng，kěxī jiùshì bùxǐhuan xuéxí。
Xiaoming has been clever since he was young, but he doesn’t like studying.
宝宝的脑门儿很圆，看着就像个聪明孩子！
Bǎobao de nǎoménr hěnyuán，kànzhe jiù xiàng gè cōngmíng háizi！
The forehead of the baby is quite round, which signifies cleverness at first sight.
小明很聪明，不仅学过绘画，还旁通音乐。
Xiǎo Míng hěncōngmíng，bùjǐn xuéguò huìhuà，hái pángtōng yīnyuè。
Xiao Ming is smart, he knows how to paint and he is also proficient in musicology.
他虽然聪明但不够专心，学习中时常心有旁骛。

He is smart but inattentive, he sometimes fails to concentrate when he is studying.
我家小狗特别聪明，只用它自己的盆子吃饭。

Our puppy is very smart, he only uses his own bowl to eat.
我对于其人的评价是：聪明但不爱学习。

My judgment of that person is that he is smart but not fond of studying.
他前庭饱满，看上去就很聪明。

他太聪明伶俐了，真是个人精。

He is an exceedingly clever child.
这个孩子真聪明，几天就把三字经背下来了。

他是个很聪明的人，但才华不外溢。

He is a clever person, but does not often show his intelligence.
小李是个聪明人，对事情总是能够先知先觉。

Xiao Li is a smart person with foresight.
在这种危机重重的时候，向来聪明的他也只能装傻充愣。

She is clever and diligent.
她不很聪明，但很努力。

She wasn\'t very clever, but she was very hardworking.

不太聪明
don\'t get smart with me!
别对我耍小聪明！
not so clever (as)
不（如…）那么聪明
he struck me as very serious/clever
我感到他很严肃/聪明
Jack is a wiseacre who hears the grass grow.
杰克是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。
Allen is a wisenheimer who hears the grass grow.
艾伦是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。
Tom is a witling who hears the grass grow.
汤姆是个自作聪明的人，对什么事都非常敏感。
The yogi should eat moderately and abstemiously; otherwise, how ever clever, he cannot gain success.
一个瑜伽行者的饮食应该有节制，否则即使再聪明，他也不会成功。
With a witty device, he solved the thorny problem without conflicts with others.
他用了个聪明的方法就解决了那件棘手的问题，而且没有和别人起冲突。
Failure of intelligence can be made up by industry.
聪慧的不足可以用勤奋来弥补。
He is not clever enough to deal with the intellectual problem of unemployment.
要解决待业这个需要动脑筋的问题，他还不够聪明。
A wise man can judge the merits of the matter reasonably.
聪明人可以合理地判断是非。
She believes that naughty children are usually smarter.
她觉得调皮的孩子更聪明。
Don\'t worry, he is a sensible person and he will make the right decision.
不用担心，他是个聪明人，会做出正确决定的。
She is a smart and pretty girl with a good temper.
她聪明漂亮，脾气也好。
Only the brightest students are admitted into our prestigous university.
Zhǐyǒu zuì cōngmíng de xuésheng cáinéng bèi xiàng wǒmen zhèyàng de míngpáidàxué lùqǔ。
只有最聪明的学生才能被像我们这样的名牌大学录取。
He has a handful of intelligent and apt students.
Tā yǒu xǔduō tiānzī-cōngyǐng de xuésheng。
他有许多天资聪颖的学生。
She was an extremely serious, clever, studious young woman.
Tā shì yí gè fēicháng rènzhēn，cōngmíng，qínfèn de niánqīng nǚzǐ。
她是一个非常认真，聪明，勤奋的年轻女子。
I congratulated myself on yet another brilliant idea.
Wǒ wèi zìjǐ xiǎngdào lìng yī gè cōngmíng de diǎnzǐ ér zìháo。
我为自己想到另一个聪明的点子而自豪。
You\'ll have to be cunning, devious, smart.
Nǐ bìxū de jiǎozhà，yīnxiǎn hé cōngmíng。
你必须得狡诈，阴险和聪明。
She was a woman of great wit and wisdom.
Tā shì yí gè cōngmínglínglì de nǚrén。
她是一个聪明伶俐的女人。
I think nearly all the top sportsmen are reasonably intelligent people.
Wǒ rènwéi jīhū suǒyǒu de dǐngjí yùndòngyuán dōushì fēicháng cōngmíng de rén。
我认为几乎所有的顶级运动员都是非常聪明的人。
He remained as bright as a button.
Tā háishì fēicháng huópo cōngmíng。
他还是非常活泼聪明。
You\'re not a bright spark!
Nǐ búshì gè cōngmíngrén。
你不是个聪明人。
Common sense should tell you I\'m simply reacting in the most intelligent way.
Chángshí yīnggāi huì gàosu nǐ，wǒ zhǐshì zài yǐ zuì cōngmíng de fāngshì zuòchū fǎnyìng。
常识应该会告诉你，我只是在以最聪明的方式做出反应。
He\'s smart and would get the message.
Tā hěn cōngmíng， huì míngbai de。
他很聪明，会明白的。
Brain size and cleverness do not go together.
Dànǎo chǐcùn hé cōngmíng bìng wú guānxi。
大脑尺寸和聪明并无关系。
Tom is very clever and always knows what to say when he is in a jam.
Tāngmǔ fēicháng cōngmíng， chǔyú kùnjìng shí， zǒng zhīdào gāi zěnmeshuō。
汤姆非常聪明，处于困境时，总知道该怎么说。
The wise woman lashed the carpet with the whip until it rose in the air and carried her to the forest.
Zhège cōngmíng de nǚrén yòng biānzi chōudǎzhe dìtǎn，dìtǎn shēngdào le kōngzhōng，bǎ tā dàidào sēnlín。
这个聪明的女人用鞭子抽打着地毯，地毯升到了空中，把她带到森林。
The idea of smartening up had simply never occurred to him.
tā jiù cónglái méiyǒu biàn cōngmíng de xiǎngfǎ。
他就从来没有变聪明的想法。
The writer also often profited by his own ingenuity.
Nà wèi zuòjiā hái jīngcháng déyìyú zìjǐ de cōngmíngcáizhì。
那位作家还经常得益于自己的聪明才智。
He is able to act quickly and intelligently，so there are no flies on him.
Tā xíngdòng mǐnjié ér cōngmíng，bú huì shàngdàngshòupiàn。
他行动敏捷而聪明，不会上当受骗。
We taught our children to be wiser before instead of being wise after the event.
Wǒmen jiàodǎo háizi yào shìqián cōngmíng yìdiǎn，ér búyào shìhòuzhūgěliàng。
我们教导孩子要事前聪明一点，而不要事后诸葛亮。
I have to swallow my words and admit that she\'s really smart.
Wǒ bùdébù chéngrèn shuōcuò le huà，tā zhēn de hěn cōngmíng。
我不得不承认说错了话，她真的很聪明。
All her children were brilliant; the only exception was her last child.
Chúle niánjì zuì xiǎo de yígè zhīwài，tā de háizi dōu hěn cōngyǐng。
除了年纪最小的一个之外，她的孩子都很聪颖。
He gets his brains from his father\'s side.
Tā de cōngmíng yíchuán zì tā de fùqīn。
他的聪明遗传自他的父亲。
I don\'t know how to sign, so I could not communicate with my deaf cousin.
Wǒ búhuì shǒuyǔ，yīncǐ wǒ wúfǎ yǔ shīcōng de tángdì jiāoliú。
我不会手语，因此我无法与失聪的堂弟交流。
Resourcefully he mingled music and dance.
Tā fēicháng cōngmíng de bǎ yīnyuè hé wǔdǎo jiéhé zài yìqǐ。
他非常聪明地把音乐和舞蹈结合在一起。
My students range from very bright to dull.
Wǒ de xuésheng jì yǒu fēicháng cōngmíng de，yě yǒu hěn chídùn de。
我的学生既有非常聪明的，也有很迟钝的。
You are a clever man...you reason well and your wit is bold.
Nǐ shì yí gè cōngmíng de rén……Nǐ luójì sīwéi hǎo，bìngqiě jīzhì yǒnggǎn。
你是一个聪明的人……你逻辑思维好，并且机智勇敢。
Great wealth is not a sign of great intelligence.
Jùdà de cáifù bìngbúshì gāodù cōngmíng de biāozhì。
巨大的财富并不是高度聪明的标志。
He has a keen intellect.
Tā hěn cōngmíng。
他很聪明。
The smart set goes there.
Cōngmíng de rén dōu qù nàlǐ。
聪明的人都去那里。
Cunning men often pass for wise.
Jiǎoxiá de rén jīngcháng màochōng cōngmíngrén。
狡黠的人经常冒充聪明人。
Smart children talk earlier than the average.
Cōngmíng de értóng shuōhuà bǐ yìbānrén zǎo。
聪明的儿童说话比一般人早。
I think he is very smart.
Wǒ rènwéi tā hěn cōngmíng。
我认为他很聪明。
I believe her to be very smart.
Wǒ rènwéi tā hěn cōngmíng。
我认为她很聪明。
He is fairly clever with computers.
Tā zài jìsuànjī fāngmiàn xiāngdāng cōngmíng。
他在计算机方面相当聪明。
However he did it，it was very clever.
Bùguǎn tā shì zěnme zuò de，tā dōu zuò de hěn cōngmíng。
不管他是怎么做的，他都做得很聪明。
He is intelligent but too impractical for commercial work.
Zài shāngyè huódòng zhōng tā cōngmíng yǒuyú què guòyú búqièshíjì。
在商业活动中他聪明有余却过于不切实际。
She is an extremely voluble young woman who engages in soliloquies not conversations.
Tā shì yí wèi cōngmíngjuédǐng de niánqīng nǚzǐ，zhīdào zìshēn de jiàzhí bìng wèi cǐ gǎndào jiāo\'ào。
她是一位聪明绝顶的年轻女子，知道自身的价值并为此感到骄傲。
She was by far the smartest student.
Tā shì mùqián wéizhǐ zuì cōngmíng de xuésheng。
她是目前为止最聪明的学生。
People impute great cleverness to cats.
Rénmen rènwéi māo hěn cōngmíng。
人们认为猫很聪明。
He is reputed to be intelligent.
Tā yǐ cōngmíng jiàn chēng。
他以聪明见称。
She interjected clever remarks.
Tā chārù yí duàn cōngmíng de jiǎnghuà。
她插入一段聪明的讲话。
The socialists are further handicapped if they believe that capitalists are not only wicked but also devilishly clever.
Rúguǒ shèhuìzhǔyìzhě rènwéi zīběnjiā búdàn shì zuì\'è érqiě shì jíwéi cōngmíng de huà，nàme shèhuìzhǔyìzhě zé gèng niǔqū。
如果社会主义者认为资本家不但是罪恶而且是极为聪明的话，那么社会主义者则更扭曲。
He was too politic to quarrel with so important a personage.
Tā hěn cōngmíng，búhuì yǔ zhème zhòngyào de rén zhēngchǎo。
他很聪明，不会与这么重要的人争吵。
True, she is the smartest in her class.
Zhēn de，tā shì tā bān zhōng zuì cōngmíng de xuésheng。
真的，她是她班中最聪明的学生。
She was inordinately smart.
Tā fēicháng cōngmíng。
她非常聪明。
她是个冰雪聪明的女孩，很招人喜欢。
Tā shì gè bīngxuě cōngmíng de nǚhái，hěnzhāorén xǐhuan。
She is a smart, innocent, and lovely girl.
这辆车撞毁了路边的电线杆。
Zhèliàngchē zhuànghuǐ le lùbiān de diàn xiàng ān。
The car broke the telegraph pole on the roadside.
两机相撞，同时坠毁。
Liǎngjī xiāngzhuàng，tóngshí zhuìhuǐ。
Both planes crashed within seconds of a midair collision.
The airplane cracked up over the Atlantic ocean and was never seen again.
Zhè jià fēijī zài dàxīyáng shàngkōng zhuànghuǐle，cóngcǐ zàiyě méiyǒu zhǎodào。
这架飞机在大西洋上空撞毁了，从此再也没有找到。
Before he even acquired collision coverage, one of his friends totaled the car.
Zài tā zhīdào zhuàngchē de péicháng fànwéi zhīqián，tā de péngyou jiù chèdǐ huǐdiàole zhè chē。
在他知道撞车的赔偿范围之前，他的朋友就彻底毁掉了这车。
炸毁
zhàhuǐ
blow up; blast to pieces; demolish
工兵在敌军大部队到达前炸毁了大桥。
Gōngbīng zài díjūn dàbùduì dàodá qián zhàhuǐ le dàqiáo。
The engineers in the army blew up the bridge before the enemy troop arrived.
我军利用火箭弹炸毁了敌军的碉堡。
Wǒ jūn lìyòng huǒjiàndàn zhàhuǐ le díjūn de diāobǎo。
Our army destroyed the enemy\'s blockhouse with a rocket bomb.
We rushed the enemy bunker and silenced it with a grenade.
Wǒmen tūxíle dírén de diāobǎo，bìng yòng shǒuliúdàn zhàhuǐle tā。
我们突袭了敌人的碉堡，并用手榴弹炸毁了它。
They will dynamite and burn our museums and try to steal our valuable artwork.
Tāmen dǎsuan zhàhuǐ、 shāohuǐ wǒmen de Bówùguǎn，bìng qǐtú tōuqiè wǒmen bǎoguì de yìshùpǐn。
他们打算炸毁、烧毁我们的博物馆，并企图偷窃我们宝贵的艺术品。
We will blow out the rats hiding in the hole.
Wǒmen jiāng zhàhuǐ cáng zài dòng lǐ de tiánshǔ。
我们将炸毁藏在洞里的田鼠。
Explosives will be used to blow up the abandoned warehouse.
Zhàyào jiāng yào yòng yú zhàhuǐ fèiqì de cāngkù。
炸药将要用于炸毁废弃的仓库。
They opened a parking lot on the bomb site.
Tāmen zài bèi zhàhuǐ de fèixū shàng jiànle yí gè tíngchēchǎng。
他们在被炸毁的废墟上建了一个停车场。
The explosion burst the outer wall of the fortress.
Bàozhà cuīhuǐle chéngbǎo de wàiqiáng。
爆炸摧毁了城堡的外墙。
Bombardments of such density will destroy any defensive works built by the enemy.
这样大密度的轰炸会摧毁敌人的所有防御工事。
销毁罪证
xiāohuǐ zuìzhènɡ
destroy incriminating evidence
销毁核武器
xiāohuǐ héwǔqì
have the nuclear weapons destroyed
昨天海关用燃烧弹销毁了一批毒品。
Zuótiān hǎiguān yòng ránshāodàn xiāohuǐ le yì pī dúpǐn。
Yesterday, customs destroyed a collection of drugs with incendiary bombs.
这是他杀人的血证，不要销毁。
Zhèshì tā shārén de xuèzhèng，búyào xiāohuǐ。
This is the bloody evidence which proves his crime of murder; don\'t destroy it.
审计人员到公司来的时候，他们已经销毁了账本。
Shěnjì rényuán dào gōngsī lái de shíhou，tāmen yǐjing xiāohuǐ le zhàngběn。
When the auditors arrived at the company, they have already destroyed the account book.
如果下周没人来认领这些东西，它们就会被销毁了。
Rúguǒ xiàzhōu méi rén lái rènlǐng zhèxiē dōngxī，tāmen jiù huì bèi xiāohuǐle。
If no-one claims these items in the next week, they will be destroyed.
警方精心布置，一举捣毁了这个传销窝点。
Jǐngfāng jīngxīn bùzhì，yìjǔ dǎohuǐ le zhège chuánxiāo wōdiǎn。
The police planned carefully, and crashed the multi-level marketing hideout.
销毁。
把旧铅字全部销毁。
把这批易爆物品安妥地运到野外销毁。
犯罪分子销毁了底账。
公开销毁假冒商品，以示警诫。
销毁罪证。
销毁材料。
He destroyed the fund transfer instrument.
他销毁了资金转移的文件。
Our evil plan is to black out an entire city.
Wǒmen de xié\'è jìhuà shì xiāohuǐ zhěngzuò chéngshì。
我们的邪恶计划是销毁整座城市。
The secretary is filing away folders.
Mìshū zài xiāohuǐ wénjiàn。
秘书在销毁文件。
Time and weather had worn away any forensic evidence.
Shíjiān hé tiānqì xiāohuǐle suǒyǒu fǎyī de zhèngjù。
时间和天气销毁了所有法医的证据。
He was accused of soliciting his colleagues to destroy the documents.
Tā bèi zhǐkòng yǐnyòu tā de tóngshì xiāohuǐ wénjiàn。
他被指控引诱他的同事销毁文件。
Russia and the united states discussed the dismantling of their nuclear weapons.
Éluósī hé Měiguó tǎolùnle qí héwǔqì de xiāohuǐ wèntí。
俄罗斯和美国讨论了其核武器的销毁问题。
The engineers had to destruct the rocket for safety reasons.
Chūyú ānquán fāngmiàn de kǎolǜ，gōngchéngshī zhǐhǎo bǎ huǒjiàn xiāohuǐ。
出于安全方面的考虑，工程师只好把火箭销毁。
数万株树木遭损毁。
Shù wàn zhū shùmù zāo sǔnhuǐ。
Tens of thousands of trees were damaged or destroyed.
很多古代建筑遭到毁损。
Hěnduō ɡǔdài jiànzhù zāodào huǐsǔn。 
Many ancient buildings have been damaged.
台风过境，损毁了大量房屋。
这批瓷器在运输中无一毁损。
The town suffered serious damage during the storm.
暴风雪使这个城镇遭受了严重损毁。
Peptic ulcer is a sharply circumscribed loss of tissue.
消化性溃疡是一种界限清楚的组织损毁。
His name has been slurred, his reputation damaged.
Tā de xìngmíng zāodàole wūrǔ，tā de míngshēng shòudàole sǔnhuǐ。
他的姓名遭到了污辱，他的名声受到了损毁。
Earthquakes are likely to cause severe and devasting damages.
Dìzhèn yǒukěnéng yǐnqǐ yánzhòng huǐmièxìng de sǔnhài。
地震有可能引起严重毁灭性的损害。
It would have shattered in flinders long before it did that damage.
Tā zài zàochéng zhèzhǒng sǔnhài zhīqián hěnjiǔ jiù cuīhuǐ le Fúlíndésī。
它在造成这种损害之前很久就摧毁了弗林德斯。
烧毁秘密文件
shāohuǐ mìmì wénjiàn
burn up the secret documents
烧毁
shāohuǐ
destroy by fire; burn up
这个变压器已经烧毁了，早该拆换一个新的了。
Zhège biànyāqì yǐjing shāohuǐ le，zǎo gāi chāihuàn yígè xīn de le。
This transformer has burnt out. It should have been replaced a long time ago.
烈火的毒焰烧毁了七八间民宅。
Lièhuǒ de dúyàn shāohuǐ le qībā jiān mínzhái。
The raging flames burned down nearly eight people\'s homes.
在专差到来之前他们已经把文件都烧毁了。
Zài zhuānchāi dàolái zhīqián tāmen yǐjing bǎ wénjiàn dōu shāohuǐ le。
They destroyed all the documents before the specially designated team arrived.
有人故意纵火烧毁了房屋。
Yǒu rén gùyì zònghuǒ shāohuǐle fángwū。
Someone deliberately set fire to the house.
昨天海关用燃烧弹销毁了一批毒品。
Zuótiān hǎiguān yòng ránshāodàn xiāohuǐ le yì pī dúpǐn。
Yesterday, customs destroyed a collection of drugs with incendiary bombs.
不意一场大火把他的书稿全烧毁了
敌人烧毁了整个村庄。
They burned the house and his diaries.
Tāmen shāohuǐle fángzi，yě shāohuǐle tā de rìjì。
他们烧毁了房子，也烧毁了他的日记。
Lava flows can burn, crush, or bury anything in their path.
熔岩流可以烧毁，粉碎并埋葬沿途的所有东西。
A large fire consumed the forest.
一场大火烧毁了森林。
Two unique copies of ancient books were burned in the museum fire.
博物馆的两本古书孤本在火灾中烧毁了。
Many extinct towns are completely deserted.
Xǔduō bèi shāohuǐ de chéngzhèn chèdǐ fèiqì le。
许多被烧毁的城镇彻底废弃了。
He rebuilt the cathedral church after it was destroyed by fire.
Zài tā bèi dàhuǒ shāohuǐ hòu，tā chóngjiànle zhè zuò dàjiàotáng。
在它被大火烧毁后，他重建了这座大教堂。
Police are investigating the cause of a fire which damaged two buildings.
Jǐngchámen zhèngzài diàochá shāohuǐle zhè liǎng zhuàng dàlóu de huǒzāi de yuányīn。
警察们正在调查烧毁了这两幢大楼的火灾的原因。
Anyway, the trees were all burnt to dust.
Zǒngzhī，suǒyǒu de shùmù bèi shāohuǐ chéng huī。
总之，所有的树木被烧毁成灰。
They arrived within minutes to save the building from being burnt down.
Tāmen jǐfēnzhōng nèi biàn dǐdá，bìmiǎnle dàlóu bèi shāohuǐ。
他们几分钟内便抵达，避免了大楼被烧毁。
They will dynamite and burn our museums and try to steal our valuable artwork.
Tāmen dǎsuan zhàhuǐ、 shāohuǐ wǒmen de Bówùguǎn，bìng qǐtú tōuqiè wǒmen bǎoguì de yìshùpǐn。
他们打算炸毁、烧毁我们的博物馆，并企图偷窃我们宝贵的艺术品。
Effigies of Guys will be burnt tomorrow.
Gàiyī·Fúkèsī de mónǐxiàng jiāng yú míngtiān bèi shāohuǐ。
盖伊·福克斯的模拟像将于明天被烧毁。
The original mill building burned down.
Yuánlái de chǎngfáng bèi shāohuǐ le。

gěi qīnlüèzhě yǐ huǐmièxìngdǎjī 
deal the aggressors a crushing (or devastating) blow
敌军逃跑时沿途毁弃了许多武器。
Díjūn táopǎo shí yántú huǐqì le xǔduō wǔqì。
The fleeing enemy abandoned and destroyed many weapons along the road.
很多古代建筑遭到毁损。
Hěnduō ɡǔdài jiànzhù zāodào huǐsǔn。 
Many ancient buildings have been damaged.
十年心血毁于一旦！
Shí nián xīnxuè huǐyúyídàn！
The fruits of ten years\' labours destroyed in one day!
不计毁誉
bújì huǐyù 
be indifferent to people\'s praise or blame
毁誉不一。
Huǐyù bùyī。
Evaluations differ widely.
击毁坦克二十四辆
jīhuǐ tǎnkè èrshísì liànɡ
destroy 24 tanks

Xiéyì mòjì wèi gān，tāmen jiù bǎ tā sīhuǐ le。
They tore up the agreement before the ink was hardly dry.
片面撕毁协议
piànmiàn sīhuǐ xiéyì
unilaterally tear up an agreement

shāohuǐ mìmì wénjiàn
burn up the secret documents
撕毁协定(条约)
sīhuǐ xiédìng（tiáoyuē）
tear up an agreement (a treaty); tear an agreement (a treaty) to shreds
随便撕毁协议
suíbiàn sīhuǐ xiéyì
wantonly tear up an agreement
数万株树木遭损毁。
Shù wàn zhū shùmù zāo sǔnhuǐ。
Tens of thousands of trees were damaged or destroyed.
两机相撞，同时坠毁。
Liǎngjī xiāngzhuàng，tóngshí zhuìhuǐ。
Both planes crashed within seconds of a midair collision.
销毁罪证
xiāohuǐ zuìzhènɡ
destroy incriminating evidence
销毁核武器
xiāohuǐ héwǔqì
have the nuclear weapons destroyed
炸毁
zhàhuǐ
blow up; blast to pieces; demolish
飞机在山中坠毁。
Fēijī zài shān zhōng zhuìhuǐ。
The plane crashed in the mountains.
导弹自毁
dǎodàn zìhǔi
missile self-destruction
烧毁
shāohuǐ
destroy by fire; burn up
毁谤
huǐbàng
slander; malign; calumniate
我们的基地被摧毁了。
Wŏmen de jīdì bèi cuīhuǐ le。
为了名利，他不惜毁身拜誉。
Wèile mínglì，tā bùxī huǐshēn bàiyù。

我们能辨认出其中大部分的鸣叫声，那是因为我们和鸟的听觉范围几乎是一样的。

他总是采用鸵鸟政策，不敢接受现实。

He always adopts an ostrich policy, and dares not face the reality.
伊丽莎白偎贴在我身边，真是小鸟依人。

在她的小鸟球打洞之前，她用7号铁头球棒打了一个漂亮的离洞10英尺的球。
After the tornado there were several loose pet birds flying around the forest.

龙卷风之后，几只逃跑的宠物鸟在树林周围飞行。

Nàxiē niǎo bèi tóurù yí gè gǔntàng de guànzi，shǐ qí yǔmáo biàn de shūsōng yìbá。
那些鸟被投入一个滚烫的罐子，使其羽毛变得疏松易拔。

Shǐyòng pūhuò de yāzi huò yì zhī gǒu lái yǐnyòu niǎo jìnrù xiànjǐng。
使用扑获的鸭子或一只狗来引诱鸟进入陷阱。

Shènzhì tóudǐng fēixíng de yěniǎo dōu néng xiàdào tāmen。

Peach and cherry trees are out in blossom, and we\'ve seen quite a few birds.
Táoshù hé yīngtáoshù yǐ jìnrù huāqī，wǒmen kànjiànle bùshǎo niǎo\'er。

他们提供了很好的机会让我们为当地鸟群拍照。

A bird was flighted by a hunter.
Yì zhī niǎo bèi lièrén shèzhòng le。

birds chirping

the bluejay is a resident bird of Beijing.
北美鸟是北京的一种留鸟。

花鸟画
huāniǎohuà
flower-and-bird painting
我喜欢他挂在墙上的这幅花鸟画。
Wǒ xǐhuan tā guà zài qiáng shàng de zhèfú huāniǎohuà。
I like the flower-bird painting hanging on his wall.
酥油花是藏族特有的艺术形式，雕塑的花鸟等物惟妙惟肖。

Nàgè rén méiyǒu yìdiǎnr liánmǐn xīn。
那个人没有一点儿怜悯心。
Their pitiful laments could be heard throughout the ward.
Zhěnggè láofáng dōu néng tīngdào tāmen kělián de āiháo。
整个牢房都能听到他们可怜的哀嚎。
He has a feel for animals.
Tā liánxī dòngwù。
他怜惜动物。
Pensions are in the toilet.
Tuìxiūjīn dī de kělián。
退休金低得可怜。
Wretched prisoners huddled in stinking cages.
Kělián de qiúfànmen yōngjǐ zài èchòu de láolóng zhōng。
可怜的囚犯们拥挤在恶臭的牢笼中。
Oh，you poor thing.
A，nǐ zhēn kělián。
啊，你真可怜。
The real value of the trust capital may be disastrously less than when the trust began.
Xìntuō zījīn de zhēnzhèng jiàzhí yǔ tuōguǎn cáichǎn xiāngbǐ zé shǎo de kělián。
信托资金的真正价值与托管财产相比则少得可怜。
The Romans had no pity for the defeated.
Luómǎ rén yìdiǎn yě bù liánmǐn zhànbàizhě。
罗马人一点也不怜悯战败者。
The painting was reproduced humiliatingly small.
Nà fú huà bèi línmó de hěn xiǎo，érqiě shì xiǎo de kělián。
那幅画被临摹得很小，而且是小的可怜。
Pathetic dogs kept in small unhygienic cages.
Kělián de gǒu bèi guānzài hěn zāng de xiǎo lóngzi lǐ。
可怜的狗被关在很脏的小笼子里。
She spoke to her children fondly.
Tā lián\'ài de duì zìjǐ de háizimen shuō。
她怜爱地对自己的孩子们说。
The nurse looked at him pityingly.
Hùshi kělián de kànzhe tā。
护士可怜地看着他。
The sick child cried pathetically.
Nàgè shēngbìng de háizi kū de ràng rén kělián。
那个生病的孩子哭得让人可怜。
His office was a hole-in-the-wall.
Tā de bàngōngshì xiǎo de kělián。
他的办公室小得可怜。
He was a yellow gutless worm.
Tā shì yì tiáo dǎnxiǎo nuòruò de kěliánchóng。
他是一条胆小懦弱的可怜虫。
His grades were disgracefully low.
Tā de fēnshù dī de kělián。
他的分数低的可怜。
Her income was laughably small, but she managed to live well.
Tā de shōurù shǎo de kělián，dànshì tā què tōngguò nǔlì ér nénggòu guò de hěn hǎo。
她的收入少得可怜，但是她却通过努力而能够过得很好。
I guess I can squeeze by on this lousy salary.
Wǒ juéde kào zhèdiǎn kěliánbābā de gōngzī wǒ hái kěyǐ miǎnqiǎngdùrì。
我觉得靠这点可怜巴巴的工资我还可以勉强度日。
Wages were pitifully low, particularly the wages of women.
Xīnshuǐ dī de kělián，yóuqíshì fùnǚ de xīnshuǐ。
薪水低得可怜，尤其是妇女的薪水。
Her poor chilblained hands.
Tā kělián de zhǎngmǎn dòngchuāng de shuāngshǒu。
她可怜的长满冻疮的双手。
The most abject slaves joined in the revolt.
Dàduōshù kělián de núlì cānjiāle zàofǎn。
大多数可怜的奴隶参加了造反。
Her poor pestered father had to endure her constant interruptions.
Tā kělián de bèi jiūchánbùxiū de fùqīn bùdébù rěnshòu tā wú xiūzhǐ de dǎrǎo。
她可怜的被纠缠不休的父亲不得不忍受她无休止的打扰。
We will plump out that poor starving child.
Wǒmen jiāng bǎ zhège kělián、jī\'è de háizi yǎngpàng。
我们将把这个可怜、饥饿的孩子养胖。
It was woefully inadequate.
Zhēnshì shǎo de kělián。
真是少得可怜。
He was sadly neglected.
Tā bèi hěn kělián de hūlüè le。
他被很可怜地忽略了。
the poor tarred-and-feathered wretch
kělián de bèi tú shàng jiāoyóu、 zhān shàng yǔmáo de jiāhuo
可怜的被涂上焦油、粘上羽毛的家伙

rán\'ér，Běiyuē yǔ shàng hé zǔzhī zhījiān de jiāoliú shǎo de kělián。
然而，北约与上合组织之间的交流少得可怜。
你这叫做自作自受，没人可怜你。
Nǐ zhè jiàozuò zìzuòzìshòu，méi rén kělián nǐ。
This is what I call stewing in your own juice. Nobody feels sorry for you.
装出一付可怜相
zhuāngchū yífù kělián xiàng
put on a pitiable look
他这付样子真可怜。
Tā zhè fù yàngzi zhēn kělián。
He looks so pitiful.
他这是自作自受，没人可怜他。
Tā zhè shì zìzuòzìshòu，méi rén kělián tā。
Nobody feels sorry for him; he\'s got what he deserves.
这一带雨水少得可怜。
Zhè yídài yǔshuǐ shǎo de kělián。
There\'s terribly little rainfall in this area. or The rainfall is pitifully low in this area.
一副可怜相
yí fù kělián xiàng
a pitiful appearance; a sorry figure
装出一副可怜相
zhuāngchū yífù kělián xiàng 
assume a pitiable look
旧社会的暗门子通常都是些可怜的女人。
Jiù shèhuì de ànménzi tōngcháng dōushì xiē kělián de nǚrén。
The unlicensed prostitutes were usually poor women.
这可怜的流浪狗，是个疤瘌眼儿。
Zhè kělián de liúlànggǒu，shì gè bālayǎnr。
What a poor stray dog! It has a scar across one eye.
这个可怜的孩子是一个低智儿童。
Zhège kělián de háizi shì yígè dīzhì értóng。
This poor child is mentally retarded.
这个孩子真可怜，从小就没有爹娘。
Zhège háizi zhēn kělián，cóng xiǎo jiù méiyǒu diēniáng。
This child is so pitiful, he lost his parents when he was very young.
车祸中，这只可怜的小狗死于非命。
Chēhuò zhōng，zhèzhī kělián de xiǎogǒu sǐyú fēimìng。
This poor little puppy died in a traffic accident.
王先生的著作经诸家细心辑逸，数量依然少得可怜。
Wáng xiānshēng de zhùzuò jīng zhūjiā xìxīn jíyì，shùliàng yīrán shǎo de kělián。
Although carefully collected by many people, Mr. Wang\'s works are still very few.
这个读书人真是穷得可怜，冬天只穿着件夹衣。
Zhège dúshūrén zhēnshì qióng de kělián，dōngtiān zhǐ chuān zhe jiàn jiá yī。
The student is so poor that he only wears one lined garment in the cold winter.
她被人当街骂作贱物，太可怜了。
Tā bèi rén dāngjiē màzuò jiànwù，tài kělián le。
She was called a slut in the street; what a pitiful woman.
他才两岁啊，天天打针吃药，怪可怜见的！
Tā cái liǎng suì a，tiāntiān dǎzhēn chīyào，guài kěliánjiàn de！
He is just two years old. What a pity that he has to take pills and have injections every day.
从电视新闻中看到，非洲难民营里的孩子真可怜。
Cóng diànshì xīnwén zhōng kàndào，Fēizhōu nànmínyíng lǐ de háizi zhēn kělián。
The African children in refuge camps shown on TV news miserable.
可怜的难民们只能靠沿街讨乞为生了。
Kělián de nànmínmen zhǐnéng kào yánjiē tǎoqǐ wéishēng le。
The poor refugees have to survive by begging on the streets.
他看起来一副委屈无告的可怜相。
Tā kànqǐlái yífù wěiqū wúgào de kělián xiàng。
He looks miserable, and helpless.
看你这副可怜兮兮的样子，到底谁欺负你了？
Kàn nǐ zhè fù kělián xīxī de yàngzi，dàodǐ shuí qīfu nǐ le？
You look miserable, who bullied you?
我见不得别人可怜的样子。
Wǒ jiànbùdé biérén kělián de yàngzi.
I can\'t bear seeing others suffer.
那位病人看上去很可怜。
Nà wèi bìngrén kànshàngqù hěn kělián.
That patient looks pitiful.
我存的那点钱少得可怜。
Wǒ cún de nàdiǎn qiánshào de kělián.
I\'ve only managed to save a pitiful amount.
可怜虫
淡月的营业额少得可怜。
从前很多生产队的分值低得可怜。
你看那孩子，大过年的没件新衣裳，可怜见的。
可怜兮兮
楚楚可怜
八十多岁的孤老头，又有重病，怪可怜的。
这样的人不必可怜他。
今年北方雨水少得可怜。
可怜巴巴地等待着。
就这么两个菜，可怜巴巴的够谁吃？
任人摆布的可怜虫。
Have pity on her!
可怜可怜她吧！

有这些可怜的劳工,你可比这城里的所有承包商出更低的价。
I guess I can squeeze by on this lousy salary.

The poor guy obviously didn\'t have any place to go.
那个可怜的家伙显然没有任何地方可去。
Poor him, he is snowed under with work.
可怜的他已经处在工作重压下，忙得不可开交了。
This team is a poor bet.
押在这个队身上的赌注少得可怜。
that poor devil
那个可怜的家伙
a niggardly sum

a sorry sight
悲惨的光景，可怜的情景
Poor thing!
可怜的家伙！
Poor thing, she is really ill.
真可怜，她病得很重。
Animals used in the Circus or also at the zoo look so sad.
马戏团和动物园里的动物看起来是那么可怜。
You could see the poor plant weakening day by day as the insects spread through its rhizome.
害虫已经蔓延到根茎，你可以感觉到这可怜的植物一一天天地衰弱下去。
Don\'t be mad at him, this poor person is just unable to reason.
别冲他发火了，这个可怜的人已经神志不清了。
She was in sad shape.
她的处境很可怜。
Poor him, he can\'t smell.
他真可怜，嗅觉完全丧失了。
poor (old) Bill
可怜的(老)比尔
poor soul
可怜的人
I bought some dog food for this miserable little dog.
我给这只可怜的小狗买了些狗粮。
How can I keep a family on such a miserable wage?
我怎么靠这点可怜的工资养家?
That girl lost all her family. The poor creature.
这个女孩失去了所有的亲人。可怜的小家伙。
The girl cannot even afford her father\'s funeral expense.
这个可怜的女孩连自己父亲的丧葬费都付不起。
The poor little bastard had been more active in death than he had ever been in life.
Nàgè kělián de xiǎo tǎoyàn guǐ bǐ yǐwǎng rènhé shíhòu dōu yuànyì qù sǐ。
那个可怜的小讨厌鬼比以往任何时候都愿意去死。
Your hired bullies did a good job on poor Joe last.
Nǐ gù lái de èbà zuìhòu bǎ kělián de qiáo xià huài le。
你雇来的恶霸最后把可怜的乔吓坏了。
Despite our compounded resources we are accomplishing very little.
Jǐnguǎn wǒmen zǔhéle duō zhǒng zīyuán，wǒmen de chéngguǒ yīrán shǎo de kělián。
尽管我们组合了多种资源，我们的成果依然少得可怜。
Such a lonely figure is always pathetic because whatever he wants proves impossible to have.
Zhèyàng yí gè gūdú de rén zǒngshì kělián de，yīnwèi wúlùn tā xiǎng yào shénme jiéguǒ zǒngshì dé bú dào。
这样一个孤独的人总是可怜的，因为无论他想要什么结果总是得不到。
She\'d been badly beaten up，poor kid.

这个可怜的孩子，她被狠狠揍了一顿。
I chipped in to lend a helping hand for that poor girl.
Wǒ juānle yìxiē qián，xiǎng bāngbāng nàge kělián de nǚhái。
我捐了一些钱，想帮帮那个可怜的女孩。

那个可怜的声音让她心里很不舒服。

这个故事讲述的并不是伸张正义，而是爱心和怜悯的行为。

statutory rape

hōnglōng de jīqì shēng

用千斤顶把汽车顶起来
Yòng qiānjīndǐng bǎ qìchē dǐng qǐlái
jack up a car
Each of the four legs contains a simple screw jack with a thrust bearing that is operated telescopically inside of two tubes.
Sì gè zhījià zhōng měigè dōu zhuāngyǒu yí gè jiǎndān de luóxuán qiānjīndǐng，qiānjīndǐng zhōng yòu zhuāngyǒu yí gè kě zài liǎng gēn guǎndào zhōng shēnsuō de tuīlì zhóuchéng。
四个支架中每个都装有一个简单的螺旋千斤顶，千斤顶中又装有一个可在两根管道中伸缩的推力轴承。
hydraulic jack
【工程】液压千斤顶
automobile jack
汽车千斤顶
Such a small jack can not stay a car of this size.
这样的小千斤顶撑不住这么大的车。
The car is jacked up and the wheel removed.
Zhè liàng chē bèi qiānjīndǐng dǐngle qǐlái， lúntāi yízǒu le。
这辆车被千斤顶顶了起来，轮胎移走了。

用千斤顶把车支撑起来，这样你就能够换轮胎了。
斤斤计较个人得失
jīnjīnjìjiào gèrén déshī
be preoccupied with one\'s personal gains and losses
我痛恶这种为一点小事斤斤计较的人。
Wǒ tòngwù zhèzhǒng wèi yìdiǎn xiǎoshì jīnjīn jìjiào de rén。
I hate people who haggle over every trifle.
你可真是小抠，这点小钱都斤斤计较。

You so  mean to haggle over every ounce.
杰克是个心宽的人，从不为小事与朋友斤斤计较。

jīnjīnjìjiào
quibble over every detail

bā gōngjīn

市斤
shìjīn
jin, a traditional unit of weight, each containing 10 liang (市两) or 16 old liang (旧市两) and equivalent to 0.5 kilogram (公斤) or 1.102 pounds (磅)

It is getting cold. We should buy some coal for the winter.
这片玉米地种的都是优良品种，亩产能达到850斤！
Zhè piàn yùmǐdì zhòng de dōushì yōuliáng pǐnzhǒng，mǔchǎn néng dádào bābǎiwǔshí jīn！
The corn in the field has good seed strain. It can yield  850kg per mu.
他年轻的肩膀能够挑起这千斤重担吗？
Tā niánqīng de jiānbǎng nénggòu tiāoqǐ zhè qiānjīn zhòngdàn ma？
Can he shoulder the heavy responsibility when he is so young?
我昨天晚上吃了两斤沙肝儿。
Wǒ zuótiān wǎnshàng chī le liǎng jīn shāgānr。
Last night I ate two kilos of pork liver.
这个摊主很会做生意，对顾客热情且从不缺斤短两，所以大伙儿都爱买他的菜。
Zhège tānzhǔ hěnhuì zuò shēngyì，duì gùkè rèqíng qiě cóng bùquējīn duǎnliǎng，suǒyǐ dàhuǒr dōu ài mǎi tā de cài。
That vendor knows how to do business. He is always warm to his customers and never gives short weight. That\'s why everybody buys from him.
你刚出生的时候只有4斤重，真是个小不点儿。
Nǐ gāng chūshēng de shíhou zhǐyǒu sìjīn zhòng，zhēnshì gè xiǎobùdiǎnr。
You weighed only 4 jin when you were born, a tiny baby.
姐姐在超市逛了整整一天却只买了几斤鱼鲜。
Jiějie zài chāoshì guàng le zhěngzhěng yìtiān què zhǐ mǎi le jǐ jīn yúxiān。
Sister spent a whole day shopping in the supermarket, and has just bought several kilograms of seafood.
爸爸专门从庐山带回了好几斤上好的雨前。

Father brought back several kilograms of high-quality green tea from Lu Mountain, picked before the Grain Rain.
这筐梨约摸有300斤，估计能卖到500元。
Zhè kuāng lí yuēmō yǒu sānbǎijīn，gūjì néng màidào wǔbǎiyuán。
This basket of pears is probably 300 jin in weight; I guess that they can be sold for 500 yuan.
经常暴饮暴食使他的体重增至200斤。

His weight increased to 200 jin, because he eats and drinks too much at each meal.
姥姥为了防止小贩缺斤短两，每次出去买菜都要带个弹簧秤。

这两个人半斤八两，都不能胜任这份工作。

郑玄作《毛诗笺》。
玄远。
现在研究玄学的人不多了。
Xiànzài yánjiū xuánxué de rén bùduō le。
Now there are only a few people studying metaphysics.
玄学和唯物论是相违背的。
Xuánxué hé wéiwùlùn shì xiāng wéibèi de。
Metaphysics goes against materialism.
故弄玄虚
gùnòngxuánxū
purposely make a mystery of simple things; be deliberately mystifying
媒体总爱故弄玄虚。
Méitǐ zǒng ài gùnòngxuánxū。
The media always likes to make a mystery out of things.
故弄玄虚。
这话说得也太玄虚了。
故弄玄虚。
The author\'s elusiveness may at times be construed as evasiveness.
Zhège zuòjiā de huìsè wénbǐ yǒushí huì bèi lǐjiěwéi gùnòngxuánxū。
这个作家的晦涩文笔有时会被理解为故弄玄虚。
玄武神保佑你，出入平安，健康长寿。
Xuánwǔshén bǎoyòu nǐ，chūrù píngān，jiànkāng chángshòu。
You will be blessed with safety, good health and longevity by the god Xuanwu.
玄武后来被誉为神的化身。
Xuánwǔ hòulái bèiyùwéi shén de huàshēn。
玄武是二十八宿之一。
Xuánwǔ shì Èrshíbāxiù zhīyī。
玄武门在哪里啊，我迷路了。
Xuánwǔmén zài nǎlǐ a，wǒ mílù le。
Where is the Xuanwu gate? I\'m lost.
玄武门。
Venus has a surface that is 90% basalt, indicating volcanism played a major role in shaping its surface.
金星的表面90%是玄武岩，这表明火山运动在其地表形成过程中起了重要作用。
The canyon was a natural cutting through a mountain of basalt.
Xiágǔ shì yì tiáo héngchuān xuánwǔyán shān de tiānrán duànliè。
峡谷是一条横穿玄武岩山的天然断裂。
Basaltic magma is fluid.
Xuánwǔyán yánjiāng shì liúdòng de。
玄武岩岩浆是流动的。
玄孙
xuánsūn
great-great-grandson; grandson of one\'s grandson
玄孙。
玄孙。
玄青
xuánqīng
deep black
玄青。
丹青玄黄，色彩分明
玄妙。
这种理论太玄妙了。
其中玄妙只有他自己明白。
美妙的玄想。
禅理很玄奥，不是每个人都能理解的。
Chánlǐ hěn xuán\'ào，búshì měigèrén dōunéng lǐjiě de。
Zen is very profound and abstruse; not every one can grasp it.
对哲理的钩玄是没有止境的。
Duì zhélǐ de gōuxuán shì méiyǒu zhǐjìng de。
There is no end to searching into philosophical theories.
理论玄奥难懂。
这种理论太玄妙了。
The author\'s elusiveness may at times be construed as evasiveness.
Zhège zuòjiā de huìsè wénbǐ yǒushí huì bèi lǐjiěwéi gùnòngxuánxū。
这个作家的晦涩文笔有时会被理解为故弄玄虚。
玄机。
参透玄机
玄机难测。
玄机在握，克敌有望。
玄机深藏。
玄狐毛的围巾很贵的，我买不起。
Xuánhúmáo de wéijīn hěn guì de，wǒ mǎi bùqǐ。
The black fox scarf is very expensive. I can\'t afford it.
玄狐。
说得那么玄乎，有谁相信。
Shuō de nàme xuánhu，yǒu shuí xiāngxìn。
Who\'d believe such a fantastic story!
玄乎。
他越说越玄乎，没人信。
禅理很玄奥，不是每个人都能理解的。
Chánlǐ hěn xuán\'ào，búshì měigèrén dōunéng lǐjiě de。
Zen is very profound and abstruse; not every one can grasp it.
理论玄奥难懂。
这话太玄了。
Zhè huà tài xuán le。
That\'s a pretty tall story.
说得那么玄乎，有谁相信。
Shuō de nàme xuánhu，yǒu shuí xiāngxìn。
Who\'d believe such a fantastic story!
玄孙
xuánsūn
great-great-grandson; grandson of one\'s grandson

我们准备磨干粉做汤圆。
Wǒmen zhǔnbèi mó gānfěn zuò tāngyuán。
We are preparing to rub dried vermicelli and make dumplings.
晚饭吃包子，喝疙瘩汤怎么样？
Wǎnfàn chī bāozi，hē gēdatāng zěnmeyàng？

你盛汤的时候往下捞，锅底儿都是好东西。

You can scoop up more food from the bottom of a pot of soup.

He thought that drinking yellow wine was good for his health.

Zhè dào tāng lǐ fàng le jījīng，wèidào xiānměi duō le。
This soup tastes much more delicious with a kind of chicken powder seasoning.

Jīzhǐ kěyǐ zhǔtāng hē，wèidào hái búcuò。
Mushrooms can be made into soup and taste good.
夏天时喝绿豆汤能解暑。
Xiàtiān shí hē lǜdòutāng néng jiěshǔ。
Drinking soybean soup can relieve the summer heat.
这座城池被卫兵把守得固若金汤。
Zhèzuò chéngchí bèi wèbīng bǎshǒu de gùruòjīntāng。
The city is strongly fortified by soldiers.
这家小店有一道用口蘑炖的汤，味道很鲜美！
Zhèjiā xiǎodiàn yǒu yídào yòng kǒumó dùn de tāng，wèidào hěnxiānměi！
The stewed mushroom soup in this restaurant is very delicious .
这坛子老汤下次腌咸菜时还可以用，不要倒掉。
Zhè tánzi lǎotāng xiàcì yān xiáncài shí hái kěyǐ yòng，búyào dàodiào。
This jar of old marinade can be used next time. Don\'t pour it away.
这顿利口的饭菜让我的减肥计划又泡汤了。
Zhè dùn lìkǒu de fàncài ràng wǒ de jiǎnféi jìhuà yòu pàotāng le。
The delicious food made my plan to lose weight fail again.

Nándòufu jīdàntāng shì hěnhǎo chī de yídào cài。
The soup of tender bean curd, and egg is delicious.

北方的冬天，吃饭时人们都要喝些暖肚汤。

In the winter, people in the north have some warming soup every dinner.
再冷的天气，只要能喝上一碗妈妈亲自炖的汤，就会觉得暖乎乎的！
Zài lěng de tiānqì，zhǐyào néng hēshàng yìwǎn māma qīnzì dùn de tāng，jiùhuì juédé nuǎnhūhū de！
No matter how cold the weather is, a bowl of my mother\'s soup will warm me up.
她喜欢泡盆汤时在浴盆里边洒上一些花瓣。
Tā xǐhuan pào péntāng shí zài yùpén lǐbian sǎshàng yìxiē huābàn。
I like to scatter some flower leaves in the tub when I am taking a bath.

这个汤味道太淡了，应该再加些甜味剂。

qīngtāngguǎshuǐ

behave with composure

yán zhī bùxiánɡ

xì shuō duānxiáng

jǔzhǐ duānxiáng
behave with serene dignity

a detailed news report
详细了解情况
xiángxì liǎojiě qíngkuàng
acquire detailed knowledge of the situation
考虑周详
kǎolǜ zhōuxiánɡ 
give careful consideration to
作者不详
zuòzhě bùxiáng
by an anonymous author; authorship unknown

jǔzhǐ ānxiáng

Tā zài bēnyǒng de jíliúzhōng fāngǔn。
他在奔涌的急流中翻滚。
心事如潮涌
xīnshì rú cháoyǒng 
one\'s mind seething with all kinds of thoughts
这里真是春潮涌动，春意盎然。
Zhèlǐ zhēnshì chūncháo yǒngdòng，chūnyì àngrán。
With the spring tide coming, spring is in the air here.
革命怒潮汹涌澎湃。
Gémìngnùcháo xiōngyǒngpéngpài。
The raging tide of revolution surges forward.
又是下班的时间，一路上车潮汹涌。
Yòu shì xiàbān de shíjiān，yílùshàng chēcháo xiōngyǒng。
It\'s off-duty time again, cars are surging forward like waves all the way.
革命的潮流汹涌澎湃，势不可挡。
Gémìng de cháoliú xiōngyǒng péngpài，shìbùkědāng。
The revolution is surging forward irresistibly.
欢乐的人群潮水般地涌向天安门广场。
Huānlè de rénqún cháoshuǐbān de yǒng xiàng Tiān\'ānmén Guǎngchǎng。
Crowds of joyous people streamed into Tian\'anmen Square from all directions.
汹涌澎湃的历史潮流
xiōngyǒngpéngpài de lìshǐ cháoliú
a tempestuous historical trend
春潮涌动。
观众潮涌而至
展销会上人潮涌动。
春潮涌动。
浪潮汹涌。
思潮翻涌
碧海扬波涌春潮。
敌人像潮水一样涌到了山下
汹涌澎湃的潮水撞击着海边的岩石
潮水向长堤上冲涌。
汹涌澎湃的时代大潮，滚滚向前。
He could see the tide pouring into the end of the channel.
Tā néng kànjiàn hǎicháo yǒngjìn qúdào de dǐbù。
他能看见海潮涌进渠道的底部。
He could see the tide pouring into the end of the channel.
Tā kěyǐ kàndào cháoshuǐ yǒngrùle hǎixiá de lìng yìduān。
他可以看到潮水涌入了海峡的另一端。
Tidal bores can roar over the sands at speeds of 9 knots!
Cháoshuǐ yǒnglàng kěnéng huì yǐ jiǔhǎilǐ měi xiǎoshí de sùdù kuáng juǎn shātān！
潮水涌浪可能会以九海里每小时的速度狂卷沙滩！
He could see the tide pouring into the end of the channel.
Tā néng kànjiàn cháoshuǐ yǒngrù suìdào de jìntóu。
他能看见潮水涌入隧道的尽头。
The currents well up.
Cháoliú xiōngyǒng。
潮流汹涌。
His account had a poignant undertow of regret.
Yízhèn huǐhèn xiàng tā cháoshuǐ bān yǒnglái。
一阵悔恨向他潮水般涌来。
The flood of letters hit him with the force of a tidal wave.
Xìnjiàn rú cháoshuǐ bān xiàng tā yǒnglái。
信件如潮水般向他涌来。
The following year saw a surge of patriotic feelings.
在接下来的一年中涌现出了一股爱国热潮。
夜深了，山谷里一片死寂。
Yè shēn le，shāngǔ lǐ yípiàn sǐjì。
As night wore on, a deathly silence filled the valley.
死一般的寂静
sǐ yìbān de jìjìng
a deathly stillness
夜深了，四周一片死寂。
I heard a loud scream, and then a long silence.
我听到一声尖叫，然后便是漫长的死寂。
We were walking through a completely silent forest.
我们当时正在穿越一片死寂的森林。
During the night this street is dead
深夜里这条街上一片死寂。
They heard a violent report followed by silence.
Tāmen tīngdào jùdà de bàozhà shēng，ránhòu shì yípiàn sǐjì。
他们听到巨大的爆炸声，然后是一片死寂。
We waited in dead silence until the doctor told us the diagnosis.
医生告诉我们诊断结果前，我们一直都在死一般地沉寂中等待着。
The silence on the front is the indication of forthcoming attack from the enemy.
前线的寂静预示着敌人即将发起进攻。
他喜欢烟花的奇丽，但不懂它幻灭后的寂寞。
Tā xǐhuan yānhuā de qílì，dàn bùdǒng tā huànmiè hòu de jìmò。
He likes the extraordinary beauty of fireworks, but he doesn\'t understand the loneliness after they have been set off.
在寂静的深夜里
zài jìjìng de shēnyè lǐ 
in the still of the night
寂静的山村，顿时沸腾起来。
Jìjìng de shāncūn，dùnshí fèiténgqǐlái。
The quiet mountain village suddenly became astir.
死一般的寂静
sǐ yìbān de jìjìng
a deathly stillness
四野茫茫，寂静无声。
Sìyě mángmáng，jìjìng wúshēng。
All is quiet on the vast expanse of open ground.
尖叫声划破了寂静的夜晚。
Jiānjiàoshēng huápòle jìjìng de yèwǎn.
A scream broke the silence of the night.
当城市还是一片静寂的时候，清洁工就已经开始工作了。
Dāng chéngshì háishi yípiàn jìngjì de shíhou，qīngjiégōng jiù yǐjing kāishǐ gōngzuò le。
The cleaners start work when the city is still quiet.
寂静
寂静
廓落(空阔寂静)。
寂静的夜晚
周围一片寂静。
静寂的山林。
deadly silence
寂静
a drowsy village
寂静的村庄
Suddenly a cell phone rang breaking the silence in the room.
突然，一阵手机铃声打破了屋里的寂静。
The night air was very still.
夜空非常寂静。
The silence on the front is the indication of forthcoming attack from the enemy.
前线的寂静预示着敌人即将发起进攻。
Somewhere in the silence between them a telephone began its urgent, persistent ring.
Zài tāmen zhījiān jìjìng de mǒuchù，yí gè diànhuà jícù de chíxùbúduàn de xiǎng zhe。
在他们之间寂静的某处，一个电话急促地持续不断的响着。
The quiet was broken by the rumble of a truck.
Jìjìng bèi yí liàng kǎchē de lónglóng shēng dǎpò le。
寂静被一辆卡车的隆隆声打破了。
Portia is remaining out in the still night rather than returning to the house.
Bōxīyà nìngyuàn zài jìjìng de yèlǐ dāizài wàibiān，yě búyuàn huí wū。
波西亚宁愿在寂静的夜里呆在外边，也不愿回屋。
There was a moment of silence，the two of them facing up to each other，a clash of wills.
Tūrán yízhèn jìjìng，tāmen hùxiāng kànlekàn duìfāng，shuāngfāng yìjiàn bùyī。
突然一阵寂静，他们互相看了看对方，双方意见不一。
For a space there was the silence of the grave.
Yí duàn shíjiān，dōushì yóurú fénmù bān de jìjìng。
一段时间，都是犹如坟墓般的寂静。
Though it is Saturday afternoon, the streets of New York City are silent as the grave.
Jǐnguǎn shì xīngqī liù xiàwǔ，Niǔyuēchéng de dàjiē xiàng fénmù yíyàng jìjìng。
尽管是星期六下午，纽约城的大街像坟墓一样寂静。
The men in the tower sweated out the silence.
Nà zuò tǎ lǐ de nánrénmen zài jìjìng zhōng ānjìng de děngdài zhe。
那座塔里的男人们在寂静中安静地等待着。
The clock on the mantelpiece ticked away loudly in the stillness.
Bìlú jià shàng de zhōngbiǎo jìjìng zhōng dīdīdada de shēngyīn hěn dà。
壁炉架上的钟表寂静中滴滴答答的声音很大。
There was a shocked silence.
Zhèli jìjìng de kěpà。
这里寂静得可怕。
The night was still.
Yèwǎn hěn jìjìng。
夜晚很寂静。
The brightness of the orange sky was reflected in the dullness of the orange sea.
Míngliàng de júsè tiānkōng dàoyìngzài jìjìng de júsè hǎimiàn shàng。
明亮的桔色天空倒映在寂静的桔色海面上。
Dimly, distantly, voices sounded in the stillness.
Jìjìngzhōng，shēngyīn tīngqǐlái ménglóng ér yáoyuǎn。
寂静中，声音听起来朦胧而遥远。
The last beach of the bay is solitary and peaceful.
海湾上的最后一片沙滩孤寂而宁静。
The house was silent,as if no one had been there.
Zhè zuò fángzi jìngjì wúshēng，sìhū cóng méi rén zhù guò。
这座房子静寂无声，似乎从没人住过。
沉寂的深夜
chénjì de shēnyè 
in the still of (the) night
入夜后，四野一片沉寂。
Rùyè hòu，sìyě yípiàn chénjì。
Night fell, and it was all quiet in the open country.
消息沉寂。
Xiāoxi chénjì。
There has been no news whatsoever.
寂无一人
jì wú yìrén 
quiet and deserted
在寂静的深夜里
zài jìjìng de shēnyè lǐ 
in the still of the night
寂静的山村，顿时沸腾起来。
Jìjìng de shāncūn，dùnshí fèiténgqǐlái。
The quiet mountain village suddenly became astir.
我在这里又交了新朋友，一点也不寂寞。
Wǒ zài zhèlǐ yòu jiāo le xīn péngyou，yìdiǎn yě bú jìmò。
I don\'t feel lonely as I\'ve made new friends here.
寂寞的原野
jìmò de yuányě 
a quiet open country
他们人多，虽然在沙漠中行进，也不感到枯寂。
Tāmen rén duō，suīrán zài shāmò zhōng xíngjìn，yě bùgǎndào kūjì。
They travelled in a large group, so they didn\'t feel bored or lonely while passing through the desert.
死一般的寂静
sǐ yìbān de jìjìng
a deathly stillness

Yè shēn le，shāngǔ lǐ yípiàn sǐjì。

Sìyě mángmáng，jìjìng wúshēng。
All is quiet on the vast expanse of open ground.
万籁俱寂
wànlàijùjì
all is quiet and still; silence reigns supreme
寂寞
jìmò
lonely; lonesome
他不愿回到荒寂的家乡，因为那里实在是太穷了。
Tā búyuàn huídào huāngjì de jiāxiāng，yīnwèi nàlǐ shízai shì tài qióng le。
He was unwilling to return to his desolate and bleak hometown because it was too poor.
深夜里整个城市都显得很寂寥。
Shēnyè lǐ zhěnggè chéngshì dōu xiǎnde hěnjìliáo。
The whole city looks still at night.
她望穿秋水的双眸布满寂寥的神色。
Tā wàngchuān qiūshuǐ de shuāngmóu bùmǎn jìliáo de shénsè。
Her expectant eyes look lonely.
听到这个消息，教室里一片寂然。
Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi，jiàoshì lǐ yípiàn jìrán。
The whole class quieted down on hearing the news.
当城市还是一片静寂的时候，清洁工就已经开始工作了。
Dāng chéngshì háishi yípiàn jìngjì de shíhou，qīngjiégōng jiù yǐjing kāishǐ gōngzuò le。
The cleaners start work when the city is still quiet.
冷寂的长夜使我不禁想起了少年之时伙伴们无忧无虑地打闹玩耍的场景。
Lěngjì de chángyè shǐ wǒ bùjīn xiǎngqǐ le shàonián zhī shí huǒbànmen wúyōu wúlǜ de dǎnào wánshuǎ de chǎngjǐng。
The still and lonely long night reminds me of the scenes when I  played happily and carefreely with my friends in the days of my youth.
深夜的校园没有了白天的喧嚣，异常寥寂。
Shēnyè de xiàoyuán méiyǒu le báitiān de xuānxiāo，yìcháng liáojì。
During deep night, the campus was extraordinarily silent.
自从离婚后，他一直过着寥寂的生活。
Zìcóng líhūn hòu，tā yìzhí guò zhe liáojì de shēnghuó。
Since divorced, he has been living a lonely life.
他喜欢烟花的奇丽，但不懂它幻灭后的寂寞。
Tā xǐhuan yānhuā de qílì，dàn bùdǒng tā huànmiè hòu de jìmò。
He likes the extraordinary beauty of fireworks, but he doesn\'t understand the loneliness after they have been set off.
他喜欢在清寂的郊外独自发呆。
Tā xǐhuan zài qīngjì de jiāowài dúzì fādāi。
He likes to sit alone in a trance in the cold and silent outskirts of town.
夜间的村庄，四周一片阒寂。
Yèjiān de cūnzhuāng，sìzhōu yípiàn qùjì。
Everywhere in the village is silent at night.
听说守墓人的生活不仅清苦寂寞，而且有一定的危险性。
Tīngshuō shǒumù rén de shēnghuó bùjǐn qīngkǔ jìmò，érqiě yǒu yídìng de wēixiǎnxìng。
I heard that a grave-keeper\'s life is not only poor and lonely, but also a bit dangerous.
只要有你相伴，我就一定不会感觉寂寞。
Zhǐyào yǒu nǐ xiāngbàn，wǒ jiù yídìng búhuì gǎnjué jìmò。
I will never feel lonely with you.
他沉寂了很久后，突然给我们来了一封信。
Tā chénjìle hěnjiǔ hòu，tūrán gěi wǒmen láile yìfēngxìn。
There was no news from him for ages, and then suddenly he sent us a letter.
那位小说家已沉寂了多年。
Nàwèi xiǎoshuōjiā yǐ chénjìle duōnián。
We\'ve heard nothing from the novelist for years.
尖叫声划破了寂静的夜晚。
Jiānjiàoshēng huápòle jìjìng de yèwǎn.
A scream broke the silence of the night.

Tā zài jiālǐ dùguòle yí gè jìmò de yèwǎn。
她在家里度过了一个寂寞的夜晚。
Dimly, distantly, voices sounded in the stillness.
Jìjìngzhōng，shēngyīn tīngqǐlái ménglóng ér yáoyuǎn。
寂静中，声音听起来朦胧而遥远。
听到这个消息，教室里一片寂然。
Tīngdào zhège xiāoxi，jiàoshì lǐ yípiàn jìrán。
The whole class quieted down on hearing the news.
他沉寂了很久后，突然给我们来了一封信。
Tā chénjìle hěnjiǔ hòu，tūrán gěi wǒmen láile yìfēngxìn。
There was no news from him for ages, and then suddenly he sent us a letter.
他们人多，虽然在沙漠中行进，也不感到枯寂。
Tāmen rén duō，suīrán zài shāmò zhōng xíngjìn，yě bùgǎndào kūjì。
They travelled in a large group, so they didn\'t feel bored or lonely while passing through the desert.
寂然无声。
There was a moment of silence，the two of them facing up to each other，a clash of wills.
Tūrán yízhèn jìjìng，tāmen hùxiāng kànlekàn duìfāng，shuāngfāng yìjiàn bùyī。
突然一阵寂静，他们互相看了看对方，双方意见不一。
They heard a violent report followed by silence.
Tāmen tīngdào jùdà de bàozhà shēng，ránhòu shì yípiàn sǐjì。
他们听到巨大的爆炸声，然后是一片死寂。
I heard a loud scream, and then a long silence.
我听到一声尖叫，然后便是漫长的死寂。
Suddenly a cell phone rang breaking the silence in the room.
突然，一阵手机铃声打破了屋里的寂静。
孤寂。
一人独居，孤寂难耐
The last beach of the bay is solitary and peaceful.
海湾上的最后一片沙滩孤寂而宁静。
He had never felt so lonely, so isolated.
Tā cóngwèi gǎnjué rúcǐ jìmò hé gūdú。
他从未感觉如此寂寞和孤独。
沉寂的深夜
chénjì de shēnyè 
in the still of (the) night
入夜后，四野一片沉寂。
Rùyè hòu，sìyě yípiàn chénjì。
Night fell, and it was all quiet in the open country.
消息沉寂。
Xiāoxi chénjì。
There has been no news whatsoever.
他沉寂了很久后，突然给我们来了一封信。
Tā chénjìle hěnjiǔ hòu，tūrán gěi wǒmen láile yìfēngxìn。
There was no news from him for ages, and then suddenly he sent us a letter.
那位小说家已沉寂了多年。
Nàwèi xiǎoshuōjiā yǐ chénjìle duōnián。
We\'ve heard nothing from the novelist for years.
沉寂
沉寂的山林
音信沉寂
An awkward pause followed his remark.
他讲了话，接着是一片让人尴尬的沉寂。
We waited in dead silence until the doctor told us the diagnosis.
医生告诉我们诊断结果前，我们一直都在死一般地沉寂中等待着。
The silence preyed on my mind and ate into me.
Zhèyàng de chénjì zhémózhe wǒ bìng qīnshí wǒ de nèixīn。
这样的沉寂折磨着我并侵蚀我的内心。

guòqī zuòfèi

declare invalid

become invalid
作废
zuòfèi
become invalid

We can\'t ignore the work of recycling waste, because increasing income is equally as important as decreasing expenditure.

fèiqǐnwàngshí de gōngzuò

过期作废。

Rúguǒ zhèngjù de piānjiàn zuòyòng chāoguò qí zhèngmínglì，nàme zhǐnéng zuòfèi。
