因为工作繁多，我们废寝忘食。
A 70\'s activist went to see as a committed drinker and bowler.

不以人废言
bù yǐrénfèiyán
not reject an opinion because of the speaker
无论发生什么情况，我们都不能以人废言。
Wúlùn fāshēng shénme qíngkuàng，wǒmen dōu bùnéng yǐrén fèiyán。
No matter what happens, we can\'t reject an opinion because of the speaker.
我说的也可能是废话，不过还是请你再考虑考虑。
Wǒ shuō de yě kěnéng shì fèihuà，búguò háishi qǐng nǐ zài kǎolǜ kǎolǜ。

她一边说话一边干活，不肯荒废半点功夫。

She worked while she chatted, not wasting a single moment.

Don\'t give me any of that jazz.
Búyào gēn wǒ shuō rènhé fèihuà。

What is your aim in all of this nonsense?

说这么多废话，你的目的是什么？

They are making a song and dance about freedom.
他们长篇大论地说了一堆关于自由的废话。

废物利用
fèiwù lìyòng
make use of waste material; convert waste into useful material
他什么事也不会干，简直是个废物！
Tā shénme shì yě bú huì gàn，jiǎnzhí shì gè fèiwù！
He\'s really a good-for-nothing!
废物还是可以利用。
Fèiwù háishi kěyǐ lìyòng。
Waste materials can still be made use of.
垃圾电站用垃圾发电，不仅制造能源还废物利用，值得广泛推广！
Lājī diànzhàn yòng lājī fādiàn，bùjǐn zhìzào néngyuán hái fèiwù lìyòng，zhídé guǎngfàn tuīguǎng！
Rubbish power stations, which generate electricity from rubbish, should be popularized because they generate energy as well as capitalize on refuse.
这些工业废弃物对环境的危害很大，应当妥善处理。
Zhèxiē gōngyè fèiqìwù duì huánjìng de wēihài hěndà，yīngdāng tuǒshàn chǔlǐ。
We must deal with this industrial waste very carefully as it can cause great pollution to our environment.

Many old and useless stuff can be reused after being processed.

We should promote the comprehensive utilization of waste materials.

废铁回炉
fèitiě huílú 
melt down scrap iron; use scrap iron for smelting

废水渗透
fèishuǐ shèntòu
waste water infiltration
净化废水
jìnɡhuà fèishuǐ
purify liquid waste
为了节约用水，废水应当回环使用。
Wèile jiéyuē yòngshuǐ，fèishuǐ yīngdāng huíhuán shǐyòng。
In order to save water, waste water should be used circularly.
千万不要让旧电池中的废液渗入到水土中！
Qiānwàn búyào ràng jiù diànchí zhōng de fèiyè shènrù dào shuǐtǔ zhōng ！
Do not let waste liquid from the batteries sink into the land or the water.
工业废水下泄造成了河流污染。
通过有关部门会诊，废水治理得到了妥善解决。
a waste pipe
废水管；废气管
Wastewater treatment is the biggest problem for this papermaking factory.
废水处理是这个造纸厂最大的问题。

政府将在三年内建成一个废水处理中心.

这块划出来建公园的区域被废水污染了。
There are many methods in houses today for channelling away waste water.

废物将从排水系统流出。
My house has a drainage system that will not be fouled up by large quantities of refuse.
Wǒmen fángzi de páishuǐ xìtǒng bú huì yīn fèiqìwù duō ér dǔsè。
我们房子的排水系统不会因废弃物多而堵塞。

bù yǐrénfèiyán
not reject an opinion because of the speaker

We should promote the comprehensive utilization of waste materials.

Fèijiù diànchí jíshǐ méiyǒule shǐyòng jiàzhí yě bùkě suíshǒu luàn diū，yīnwèi tāmen huì wūrǎn huánjìng！
Old batteries can\'t be discarded casually even when they are no longer useful, because they\'ll pollute the environment!
废弃陈规旧习
fèiqì chénguī jiùxí
discard outdated regulations and customs
我们不能忽视收旧利废工作，开源与节流要并重。
Wǒmen bùnéng hūshì shōujiù lìfèi gōngzuò，kāiyuán yǔ jiéliú yào bìngzhòng。
We can\'t ignore the work of recycling waste, because increasing income is equally as important as decreasing expenditure.
这架机器太旧，快报废了。
Zhè jià jīqì tài jiù，kuài bàofèi le。
This machine is so old it will soon have to be scrapped.

The old law abolished bonded labour.

她一边说话一边干活，不肯荒废半点功夫。

净说些废话，顶什么用？
废话连篇
少废话，干活儿去！
文字简洁，没有废话。
plain nonsense
明显的废话
a regular nuisance
十足的废话
the veriest nonsense
十足的废话
He talks rubbish.
他废话连篇。
They are making a song and dance about freedom.
他们长篇大论地说了一堆关于自由的废话。
Don\'t give me any of that jazz.
Búyào gēn wǒ shuō rènhé fèihuà。
不要跟我说任何废话。
What is your aim in all of this nonsense?
Shuō zhèmeduō fèihuà，nǐ de mùdì shì shénme？
说这么多废话，你的目的是什么？
&quot;This is bunk,&quot; she shouted, I cannot accept this.
“Zhè shì fèihuà”，tā hǎn dào，wǒ wúfǎ jiēshòu zhè yì diǎn。
“这是废话”，她喊道，我无法接受这一点。
Forget about all the crap I said before.
Wàngjì wǒ zhīqián shuōguò de fèihuà ba。
忘记我之前说过的废话吧。
I put up with a lot of bullshit from that jerk.
Wǒ róngrěnle nàgè bèndàn shuō de yí dà duī fèihuà。
我容忍了那个笨蛋说的一大堆废话。
What he said was mostly bull.
Tā suǒ shuō de dàbàn dōushì fèihuà。
他所说的大半都是废话。
咱们把这些废纸烧掉吧。
Zánmen bǎ zhèxiē fèizhǐ shāodiào ba。
Let\'s burn up all this waste paper.
He finally sold the car for scrap metal.
Tā zuìhòu bǎ qìchē dāng fèipǐn màidiào le。
他最后把汽车当废品卖掉了。
They burned off the waste.
Tāmen bǎ fèiqìwù shāodiào。
他们把废弃物烧掉。
废除一切不平等条约
fèichú yíqiè bùpíngděng tiáoyuē
abrogate all unequal treaties
废除烦琐的礼节
fèichú fánsuǒ de lǐjié
do away with tedious formalities
废除领导干部终身制
fèichú lǐngdǎo gànbù zhōng shēnzhì
abolish the system of life-long tenure in leading
北京已经废除了自行车车捐。
Běijīng yǐjing fèichú le zìxíngchē chējuān。
The bicycle tax in Beijing was abolished.
管卡压这种计划经济时代的生硬手段早就该废除。
Guǎnkǎyā zhèzhǒng jìhuà jīngjì shídài de shēngyìng shǒuduàn zǎo jiù gāi fèichú。
The inflexible approach of the time of planned economy, which was controlling, blocking and suppressing, should have been abandoned already.
这些旧章跟不上时代了，应当废除。
Zhèxiē jiùzhāng gēnbúshàng shídài le，yīngdāng fèichú。
These old systems are outdated and should be abolished.
每年的12月2日，是废除奴隶制国际日。
Měinián de shí\'èryuè èrrì，shì fèichú núlìzhì guójìrì。
December 2 is the International Day for the Abolition of Slavery.
这个国家已经陆续废除了土邦。
Zhège guójiā yǐjing lùxù fèichú le tǔbāng。
This country has gradually done away with all the native states.
多数国家已经废除政教合一制度。
Duōshù guójiā yǐjing fèichú zhèngjiào héyī zhìdù。
Many countries have already abolished the integration of religion and politics.
废除剥削制度
fèichú bōxuēzhìdù
abolish exploitative systems
废除
废除旧名，改用新名。
废除终身制，打碎铁交椅。
废除帝制，建立共和
废除弊政
废除旧制

After the abolition of slavery, many blacks in America were liberated.
奴隶制度废除后，许多美国黑人被解放了。
The motion for tonight\'s debate is: This House believes slavery should be abolished.
今晚辩论的动议是：本议会认为应当废除奴隶制。
The old law abolished bonded labour.
旧法律废除了抵押劳动制。
The Federals helped abolish slavery during the Civil War.

The treaty was denounced by the citizens.
Tiáoyuē bèi gōngmín suǒ tōnggào fèichú。
条约被公民所通告废除。
We will help Russia in her efforts to dismantle nuclear weapons.
Wǒmen yào bāngzhù Éluósī fèichú héwǔqì。
我们要帮助俄罗斯废除核武器。
We will abolish student loans and restore student entitlement to housing benefit and income support.
Wǒmen jiāng fèichú xuésheng dàikuǎn，huīfù xuésheng de zhùfáng bǔzhù hé shōurù zhīchí zhìdù。
我们将废除学生贷款，恢复学生的住房补助和收入支持制度。
Politicians must be careful not to give ammunition to their opponents.
Zhèngzhìjiā bìxū fèichú jǐnshèn，búyào gěi qí duìshǒu liúxià rènhé bǎbǐng。
政治家必须废除谨慎，不要给其对手留下任何把柄。
A few unreasonable restrictions on foreign companies have been swept away.
Duì wàiqǐ de yìxiē bù hélǐ xiànzhì yǐjīng fèichú。
对外企的一些不合理限制已经废除。
Slavery was abolished in the mid-19th century in America and in Russia.
shíjiǔshìjìzhōngyè，Měiguó hé éluósī fèichúle núlìzhì。
19世纪中叶，美国和俄罗斯废除了奴隶制。
This school is completely desegregated.
Zhège Xuéxiào chèdǐ fèichúle zhǒngzúgélí。
这个学校彻底废除了种族隔离。
They promised to abolish forced labor.
Tāmen xǔnuò fèichú láoyì。
他们许诺废除劳役。
The judgment was rescindable.
Gāi xiàng pànjué bèi fèichú le。
该项判决被废除了。
the disposition of wastes
废物的清除
Any remaining waste is washed down in water curtains and piped away for processing and recycling.
Shèngxià de fèipǐn dōu zài shuǐmù zhōng chōngzǒule，chúqù tāmen shì wèile jìnxíng shuǐchǔlǐ hé shuǐxúnhuán。
剩下的废品都在水幕中冲走了，除去它们是为了进行水处理和水循环。
改革必须坚持到底，不能半途而废。
Gǎigé bìxū jiānchídàodǐ，bùnéng bàntú\'érfèi。
Reforms must be carried through to the end and not abandoned halfway.
使报废矿井复生
shǐ bàofèi kuàngjǐng fùshēng 
reopen an abandoned mine
这架机器太旧，快报废了。
Zhè jià jīqì tài jiù，kuài bàofèi le。
This machine is so old it will soon have to be scrapped.

biànfèiwéibǎo 
change waste material into things of value; recycle waste material
他的双腿去年就残废了。
Tā de shuāngtuǐ qùnián jiù cánfèi le。
He lost the use of both legs last year.

bù yǐrénfèiyán

This article is just so much nonsense.
废料堆
fèiliàoduī

废品率
fèipǐnlǜ

你可以把这东西当废品卖。

fèishuǐ shèntòu

废物利用
fèiwù lìyòng
make use of waste material; convert waste into useful material
他什么事也不会干，简直是个废物！
Tā shénme shì yě bú huì gàn，jiǎnzhí shì gè fèiwù！
He\'s really a good-for-nothing!
科举制是在1905年废止的。
Kējǔzhì shì zài yījiǔlíngwǔ nián fèizhǐ de。
The imperialist examinations system was abolished in 1905.
这个法令早就废止了。
Zhège fǎlìng zǎo jiù fèizhǐ le。
This decree has long been annulled.
不要乱扔废纸。
Búyào luànrēng fèizhǐ。

他们的那个条约不过是一张废纸而已。

That treaty of theirs is a mere scrap of paper.
这样珍贵的资料竟被废置在一边，真是太可惜了。

过期作废
guòqī zuòfèi
become invalid after the specified date
废物还是可以利用。
Fèiwù háishi kěyǐ lìyòng。
Waste materials can still be made use of.
有一千多亩废弃地已还耕。
Yǒu yìqiān duō mǔ fèiqìdì yǐ huángēng。
More than 1 000 mu of abandoned land has been reclaimed.
废铁也可以换钱。
Fèitiě yě kěyǐ huàn qián。
Scrap iron can be sold for money.
我们村里没有一亩地是荒废的。
Wǒmen cūn lǐ méiyǒu yì mǔ dì shì huāngfèi de。
Not a single mu of land in our village lies waste.
这所别墅荒废已久。
Zhè suǒ biéshù huāngfèi yǐ jiǔ。
This villa has long fallen into disuse.
她一边说话一边干活，不肯荒废半点功夫。
Tā yìbiān shuōhuà yìbiān gànhuó，bùkěn huāngfèi bàn diǎn gōngfu。
She worked while she chatted, not wasting a single moment.

huānɡfèi xuéyè

fèitiě huílú 
melt down scrap iron; use scrap iron for smelting

kuànɡrìfèishí

bú ràng fèiqì kuòsán

作废
zuòfèi

Gōngsī gāng chóngjiàn，bǎifèidàixīng，wǒmen yídìng yào qíxīnhélì。
The company has just been reestablished. Everything is waiting to be improved, so it is extremely important that we work hard together.
我们公司逐渐走出低谷，百废俱兴。
Wǒmen gōngsī zhújiàn zǒuchū dīgǔ，bǎifèijùxīng。
Our company has moved past a low point. Everything is changing for the better.
白天的时候，小偷装扮成收废品的小贩潜入小区踩道。
Báitiān de shíhou，xiǎotōu zhuāngbàn chéng shōufèipǐn de xiǎofàn qiánrù xiǎoqū cǎidào。
During day time, the thief disguised himself as a peddler who collects garbage, and cased the site.
如此惨毒的刑罚，是应该被废止的。
Rúcǐ cǎndú de xíngfá，shì yīnggāi bèi fèizhǐ de。
Such a cruel penalty should be abolished.
你做事要有长性，不能总是半途而废。
Nǐ zuòshì yào yǒu chángxìng，bùnéng zǒngshì bàntúérfèi。
You should have some perseverance. Don\'t give up halfway.
北京已经废除了自行车车捐。
Běijīng yǐjing fèichú le zìxíngchē chējuān。
The bicycle tax in Beijing was abolished.
这几条村规民约应该废止了。
Zhè jǐtiáo cūnguī mínyuē yīnggāi fèizhǐ le。
These village regulations shall be annulled.
这个地震棚废弃很久了。
Zhège dìzhènpéng fèiqì hěnjiǔ le。
This quakeproof shed has long been out of use.
《戏为六绝句》（杜甫）：“尔曹身与名俱灭，不废江河万古流”。
《Xìwéiliùjuéjù》（Dù Fǔ）：“ěrcáo shēn yǔ míng jùmiè，búfèi jiānghé wàngǔliú”。
In A Playful Quatrain, Du Fu wrote, &quot;Even if your bodies and names should perish, the flowing of the rivers will not stop.
我们楼下有一个收集废旧电池的箱子。
Wǒmen lóu xià yǒu yígè shōují fèijiù diànchí de xiāngzi。
We have a box to collect waste batteries downstairs.
我们厂这个月产品废品率为零。
Wǒmen chǎng zhège yuè chǎnpǐn fèipǐn lǜ wéi líng。
The rejection rate of our products this month is zero.
这些工业废弃物对环境的危害很大，应当妥善处理。
Zhèxiē gōngyè fèiqìwù duì huánjìng de wēihài hěndà，yīngdāng tuǒshàn chǔlǐ。
We must deal with this industrial waste very carefully as it can cause great pollution to our environment.
他们小区也用上了利用废热的集中供热暖气。
Tāmen xiǎoqū yě yòng shàng le lìyòng fèirè de jí zhōng gòngrè nuǎnqì。
Their community gained access to central heating powered by waste heat.
他喜欢收藏铜镜，妻子嘲笑他买了一堆废铜烂铁。
Tā xǐhuan shōucáng tóngjìng，qīzi cháoxiào tā mǎi le yì duī fèitóng làntiě。
His hobby is collecting bronze mirrors, which are ridiculed as &quot;rubbish&quot; by his wife.
战争过后，这里成了一片废墟。
Zhànzhēng guòhòu，zhèlǐ chéng le yípiàn fèixū。
It became a wasteland after the war.
由于家里实在拿不出学费，他只好废学打工去了。
Yóuyú jiālǐ shízai ná bùchū xuéfèi，tā zhǐhǎo fèixué dǎgōng qù le。
He had to quit school to work, as his family could not afford his tuition fees.
千万不要让旧电池中的废液渗入到水土中！
Qiānwàn búyào ràng jiù diànchí zhōng de fèiyè shènrù dào shuǐtǔ zhōng ！
Do not let waste liquid from the batteries sink into the land or the water.
你知道吗，工业废油是可以回收再生的。
Nǐ zhīdào ma，gōngyè fèiyóu shì kěyǐ huíshōu zàishēng de。
Do you know that industrial waste oil can be recycled?
管卡压这种计划经济时代的生硬手段早就该废除。
Guǎnkǎyā zhèzhǒng jìhuà jīngjì shídài de shēngyìng shǒuduàn zǎo jiù gāi fèichú。
The inflexible approach of the time of planned economy, which was controlling, blocking and suppressing, should have been abandoned already.
为了节约用水，废水应当回环使用。
Wèile jiéyuē yòngshuǐ，fèishuǐ yīngdāng huíhuán shǐyòng。
In order to save water, waste water should be used circularly.
这些旧章跟不上时代了，应当废除。
Zhèxiē jiùzhāng gēnbúshàng shídài le，yīngdāng fèichú。
These old systems are outdated and should be abolished.
你这门手艺，因为没有用武之地而旷废了，真可惜！
Nǐ zhè mén shǒuyì，yīnwèi méiyǒu yòngwǔ zhī dì ér kuàngfèi le，zhēn kěxī！
It is regrettable that your skill was neglected because it can be applied nowhere.
垃圾电站用垃圾发电，不仅制造能源还废物利用，值得广泛推广！
Lājī diànzhàn yòng lājī fādiàn，bùjǐn zhìzào néngyuán hái fèiwù lìyòng，zhídé guǎngfàn tuīguǎng！
Rubbish power stations, which generate electricity from rubbish, should be popularized because they generate energy as well as capitalize on refuse.
按照里程表显示的公里数，这辆车已经该报废了。
Ànzhào lǐchéngbiǎo xiǎnshì de gōnglǐshù，zhèliàngchē yǐjing gāi bàofèi le。
According to the miles shown on the odometer, the car should be discarded as useless.
每年的12月2日，是废除奴隶制国际日。
Měinián de shí\'èryuè èrrì，shì fèichú núlìzhì guójìrì。
December 2 is the International Day for the Abolition of Slavery.
我们将把这块圮废多年的地开发成一个商场。
Wǒmen jiāng bǎ zhèkuài pǐfèi duōnián de dì kāifā chéng yígè shāngchǎng。
We shall develop the waste land, which has fallen into disuse for a long time, into a shopping mall.
我们不能忽视收旧利废工作，开源与节流要并重。
Wǒmen bùnéng hūshì shōujiù lìfèi gōngzuò，kāiyuán yǔ jiéliú yào bìngzhòng。
We can\'t ignore the work of recycling waste, because increasing income is equally as important as decreasing expenditure.
那把已经废弃的铜壶上长满了铜锈。
Nà bǎ yǐjing fèiqì de tónghú shàng zhǎngmǎn le tóngxiù。
Verdigris has spread all over that abandoned copper pot.
这个国家已经陆续废除了土邦。
Zhège guójiā yǐjing lùxù fèichú le tǔbāng。
This country has gradually done away with all the native states.
每次遇到困难你就退缩，真是个窝囊废！
Měi cì yùdào kùnnan nǐ jiù tuìsuō，zhēnshì gè wōnángfèi！
You shrink whenever you encounter difficulties, what a worthless wretch!
这些淫秽录像是你思想颓废的污染源！
Zhèxiē yínhuì lù xiàng shì nǐ sīxiǎng tuífèi de wūrǎnyuán！
The dirty videos are the source of pollution for your corrupt mind.
这是一间被废弃多年的破宅子，芜秽不堪。
Zhè shì yìjiān bèi fèiqì duōnián de pò zháizi，wúhuì bùkān。
This is a old deserted house is desolate, and overrun with weeds.
无论发生什么情况，我们都不能以人废言。
Wúlùn fāshēng shénme qíngkuàng，wǒmen dōu bùnéng yǐrén fèiyán。
No matter what happens, we can\'t reject an opinion because of the speaker.
很多废旧物品经过处理可以再利用。

chādòng huálún 
differential pulley

fánɡ huá lúntāi 
antiskid tyre; nonskid tyre

chādòng huálún 
differential pulley

hydrocracking

With that she broke off with me, and we were never to see each other again.

Chángqī gānhàn，tiándì jūnliè。
There has been no rain for a long time and the earth is full of cracks.

Húmiàn shàng de bīngkāiliè le。

duànlièlìxué

shānbēngdìliè

船只现在向左舷倾斜。
The roof declines here.

这里的屋顶向下倾斜。

这个孩子真愁人，学习总是不用心。

The child worries me because he never takes his studies seriously.
他就是个愁人，无论什么事总是想不开。
Tā jiùshì gè chóurén，wúlùn shénme shì zǒngshì xiǎngbùkāi。
He is a gloomy person, who always holds a pessimistic view towards things.
他对前途满怀愁思。
Tā duì qiántú mǎnhuái chóusī。
He is very worried about his future.
他整日愁云满面的，也不知为了什么。
Tā zhěngrì chóuyún mǎnmiàn de，yě bùzhī wèi le shénme。
I don’t know why he always looks sad.
如今，这里的市场也是一片愁云惨雾。
Rújīn，zhèlǐ de shìchǎng yěshì yípiàn chóuyún cǎnwù。
Nowadays the market here is also gloomy.
这些烦愁的事，怎么才能解决？
Zhèxiē fánchóu de shì，zěnme cáinéng jiějué?
How can we solve these tedious and complex problems.
遇到事情咱就想办法解决，犯不着整天愁眉不展的。
Yùdào shìqing zán jiù xiǎng bànfǎ jiějué，fànbuzháo zhěngtiān chóuméi bùzhǎn de。
It is no use getting worried about such things; we can work them out together.
有了这条灌溉渠，我们再也不用为庄稼的浇灌发愁了。
Yǒu le zhètiáo guàngàiqú，wǒmen zài yě búyòng wèi zhuāngjià de jiāoguàn fāchóu le。
With this irrigation ditch, we don\'t have to worry about irrigating the crops any more.
看他愁眉苦脸的样子，横是受了什么打击。
Kàn tā chóuméi kǔliǎn de yàngzi，héng shì shòu le shénme dǎjī。
Look at his sad face. He must have been struck by a blow.
站在山顶，看着面前瘠薄的山地，他满脸愁容。
Zhànzài shāndǐng，kàn zhe miànqián jíbó de shāndì，tā mǎnliǎn chóuróng。
Standing on the top of the hill and looking at the sterile land before him, he looked very sad.
别借酒浇愁了，还是快想对策吧。
Bié jièjiǔ jiāochóu le，háishi kuài xiǎng duìcè ba。
It\'s no using drowning your sorrows; you\'d better work out a plan.
这些烦心事儿令人焦愁。
Zhèxiē fánxīnshìr lìngrén jiāochóu。
These troubles are very worrying to me.
他遇到了麻烦，只有我们才能帮他解愁。
Tā yùdào le máfan，zhǐyǒu wǒmen cáinéng bāng tā jiěchóu。
He is in trouble now, and only we can help him and cheer him up.
看着他穷愁的样子，我心酸极了。
Kàn zhe tā qióngchóu de yàngzi，wǒ xīnsuān jí le。
I was extremely sad when I saw him poverty-stricken and full of worries.
时雨缓解了大旱，农民们这下展开愁眉了。
Shíyǔ huǎnjiě le dàhàn，nóngmínmen zhè xià zhǎnkāi chóuméi le。
The timely rain eased the drought, which removed the worried look from the farmers\' faces.
公司经营日渐式微，老板整日愁眉不展。
Gōngsī jīngyíng rìjiàn shìwēi，lǎobǎn zhěngrì chóuméi bùzhǎn。
The company is having less and less business, so the boss is worried every day.
贫困生们领到了助学金后都不再为学费发愁了。
Pínkùnshēngmen lǐngdào le zhùxuéjīn hòu dōu búzài wèi xuéfèi fāchóu le。
After receiving the grant, the poor students stopped worrying about their tuitions.

There, there! Don\'t worry.
好了，好了，别发愁！
She is troubled about her loan.
她为贷款而发愁。

忧愁使他见老了。
Alice is very sentimental and she cries every day.
艾利斯很多愁善感，她每天都哭。
She had been battling with depression for all her life.
Tā yìshēng dōu zài yǔ chóukǔ kàngzhēng。
她一生都在与愁苦抗争。
After hearing the bad news, his voice adopted a sad tone.
Tīngdào nà tiáo huàixiāoxī zhīhòu，tā shuōhuà de shēngyīn dōu biànle，tīng qǐlái dàizhe yìsī āichóu。
听到那条坏消息之后，他说话的声音都变了，听起来带着一丝哀愁。
The whole family groaned, then burst out laughing.
Zhěnggè jiātíng xiān shì chóuméibùzhǎn，ránhòu tūrán bàochū xiàoshēng。
整个家庭先是愁眉不展，然后突然爆出笑声。
His particular trademark is a cute and cloying sentimentality.
Tā dútè de biāozhì shì zuòzuò de、ràng rén fǎngǎn de duōchóushàngǎn。
他独特的标志是做作的、让人反感的多愁善感。
God promises his people comfort and invites us not to live in sorrow.
Shén chéngnuò gěi tā de zǐ mín ānyì，bú ràng tāmen shēnghuózài yōuchóu zhīzhōng。
神承诺给他的子民安逸，不让他们生活在忧愁之中。
She tends to drink her sorrows away.
Tā zǒngshì jièjiǔxiāochóu。
她总是借酒消愁。
Her divorce drove her to drink everyday.
Líhūn shǐ tā měitiān jièjiǔxiāochóu。
离婚使她每天借酒消愁。
Well, at the end of the day if I did get a decent paid job like I do want, I wouldn\'t have to go pinching for my money.
Zài yì tiān jiéshù shí，rúguǒ wǒ zhēn de zhǎodàole yí gè chènxīnrúyì tǐmiàn gāoxīn de gōngzuò，wǒ jiù búyòng wèi qián fāchóu le。
在一天结束时，如果我真的找到了一个称心如意体面高薪的工作，我就不用为钱发愁了。
The thought of her unhappiness pricked his conscience.
Yì xiǎngdào tā de yōuchóu，tā de liángxīn jiù gǎnjué xiàng shòudào zhēnzhā yíyàng。
一想到她的忧愁，他的良心就感觉像受到针扎一样。
Their faces were clouded with sadness.
Tāmen de liǎnshàng chóuyún mìbù。
他们的脸上愁云密布。

She drowned her trouble in alcohol.
Tā jièjiǔxiāochóu。
他借酒消愁。
Waste not, want not.
Bú làngfèi，bù chóuquē。
不浪费，不愁缺。
His sorrow...made him look...haggard and...woebegone.
Tā de yōushāng …… lìngtā miànróng-qiáocuì …… chóuróng-mǎnmiàn。
他的忧伤……令他面容憔悴……愁容满面。
These experiences have sentimentalized her.
Zhèxiē jīnglì shǐ tā duōchóushàngǎn。
这些经历使她多愁善感。
Too much poetry sentimentalizes the mind.
Shīyì tài nóng róngyì ràng rén duōchóushàngǎn。
诗意太浓容易让人多愁善感。
He fell morosely on the bed.
Tā chóuméikǔliǎn de tǎng zài chuáng shàng。
他愁眉苦脸地躺在床上。
He grimaced when he saw the amount of homework he had to do.
Kànzhe nà yí dà duī bìxū wánchéng de zuòyè，tā mǎnliǎn chóuróng。
看着那一大堆必须完成的作业，他满脸愁容。
他刚刚失业，心中难免悲愁。
Tā gānggāng shīyè，xīn zhōng nánmiǎn bēichóu。
He has just lost his job, which makes him sad and worried.
老伴儿一病不起，使他十分悲愁。
这样解释岂非自相矛盾？
Zhèyàngjiěshì qǐ fēi zìxiāngmáodùn?
Wouldn\'t it be self-contradictory to put it that way?
他的话自相矛盾。
Tā de huà zìxiāngmáodùn。
What he says is self-contradictory.
你这不是自相矛盾吗？
Nǐ zhè búshì zìxiāngmáodùn ma? 
Aren\'t you contradicting yourself?
他肯定是在说谎，前后说的话自相矛盾。
Tā kěndìng shì zài shuōhuǎng，qiánhòu shuō de huà zìxiāng máodùn。
He must be lying, because what he said is self-contradictory.
他的话自相矛盾，没有定准。
inconsistent testimony
自相矛盾的证词
Your reply today is in direct contradiction to what you said last week.
Nǐ jīntiān de huídá yǔ shàngzhōu de shuōfǎ wánquán zìxiāngmáodùn。
你今天的回答与上周的说法完全自相矛盾。
The paradox is that most help for internet addicts is only available online.
Zìxiāngmáodùn de shì，duìyú nàxiē shàngwǎng chéng yǐn de rén de dàduōshù bāngzhù jǐnjǐn shì zàixiàn tígōng de。
自相矛盾的是，对于那些上网成瘾的人的大多数帮助仅仅是在线提供的。
He would have pardoned him for a few paradoxes.
Tā huì yuánliàng tā shuō nàxiē zìxiāngmáodùn de huà。
他会原谅他说那些自相矛盾的话。
The statement &quot;he is brave and he is not brave&quot; is a contradiction.
“Tā yǒnggǎn，tā bù yǒnggǎn”de chénshù shì yì zhǒng zìxiāngmáodùn de chénshù。
“他勇敢，他不勇敢”的陈述是一种自相矛盾的陈述。
His arguments were somewhat self-contradictory.
Tā de guāndiǎn zài mǒu zhǒng chéngdù shàng zìxiāngmáodùn。
他的观点在某种程度上自相矛盾。
He argued contradictorily.
Tā de biànlùn zìxiāngmáodùn。
他的辩论自相矛盾。
&quot;团结ー批评ー团结&quot;是正确处理人民内部矛盾的公式
解决人民内部的基本矛盾，不需要有任何的外来干预。
Jiějué rénmín nèibù de jīběn máodùn，bùxūyào yǒu rènhé de wàilái gānyù。
We don\'t need any foreign interference to solve our basic contradictions among the masses.
&quot;团结ー批评ー团结&quot;是正确处理人民内部矛盾的公式
朋友之间吵架属于内部矛盾，你又何必较真呢？
Péngyou zhījiān chǎojià shǔyú nèibùmáodùn，nǐ yòu hébì jiàozhēn ne？
Quarreling between friends is just an internal contradiction, why do you take it so seriously?
有些地区长期受宗派主义影响，内部矛盾重重，战火连连。
Yǒuxiē dìqū chángqī shòu zōngpàizhǔyì yǐngxiǎng，nèibùmáodùn chóngchóng，zhànhuǒ liánlián。
Some regions have been long affected by sectarianism and troubled by complicated internal conflicts and the flames of war.
中国的“五行”，揭示了事物的内部矛盾。
Zhōngguó de“wǔxíng”，jiēshì le shìwù de nèibùmáodùn。
The five elements; metal, wood, water, fire and earth bring the internal contradictions of things to light.
解决人民内部的基本矛盾，不需要有任何的外来干预。
Jiějué rénmín nèibù de jīběn máodùn，bùxūyào yǒu rènhé de wàilái gānyù。
We don\'t need any foreign interference to solve our basic contradictions among the masses.
&quot;团结ー批评ー团结&quot;是正确处理人民内部矛盾的公式
妥善解决内部矛盾
The organisation was complex and not without internal conflict.
Zhège zǔzhī hěn fùzá，érqiě yǒu yídìng de nèibù máodùn。
这个组织很复杂，而且有一定的内部矛盾。
矛盾的普遍性即寓于矛盾的特殊性之中。
Máodùn de pǔbiànxìngjí yùyú máodùn de tèshūxìngzhī zhōng。
It is precisely in the particularity of contradiction that the universality of contradiction resides.
摆矛盾
bǎi máodùn 
lay bare the contradictions
矛盾表面化了。
Máodùn biǎomiànhuà le。
The contradiction has become apparent.
次要矛盾
cìyào máodùn 
secondary contradiction
矛盾存在于一切事物发展的过程中。
Máodùn cúnzài yú yíqiè shìwù fāzhǎn de guòchéng zhōng。
Contradiction is present in the process of development of all things.
矛盾着的对立面
máodùn zhe de duìlìmiàn
the opposites in a contradiction
非对抗性矛盾
fēiduìkàngxìng máodùn
nonantagonistic contradiction
每一个矛盾的两个方面共处于一个统一体中。
Měi yígè máodùn de liǎnggè fāngmiàn gòng chǔyú yígè tǒngyìtǐ zhōng。
The two aspects of every contradiction coexist in a single entity.
事物发展的每一过程都贯串着矛盾。
Shìwù fāzhǎn de měi yí guòchéngdōu guànchuàn zhe máodùn。
Each phase of the development of any phenomenon is permeated with contradictions.
化解矛盾
huàjiě máodùn
ease contradictions
缓和矛盾
huǎnhé máodùn 
mitigate (or alleviate) a contradiction
混淆两类不同性质的矛盾
hùnxiáo liǎnglèi bùtóngxìngzhì de máodùn 
mix up the two different types of contradictions
两国之间的矛盾进一步激化。
Liǎngguó zhījiān de máodùn jìnyíbùjīhuà。
The contradictions between the two countries are intensifying.
矛盾正在加剧。
Máodùn zhèngzài jiājù。
The contradictions are sharpening.
揭矛盾，找差距
Jiē máodùn，zhǎo chājù。
expose contradictions and find out where one is lagging behind
集中精力解决主要矛盾
jí zhōng jīnglì jiějué zhǔyào máodùn
concentrate one\'s effort on solving the main contradiction
联防巡逻队的建立，大大缓解了警力不足的矛盾。
Liánfángxúnluóduì de jiànlì，dàdà huǎnjiě le jǐnglì bùzú de máodùn。
Setting up the joint patrol has greatly eased the strain on police strength.
矛盾要分主次，不能一律看待。
Máodùn yào fēn zhǔcì，bùnéng yílǜ kàndài。
We should distinguish between major and minor contradictions and not treat them all alike.
他的话前后矛盾，漏洞百出。
Tā de huà qián hòu máodùn，lòudòngbǎichū。
His argument is full of holes.
矛盾的普遍性(特殊性)
máodùn de pǔbiànxìng（tèshūxìng）
the universality (particularity) of contradiction
矛盾的同一性(斗争性)
máodùn de tóngyīxìng（dòuzhēngxìng）
the identity (struggle) of opposites
主要(非主要)矛盾
zhǔyào（fēizhǔyào）máodùn
principal (nonprincipal) contradiction
双方发生矛盾已有多年。
Shuāngfāngfāshēngmáodùn yǐ yǒu duō nián。
The two sides have been in conflict for years.
他俩在闹矛盾。
Tā liǎ zài nào máodùn。
The two of them have fallen out.
矛盾百出
máodùn bǎichū 
full of contradictions
他说的话前后矛盾。
Tā shuō de huà qiánhòu máodùn。
He was contradicting himself in what he said.
这两种意见并不矛盾。
Zhè liǎngzhǒng yìjiàn bìngbùmáodùn。
These two views are not contradictory (or mutually exclusive).
他的心情很矛盾。
Tā de xīnqínghěn máodùn。
His feelings were mixed.
闹矛盾
nào máodùn
be at loggerheads
他内心很矛盾。
Tā nèixīn hěn máodùn。
He is torn by conflicting thoughts.
矛盾的胚芽
máodùn de pēiyá
a contradiction in the bud
这样解释岂非自相矛盾？
Zhèyàngjiěshì qǐ fēi zìxiāngmáodùn?
Wouldn\'t it be self-contradictory to put it that way?
矛盾的一方各以其另一方为自己存在的前提。
Máodùn de yì fānggè yǐ qí lìngyì fāngwéi zìjǐ cúnzài de qiántí。
Each aspect of a contradiction presupposes the existence of the other aspect.
矛盾日益尖锐。
Máodùn rìyì jiānruì。
The contradictions are becoming increasingly acute.
矛盾的深化
máodùn de shēnhuà
intensification of a contradiction
抓住了这个主要矛盾，一切问题就迎刃而解了。
Zhuāzhù le zhège zhǔyào máodùn，yíqiè wèntí jiù yíngrènérjiě le。
Once this principal contradiction is grasped, all problems can be readily solved.
运能和运量的矛盾
yùnnénghé yùnliàng de máodùn
gap between transport capacity and the freight volume
主要矛盾
zhǔyào máodùn 
principal contradiction
他的话自相矛盾。
Tā de huà zìxiāngmáodùn。
What he says is self-contradictory.
你这不是自相矛盾吗？
Nǐ zhè búshì zìxiāngmáodùn ma? 
Aren\'t you contradicting yourself?
他们之间矛盾很深，最后几乎恩断义绝。
Tāmen zhījiān máodùn hěn shēn，zuìhòu jīhū ēnduànyìjué。
They hate each other so much that all love and kind feelings are lost between them.
她嚎叫着把上门解决矛盾的民警赶了出去。
Tā háojiào zhe bǎ shàngmén jiějué máodùn de mínjǐng gǎn le chūqù。
She howled, and drove the police away when they came to solve the conflict.
人与人之间免不了会产生矛盾，这时我们应该学会互谅。
Rén yǔ rén zhījiān miǎnbùliǎo huì chǎnshēng máodùn，zhèshí wǒmen yīnggāi xuéhuì hùliàng。
Conflict between people is unavoidable. When it happens we should learn to understand each other.
一发生矛盾你就不问原因不论是非地向着自己的老乡，这不是拉偏手吗？！
Yì fāshēng máodùn nǐ jiù búwèn yuányīn búlùn shìfēi de xiàng zhe zìjǐ de lǎoxiāng，zhè búshì lāpiānshǒu ma？！
Whenever conflict happens, you are partial to your fellow villagers, regardless of reason or right and wrong.
这个老婆子可讨厌了，总是传闲话，勾惹矛盾。
Zhège lǎopózi kě tǎoyàn le，zǒngshì chuán xiánhuà，gōurě máodùn。
The old biddy is nasty. She always gossips and arouses conflict.
你们两个之间的矛盾也应该了账了吧！

máodùn zhe de duìlìmiàn

fēiduìkàngxìng máodùn

máodùn de pǔbiànxìng（tèshūxìng）

máodùn de tóngyīxìng（dòuzhēngxìng）

zhǔyào（fēizhǔyào）máodùn
principal (nonprincipal) contradiction

nào máodùn

矛盾的胚芽
máodùn de pēiyá
a contradiction in the bud

Zhèyàngjiěshì qǐ fēi zìxiāngmáodùn?

矛盾的深化
máodùn de shēnhuà
intensification of a contradiction

Once this principal contradiction is grasped, all problems can be readily solved.

zhǔyào máodùn

粉碎
fěnsuì

粉丝
拌凉粉吃起来凉丝丝的。

粉末

to characterize sb/sth as
把某人/某物描绘 成
to describe sth/sb/o.s. as...
把某事/某人/自己描述成…
a man described by the police as extremely dangerous
一个被警察描述为极为危险的人
to describe sb/sth to sb
向某人描述某人/某事
He drew on his imagination to write about Moscow.
他靠想像力描写莫斯科。
to paint a grim/gloomy/vivid picture of sth
将某物描绘成一副凄凉/灰暗/生动的景象
to paint a vivid/gloomy/bleak {etc} picture (of sth)
描绘了(某事的)一副生动/灰暗/凄凉{等}的景象
to represent sb/sth as
把某人/某事描绘成
to scan sth into a computer
将某物扫描入电脑
I told her the story of my life.
我向她描述了我的生活。

李痛苦地伸直腰，用手按摩他青肿的肚子。
她肚子疼，你给她摩挲摩挲肚子。
Tā dùzi téng，nǐ gěi tā māsā māsā dùzi。
She\'s got a stomachache. Massage her stomach for her.
憋了一肚子火
biē le yídùzihuǒ 
be filled with pent-up anger
憋着一肚子气
biēzhe yídùziqì 
have pent-up grievances
别看这人不起眼儿，人家可是一肚子学问。
Bié kàn zhèrén bùqǐyǎnr，rénjia kěshì yídùzi xuéwèn。
He is not taken much notice of, but he is a very learned man.
这人肚子里藏不住话。
Zhèrén dùzi lǐ cángbuzhù huà。
This chap can\'t keep anything to himself.
他有什么说什么，肚子里存不住话。
Tā yǒu shénme shuō shénme，dùzi lǐ cúnbuzhù huà。
He always says what he thinks; he can\'t hold anything back.
他把一肚子冤屈都倒了出来。
Tā bǎ yídùzi yuānqū dōu dào le chūlái。
He poured out all his grievances
笑得肚子痛
xiào de dùzi tòng 
laugh till one\'s sides split
肚子疼
dùzi téng
have a stomachache; suffer from abdominal pain
笑得肚子疼
xiào de dùzi téng
laugh till one\'s sides split
一肚子气
yídùzi qì
absolutely exasperated; full of pent-up anger
肚子发胀
dùzi fāzhàng
feel bloated
他的肚子咕噜咕噜直响。
Tā de dùzi gūlū gūlū zhí xiǎng。
His stomach kept rumbling.
一肚子花花肠子
yídùzi huāhuāchángzi
be full of cunning
别信她！ 这个女人可是一肚子坏水！
Bié xìn tā！Zhège nǚrén kěshì yídùzi huàishuǐ！
Don\'t trust her. She\'s full of craft and guile.
把鱼肚子劐开
bǎ yúdùzi huōkāi
slit open the fish
肚子绞痛
dùzi jiǎo tòng
abdominal angina; colic
有些人喜欢夸夸其谈，其实肚子里却是空空如也。
Yǒu xiē rén xǐhuan kuākuāqítán，qíshí dùzi lǐ què shì kōngkōngrúyě。
Some people have a glib tongue but an empty head.
他肚子里还有点儿墨水。
Tā dùzi lǐ hái yǒudiǎnr mòshuǐ。
He\'s something of a scholar.
他满嘴仁义道德，满肚子男盗女娼。
Tā mǎn zuǐ rényìdàodé，mǎn dùzi nándàonǚchāng。
All his talk is of humanity, justice and morality, while in his heart there is nothing but greed and lust.
怄了一肚子气
òu le yí dùzi qì
have a bellyful of repressed grievances
把鱼肚子剖开
bǎ yúdùzi pōukāi
cut open the belly of a fish
走了一天路，我的腿肚子酸溜溜的。
Zǒu le yìtiān lù，wǒ de tuǐdùzi suānliūliū de。
My legs ached after I\'d been walking all day.
他贪吃，这回把肚子吃坏了。
Tā tān chī，zhè huí bǎ dùzi chīhuài le。
He\'s a glutton; he ate himself sick this time.
肚子痛
dùzi tòng
have a stomachache
窝了一肚子火
wō le yí dùzi huǒ 
be filled with pent-up anger; be simmering with rage; be forced to bottle up one\'s anger
窝了一肚子气
wō le yídùzi qì 
have pent-up grievances
一肚子委屈
yí dùzi wěiqū
be full of grievances
一肚子冤气
yí dùzi yuānqì 
beresentful
挺着圆鼓鼓的肚子
tǐng zhe yuángǔgǔ de dùzi
with a rounded, bulging belly
一肚子怨气
yí dùzi yuànqì
be full of complaints (or grievances)
我吃多了，肚子有点胀。
Wǒ chīduō le，dùzi yǒudiǎn zhàng。
I\'ve overeaten and feel bloated.
腿肚子
tuǐdùzi
calf (of the leg)
我实在是吃不下了，肚子已经很饱胀了。
Wǒ shízai shì chī búxià le，dùzi yǐjing hěnbǎozhàng le。
I\'m full, I can\'t eat any more.
我肚子里不停的串气，真是不舒服。
Wǒ dùzi lǐ bùtíng de chuànqì，zhēnshì bùshūfu。
I felt quite uncomfortable because of the gas moving in my stomach.
她挺着大肚子乘车，非常不便。
Tā tǐng zhe dàdùzi chéngchē，fēicháng búbiàn。
It is extremely inconvenient for the pregnant woman to take a bus.
知道你是个大肚子，特意为你烧了很多菜。
Zhīdào nǐ shì gè dàdùzi，tèyì wèi nǐ shāo le hěnduō cài。
I have cooked many dishes, because I know you have a great appetite.
他又蹲坑去了，大概是拉肚子吧。
Tā yòu dūnkēng qù le，dàgài shì lādùzi ba。
He\'s going to the toilet again. It seems that he\'s suffering from diarrhea.
今天吃多了，看我这鼓胀的肚子。
Jīntiān chī duō le，kàn wǒ zhè gǔzhàng de dùzi。
I have eaten so much. Look at my swollen stomach.
他满肚子坏点子，是个害人精。
Tā mǎndùzi huài diǎnzi，shì gè hàirénjīng。
He has a bellyful of evil ideas, and is a scoundrel.
此种药的主要成分是黄连素，治疗拉肚子很有效。
Cǐ zhǒng yào de zhǔyào chéngfèn shì huángliánsù，zhìliáo lādùzi hěnyǒuxiào。
The basis of this medicine is berberine which is very effective in curing loose bowels.
这只母鸡肚子里面已经有鸡子儿了，杀了可惜。
Zhèzhī mǔjī dùzi lǐmian yǐjing yǒu jīzir le，shā le kěxī。
This hen has already got some eggs in her stomach, so it would be a pity to kill her.
因为吃的太多，肚子里面有积食，要空空胃了。
Yīnwéi chī de tài duō，dùzi lǐmian yǒu jīshí，yào kōngkōng wèi le。
Food is not digested and has accumulated in my stomach because of over-eating. I should stop eating to empty my stomach.
我肚子痛，想解大手，可是不知道厕所在哪。
Wǒ dùzi tòng，xiǎng jiě dàshǒu，kěshì bùzhīdào cèsuǒ zài nǎ。
I am having a stomachache and want to go to the toilet, but I don\'t know where it is.
我这一肚子的苦情不知道找谁去说呀！
Wǒ zhè yídùzi de kǔqíng bùzhīdào zhǎo shéi qù shuō ya！
Who can I tell about my misery?
宝宝肚子里有虫了，医生建议让他吃些哌嗪。
Bǎobao dùzi lǐ yǒuchóng le，yīshēng jiànyì ràng tā chī xiē pàiqín。
The baby has worms. The doctor advised him to take some piperazine.
他吃得太饱了，肚子膨脝得难受。
Tā chī de tài bǎo le，dùzi pénghēng de nánshòu。
He ate too much,  his stomach was uncomfortably distended.
他宁愿饿着肚子也不出来要饭，真是个穷棒子。
Tā nìngyuàn è zhe dùzi yě bùchūlái yàofàn，zhēnshì gè qióngbàngzi。
He prefers to be hungry rather than beg for food, he is really a poor person with high aspirations.
我吃了3个山药蛋，肚子有些撑得难受。
Wǒ chī le sāngè shānyaodàn，dǔzi yǒuxiē chēng de nánshòu。
Having eaten three potatoes, I feel stuffed.
你现在可别去惹他，他正一肚子邪火没地方发呢。
Nǐ xiànzài kě biéqù rě tā，tā zhèng yídǔzi xiéhuǒ méi dìfāng fā ne。
Don\'t provoke him now, he is angry now.
吃点小菜，先垫垫肚子。
Chīdiǎn xiǎocài，xiān diàndiàn dùzi。
Have a snack – it\'ll take the edge off.
腿肚子
tuǐdùzi
calf
我肚子咕噜咕噜直响。
Wǒ dùzi gūlūgūlū zhíxiǎng。
My stomach rumbled.
我积压了一肚子怒火。
Wǒ jīyāle yídùzǐ nùhuǒ.
I have a lot of pent-up anger.
拉肚子
lādùzǐ
have diarrhoea (英) {或} diarrhea (美)
他一肚子牢骚。
Tā yídùzǐ láosāo.
He\'s full of complaints.
从小练琴使他的手指头肚儿上磨出了许多茧子。
Cóng xiǎo liànqín shǐ tā de shǒuzhǐtoudùr shàng móchū le xǔduō jiǎnzi。
Many calluses appear on the front part of his fingers due to exercises on the piano from childhood.
他一下子吃了三个冰淇淋，结果受凉跑肚了。
Tā yíxiàzi chī le sāngè bīngqílín，jiéguǒ shòuliáng pǎodù le。
He ate three ice creams all at once. and ended up with a cold and diarrhea.

一肚子坏水(满脑子阴谋诡计)。
肚子吃得圆鼓鼓的。
腿肚子转筋。
There was a neat solid bulge where her flat belly had been.
Tā de dùzi yǐjīng shífēn míngxiǎn de gǔ qǐlái le，ér guòqù tā de dùzi yìzhí shì biǎnpíng de。
她的肚子已经十分明显地鼓起来了，而过去她的肚子一直是扁平的。
I can\'t keep studying on a empty stomach.
我不能饿着肚子继续学习。
on an empty stomach
空着肚子
She\'s really big, when is she due to have the baby?
Tā dùzi zhēn dà，tā de yùchǎnqī shì shénme shíhòu？
她肚子真大，她的预产期是什么时候？
After eating lunch, my stomach felt bad.
Wǔfàn chī guò zhīhòu，wǒ de dùzi gǎndào hěn nánshòu。
午饭吃过之后，我的肚子感到很难受。
The average British man\'s stomach bulges over his trousers.
Yìbān yīngguó nánrén de dùzi dōu zài yāodài shàng gǔzhe。
一般英国男人的肚子都在腰带上鼓着。
She stroked the smooth curve of her pregnant belly.
Tā fǔmōzhe huáiyùn de dùzi de róuhuá qūxiàn。
她抚摸着怀孕的肚子的柔滑曲线。
His belly was beginning to pull itself into painful spasms.
Tā de dùzi kāishǐ chūxiàn lìng rén tòngkǔ de jìngluán。
他的肚子开始出现令人痛苦的痉挛。
His chins and belly shook with silent laughter.
Tā qiáng rěn wēixiào，xiàba hé dùzi bùtíng de chàndòngzhe。
他强忍微笑，下巴和肚子不停地颤动着。
Her belly is larger still than it was just three days ago.
Tā de dùzi bǐ sān tiān qián gèngdà le。
她的肚子比三天前更大了。
Lee straightened painfully, his hand massaging his bruised stomach.
Lǐ tòngkǔ de shēnzhí yāo，yòng shǒu ànmó tā qīngzhǒng de dùzi。
李痛苦地伸直腰，用手按摩他青肿的肚子。
Wine and beer flowed free during the wedding.
Hūnlǐ shàng báijiǔ hé píjiǔ kěyǐ chǎngkāi dùzi hē。
婚礼上白酒和啤酒可以敞开肚子喝。
The ball hit her flush in the stomach.
Qiú zhènghǎo dǎzài tā dùzi shàng。
球正好打在她肚子上。
She felt the pit of her stomach fall away.
Tā juéde tā de dùzi shòubiě xiàqù。
她觉得她的肚子瘦瘪下去。
After being punched in the stomach, he heeled over in pain.
Dùzi zāodào měngjī zhī hòu， tā téng de qīngxiàng yìbiān。
肚子遭到猛击之后，他疼地倾向一边。
The bellies of the starving children are swelling.
Jīchánglùlù de háizǐmen de dùzi yìdiǎndiǎn gǔ qǐlái le。
饥肠辘辘的孩子们的肚子一点点鼓起来了。
It was great to feel my baby moving about inside.
Gǎnjué zìjǐ de xiǎobǎobao zài dùzi lǐ dòngláidòngqù，zhēnshì tài bàng le。
感觉自己的小宝宝在肚子里动来动去，真是太棒了。
His stomach bulged after the huge meal.
Dàcān zhīhòu tā de dùzi gǔle qǐlái。
大餐之后他的肚子鼓了起来。
He punched me in the stomach.
Tā jīzhòng wǒ de dùzi。
他击中我的肚子。
He purged continuously.
Tā bùtíng de lādùzǐ。
他不停地拉肚子。
The dead man\'s stomach was bloated.
Shītǐ de dùzi zhǎng qǐlái。
尸体的肚子涨起来。
The children are tickled to death with the jokes.
Zhèxiē xiàohua ràng háizǐmen xiào pòle dùpí。
这些笑话让孩子们笑破了肚皮。

她既是杰出的专业肚皮舞演员，也是舞蹈指导和老师。
明儿中午，我请您吃爆肚儿！
Míngr zhōng wǔ，wǒ qǐng nín chī bàodùr！
I\'ll treat you to Baodu (boiled slices of cow or sheep\'s stomach) tomorrow afternoon.

街口有一家专卖小肚儿的小卖店。
Jiēkǒu yǒu yìjiā zhuānmài xiǎodùr de xiǎomàidiàn。
There is a delicatessen selling items made of pigs\' bladder stuffed with pork and corn starch around the corner of the street.
她说自己最讨厌吃猪肚儿了。
Tā shuō zìjǐ zuì tǎoyàn chī zhūdùr le。
She said that she hated to eat pork tripe most.
拌肚丝儿
bàndǔsīr
slices of pork tripe and cucumber in soy sauce
几杯酒下肚，不一会儿酒力发作，浑身焦热。
Jī bēi jiǔ xià dù，bùyíhuìr jiǔlì fāzuò，húnshēn jiāorè。
After drinking several cups of wine, he began to feel its effect and became uncomfortably hot all over.
他肚子里还有点儿墨水。
Tā dùzi lǐ hái yǒudiǎnr mòshuǐ。
He\'s something of a scholar.
别看这人不起眼儿，人家可是一肚子学问。

He is not taken much notice of, but he is a very learned man.
一大碗面，他一会儿功夫就都入肚了。
Yí dà wǎn miàn，tā yíhuìr gōngfu jiù dōu rù dù le。
He consumed a big bowlful of noodles in no time.
这只母鸡肚子里面已经有鸡子儿了，杀了可惜。

Hǎo chángshíjiān shōu bú dào tā de xìn，jiào rén qiānchángguàdù de。
I haven\'t heard from him for ages, so I\'m getting extremely anxious.
一大碗面，他一会儿功夫就都入肚了。
Yí dà wǎn miàn，tā yíhuìr gōngfu jiù dōu rù dù le。
He consumed a big bowlful of noodles in no time.
三杯酒入肚，他来了精神，话也多了。
Sān bēi jiǔ rù dù，tā lái le jīngshén，huà yě duō le。
After downing three glasses, he became lively and talkative.
搜肠刮肚地想办法
sōuchángguādù de xiǎng bànfǎ
rack one\'s brains for a way out
走了一天路，我的腿肚子酸溜溜的。
Zǒu le yìtiān lù，wǒ de tuǐdùzi suānliūliū de。
My legs ached after I\'d been walking all day.
他贪吃，这回把肚子吃坏了。
Tā tān chī，zhè huí bǎ dùzi chīhuài le。
He\'s a glutton; he ate himself sick this time.
肚子痛
dùzi tòng
have a stomachache
窝了一肚子火
wō le yí dùzi huǒ 
be filled with pent-up anger; be simmering with rage; be forced to bottle up one\'s anger
窝了一肚子气
wō le yídùzi qì 
have pent-up grievances
东方刚刚显出鱼肚白。
Dōngfānggānggāngxiǎnchū yúdùbái。
Day was just breaking.
一肚子委屈
yí dùzi wěiqū
be full of grievances
一肚子冤气
yí dùzi yuānqì 
beresentful
挺着圆鼓鼓的肚子
tǐng zhe yuángǔgǔ de dùzi
with a rounded, bulging belly
一肚子怨气
yí dùzi yuànqì
be full of complaints (or grievances)
我吃多了，肚子有点胀。
Wǒ chīduō le，dùzi yǒudiǎn zhàng。
I\'ve overeaten and feel bloated.
腿肚子
tuǐdùzi
calf (of the leg)
我实在是吃不下了，肚子已经很饱胀了。
Wǒ shízai shì chī búxià le，dùzi yǐjing hěnbǎozhàng le。
I\'m full, I can\'t eat any more.
明儿中午，我请您吃爆肚儿！
Míngr zhōng wǔ，wǒ qǐng nín chī bàodùr！
I\'ll treat you to Baodu (boiled slices of cow or sheep\'s stomach) tomorrow afternoon.
我肚子里不停的串气，真是不舒服。
Wǒ dùzi lǐ bùtíng de chuànqì，zhēnshì bùshūfu。
I felt quite uncomfortable because of the gas moving in my stomach.
一顿饭能吃这么多，你简直是个大肚汉。
Yí dùn fàn néng chī zhème duō，nǐ jiǎnzhí shì gè dàdùhàn。
You have eaten so much, it goes right to your pot-belly.
她挺着大肚子乘车，非常不便。
Tā tǐng zhe dàdùzi chéngchē，fēicháng búbiàn。
It is extremely inconvenient for the pregnant woman to take a bus.
知道你是个大肚子，特意为你烧了很多菜。
Zhīdào nǐ shì gè dàdùzi，tèyì wèi nǐ shāo le hěnduō cài。
I have cooked many dishes, because I know you have a great appetite.
这个兜肚上，绣了一朵牡丹。
Zhège dōudu shàng，xiù le yì duǒ mǔdān。
The diamond shaped undergarment is embroidered with a peony.
这个小孩穿着一件丝绸织成的肚兜。
Zhège xiǎohái chuān zhe yì jiàn sīchóu zhī chéng de dùdōu。
The child is wearing a belly-slip made of silk.
穿上一个肚兜，以免弄脏衣服。
Chuānshàng yígè dùdōu，yǐmiǎn nòngzāng yīfu。
Put on an apron so you won\'t get dirty.
他的肚量可真大，一顿饭可以吃三个馒头。
Tā de dùliàng kě zhēn dà，yídùnfàn kěyǐ chī sāngè mántóu。
He has an enormous appetite, he can eat three steamed buns at one meal.
把肚量放大一些，别为了这些小事生气。
Bǎ dùliàng fàngdà yìxiē，bié wèile zhèxiē xiǎoshì shēngqì。
Be more tolerant, never get frustrated over such unimportant matters.
他又蹲坑去了，大概是拉肚子吧。
Tā yòu dūnkēng qù le，dàgài shì lādùzi ba。
He\'s going to the toilet again. It seems that he\'s suffering from diarrhea.
今天吃多了，看我这鼓胀的肚子。
Jīntiān chī duō le，kàn wǒ zhè gǔzhàng de dùzi。
I have eaten so much. Look at my swollen stomach.
他满肚子坏点子，是个害人精。
Tā mǎndùzi huài diǎnzi，shì gè hàirénjīng。
He has a bellyful of evil ideas, and is a scoundrel.
此种药的主要成分是黄连素，治疗拉肚子很有效。
Cǐ zhǒng yào de zhǔyào chéngfèn shì huángliánsù，zhìliáo lādùzi hěnyǒuxiào。
The basis of this medicine is berberine which is very effective in curing loose bowels.
这只母鸡肚子里面已经有鸡子儿了，杀了可惜。
Zhèzhī mǔjī dùzi lǐmian yǐjing yǒu jīzir le，shā le kěxī。
This hen has already got some eggs in her stomach, so it would be a pity to kill her.
因为吃的太多，肚子里面有积食，要空空胃了。
Yīnwéi chī de tài duō，dùzi lǐmian yǒu jīshí，yào kōngkōng wèi le。
Food is not digested and has accumulated in my stomach because of over-eating. I should stop eating to empty my stomach.
那个有将军肚的男人就是我们的经理。
Nàge yǒu jiāngjūndù de nánrén jiùshì wǒmen de jīnglǐ。
The man with the pot-belly is our manager.
我肚子痛，想解大手，可是不知道厕所在哪。
Wǒ dùzi tòng，xiǎng jiě dàshǒu，kěshì bùzhīdào cèsuǒ zài nǎ。
I am having a stomachache and want to go to the toilet, but I don\'t know where it is.
我这一肚子的苦情不知道找谁去说呀！
Wǒ zhè yídùzi de kǔqíng bùzhīdào zhǎo shéi qù shuō ya！
Who can I tell about my misery?
为了让全家大小都能暖肚，他只能不断地挣钱。
Wèile ràng quánjiā dàxiǎo dōu néng nuǎndù，tā zhǐnéng búduàn de zhèngqián。
To fill all the family members\' bellies, he has to make money ceaselessly.
北方的冬天，吃饭时人们都要喝些暖肚汤。
Běifāng de dōngtiān，chīfàn shí rénmen dōuyào hē xiē nuǎndùtāng。
In the winter, people in the north have some warming soup every dinner.
她身上那条绣花暖肚，是她自己制作的呢。
Tā shēnshàng nà tiáo xiùhuā nuǎndù，shì tā zìjǐ zhìzuò de ne。
The embroidered warming girdle she is wearing was made by herself.
宝宝肚子里有虫了，医生建议让他吃些哌嗪。
Bǎobao dùzi lǐ yǒuchóng le，yīshēng jiànyì ràng tā chī xiē pàiqín。
The baby has worms. The doctor advised him to take some piperazine.
他一下子吃了三个冰淇淋，结果受凉跑肚了。
Tā yíxiàzi chī le sāngè bīngqílín，jiéguǒ shòuliáng pǎodù le。
He ate three ice creams all at once. and ended up with a cold and diarrhea.
他吃得太饱了，肚子膨脝得难受。
Tā chī de tài bǎo le，dùzi pénghēng de nánshòu。
He ate too much,  his stomach was uncomfortably distended.
他宁愿饿着肚子也不出来要饭，真是个穷棒子。
Tā nìngyuàn è zhe dùzi yě bùchūlái yàofàn，zhēnshì gè qióngbàngzi。
He prefers to be hungry rather than beg for food, he is really a poor person with high aspirations.
我吃了3个山药蛋，肚子有些撑得难受。
Wǒ chī le sāngè shānyaodàn，dǔzi yǒuxiē chēng de nánshòu。
Having eaten three potatoes, I feel stuffed.
从小练琴使他的手指头肚儿上磨出了许多茧子。
Cóng xiǎo liànqín shǐ tā de shǒuzhǐtoudùr shàng móchū le xǔduō jiǎnzi。
Many calluses appear on the front part of his fingers due to exercises on the piano from childhood.
东方已经现出鱼肚白了，现在估计有六点了吧！
Dōngfāng yǐjing xiànchū yúdùbái le，xiànzài gūjì yǒu liù diǎn le ba！
The first whitish rays have appeared above the horizon, it may be six o\'clock now.
这家工厂加工的香肚在市场上有很好的销路。
Zhèjiā gōngchǎng jiā gōng de xiāngdù zài shìchǎng shàng yǒu hěnhǎo de xiāolù。
The pork sausage produced by this factory is well received in the market.
街口有一家专卖小肚儿的小卖店。
Jiēkǒu yǒu yìjiā zhuānmài xiǎodùr de xiǎomàidiàn。
There is a delicatessen selling items made of pigs\' bladder stuffed with pork and corn starch around the corner of the street.
你现在可别去惹他，他正一肚子邪火没地方发呢。
Nǐ xiànzài kě biéqù rě tā，tā zhèng yídǔzi xiéhuǒ méi dìfāng fā ne。
Don\'t provoke him now, he is angry now.
天刚泛出鱼肚白，农民就起身下地劳动了。
Tiān gāng fànchū yúdùbái，nóngmín jiù qǐshēn xiàdì láodòng le。
When the sky was just turning light, the farmers would get up and work in the farmland.
由于消化不良，宝宝有点胀肚。
Yóuyú xiāohuà bùliáng，bǎobao yǒudiǎn zhàngdù。
Due to indigestion, the baby is a little bloated.
她说自己最讨厌吃猪肚儿了。
Tā shuō zìjǐ zuì tǎoyàn chī zhūdùr le。
She said that she hated to eat pork tripe most.

他又蹲坑去了，大概是拉肚子吧。

He\'s going to the toilet again. It seems that he\'s suffering from diarrhea.
把肚量放大一些，别为了这些小事生气。

他的肚量可真大，一顿饭可以吃三个馒头。

我肚子痛，想解大手，可是不知道厕所在哪。

人们情绪不好时往往有些反常。
a novel shot through with pathos
充满伤感情绪的小说
a taut smile
带紧张情绪的一丝微笑
In proper trim
准备就绪；井然有条
The weather has a strong effect on our mood.
天气会对我们的情绪有很大影响。
There is no denying what I have done, but the fact that I was blinded with rage must be taken into account.
我不否认我所做的一切，但也应当考虑到我当时情绪失控这一情况。
It\'s very hard to make him content because he is always in a bad mood.
他情绪总是很坏，想让他满意非常不容易。
Don\'t talk to her she\'s in one of her black moods today.
她今天情绪不好，别跟她说话了。
what\'s the matter James? You\'ve been a bit blue all the day long! (SAD)
怎么了，詹姆士，你今天情绪不高啊！
He will not become involved and get carried away by the emotion, which is what usually happens.
他这次不会参与其中，也就不会像往常那样受情绪的摆布。
When I told her what happened she felt down.
我把发生的事告诉了她，这让她的情绪很是低落。
there is a feeling/rumour abroad that...
一种情绪/谣言在到处流传…
to have a complex about sth
对某事有强烈的情绪反应
emotionally disturbed
情绪失常的
everything is ready
所有都准备就绪
a general feeling of optimism
普遍的乐观情绪
to be in high spirits
情绪很高
to be in good/bad humour
情绪好/不好
I was really low after my father died.
我父亲去世以后，我的情绪非常低落。
to fall into place
开始有头绪
to get sb/sth ready
使某人/某物准备就绪
tempers were running high
情绪变得激动起来
to snap out of it
摆脱沮丧的情绪
to steady one\'s nerves
稳定自己的情绪
to be in a good/bad temper
情绪好/坏
her mind {or} head is in a whirl
她的思绪一片纷乱
This patient feels unable to control her emotions and powerless to diffuse the conflict.
这个病人觉得不能控制自己的感情，并且无法缓和情绪波动。
This article about the rise in the incidents of road rage attracted considerable public concern.
这篇关于交通暴躁情绪的文章引起了公众的广泛关注。
The war-weariness is beginning to set in among the people and troops.
人民和士兵的厌战情绪已开始产生。

他的这种情绪化的批评方式与他女性化的性格密切相关。
A man in confusion cannot focus on the required work.
思绪混乱的人不可能集中精力做他的工作。
A draft of fresh air makes my mind get clear.
吸一口新鲜空气能让我的思绪清晰。

她火爆的发言激起了他们压抑的情绪。
Opposition to the decision has been mounting the past few weeks.
对该决定的反对情绪在过去几周不断上升。
His bad mood will prejudice his chances at passing the exam.
他的不良情绪会影响他通过考试的机会。

色彩既是传达信息的手段,又是情绪的语言。
You don\'t lead my kind of life if you can\'t damp down emotions.
Rúguǒ nǐ wúfǎ pínghuǎn qíngxù de huà，nǐ shì bùnéng xiàng wǒ zhèyàng shēnghuó de。
如果你无法平缓情绪的话，你是不能像我这样生活的。
He had been in a depression for a long time.
Tā yǐjīng qíngxù dīluò hěn cháng shíjiān le。
他已经情绪低落很长时间了。

Her voice was so choked with emotion he could hardly understand her.
Tā de shēngyīn yīnwèi qíngxù ér gěngyè，tā jīhū tīngbùdǒng tā zài shuō shénme。
她的声音因为情绪而哽咽，他几乎听不懂她在说什么。

Dāng tā qíngxù lěngjìng xiàlái yǐhòu，tā zǒngshì huì huílái de。

心绪不宁
All at once guilt fluttered and began to beat in her mind like dark wings.
Tūránjiān，nèijiùgǎn ràng tā xīnxùbúnìng，xiàng hēisè de shuāngyì，qiángxíng zhànjùle tā de sīxiǎng。

心绪缭乱
xīnxù liáoluàn 
in a confused state of mind
心绪烦乱
xīnxù fánluàn
emotionally upset; in an emotional turmoil
心绪
xīnxù
state of mind

Cixi is Emperor Guangxu’s mother. She holds the real power of the country.

Wǒmen tán le bàn tiān，réngrán háo wú duānxù。
We talked the matter over for quite some time but didn\'t get anywhere.

a tune of welcome

名词一般只能用作句子的主语或宾语。
Míngcí yìbān zhǐnéng yòngzuò jùzi de zhǔyǔ huò bīnyǔ。
Nouns are usually used as the subject or object of a sentence.
这个句子动词和宾语不搭配，是个病句。
Removing the object will intransitivize the verbs.
Qùdiào bīnyǔ huì shǐ dòngcí biànwéi bù jíwù dòngcí。
去掉宾语会使动词变为不及物动词。
Most transitive verbs govern the accusative case in German.
Zài Déyǔ zhōng，xǔduō jíwù dòngcí zuǒyòuzhe bīngé。
在德语中，许多及物动词左右着宾格。
You can use the verb &quot;drink&quot; intransitively, without a direct object.

动词“drink”可用作不及物动词，用时不接直接宾语。

Dòngcí“drink”kě yòngzuò bùjí wù dòngcí，yòng shí bù jiē zhíjiē bīnyǔ。
动词“drink”可用作不及物动词，用时不接直接宾语。

去掉宾语会使动词变为不及物动词。

Tā de rèqíng huānyíng shǐ wǒmen gǎndào bīnzhìrúguī。
他的热情欢迎使我们感到宾至如归。
He was manifestly too important to leave off the guest list.
Tā xiǎnrán fēicháng zhòngyào，juébùnéng zài láibīn míngdān shàng lòudiào。
他显然非常重要，绝不能在来宾名单上漏掉。
这只老鼠被猫戏弄了半天，终于一命於戏了。
Zhèzhī lǎoshǔ bèi māo xìnòng le bàntiān，zhōng yú yímìng yúxì le。
The cat played with the rat for a long time, before the rat finally died.
寻找了好久，我终于在荒山上看到了於菟。
Xúnzhǎo le hǎo jiǔ，wǒ zhōng yú zài huāngshān shàng kàndào le yútú。
Having searched for a long time, I finally spotted a tiger in the mountain.
He was too well-bred to show his disappointment.
他很有涵养, 遇到失望的事亦不形於色.
漫画家把讽刺的矛头指向官僚主义。
Mànhuàjiā bǎ fěngcì de máotóu zhǐ xiàng guānliáozhǔyì。
The cartoonist directed his satire at the bureaucracy.
会上，大家把批评的矛头都指向了老赵。
Huì shàng，dàjiā bǎ pīpíng de máotóu dōu zhǐxiàngle lǎozhào.
At the meeting, Lao Zhao was the target of everybody\'s criticism.
把打击的矛头指向腐败现象。
She felt her bones weaken in fear，though now his anger was not directed against her.
Jǐnguǎn mùqián tā bìng méiyǒu bǎ fènnù de máotóu zhǐxiàng tā，dàn tā què juéde zìjǐ de gǔtou dōu xiàde ruǎnpāpā le。
尽管目前他并没有把愤怒的矛头指向她，但她却觉得自己的骨头都吓得软趴趴了。
矛头所向
máotóu suǒ xiànɡ 
the target of attack
漫画家把讽刺的矛头指向官僚主义。
Mànhuàjiā bǎ fěngcì de máotóu zhǐ xiàng guānliáozhǔyì。
The cartoonist directed his satire at the bureaucracy.
会上，大家把批评的矛头都指向了老赵。
Huì shàng，dàjiā bǎ pīpíng de máotóu dōu zhǐxiàngle lǎozhào.
At the meeting, Lao Zhao was the target of everybody\'s criticism.
矛头。
把打击的矛头指向腐败现象。
She felt her bones weaken in fear，though now his anger was not directed against her.
Jǐnguǎn mùqián tā bìng méiyǒu bǎ fènnù de máotóu zhǐxiàng tā，dàn tā què juéde zìjǐ de gǔtou dōu xiàde ruǎnpāpā le。
尽管目前他并没有把愤怒的矛头指向她，但她却觉得自己的骨头都吓得软趴趴了。
Clinton directed his fire at the republican party.
Kèlíndùn bǎ gōngjī máotóu duìzhǔn gònghédǎng。
克林顿把攻击矛头对准共和党。
The conflicting thoughts gnawed at his mind.
Máodùn de xiǎngfǎ zhémózhe tā de tóunǎo。
矛盾的想法折磨着他的头脑。
矛盾的普遍性即寓于矛盾的特殊性之中。
Máodùn de pǔbiànxìngjí yùyú máodùn de tèshūxìngzhī zhōng。
It is precisely in the particularity of contradiction that the universality of contradiction resides.
摆矛盾
bǎi máodùn 
lay bare the contradictions
矛盾表面化了。
Máodùn biǎomiànhuà le。
The contradiction has become apparent.
次要矛盾
cìyào máodùn 
secondary contradiction
矛盾存在于一切事物发展的过程中。
Máodùn cúnzài yú yíqiè shìwù fāzhǎn de guòchéng zhōng。
Contradiction is present in the process of development of all things.
矛盾着的对立面
máodùn zhe de duìlìmiàn
the opposites in a contradiction
非对抗性矛盾
fēiduìkàngxìng máodùn
nonantagonistic contradiction
每一个矛盾的两个方面共处于一个统一体中。
Měi yígè máodùn de liǎnggè fāngmiàn gòng chǔyú yígè tǒngyìtǐ zhōng。
The two aspects of every contradiction coexist in a single entity.
事物发展的每一过程都贯串着矛盾。
Shìwù fāzhǎn de měi yí guòchéngdōu guànchuàn zhe máodùn。
Each phase of the development of any phenomenon is permeated with contradictions.
化解矛盾
huàjiě máodùn
ease contradictions
缓和矛盾
huǎnhé máodùn 
mitigate (or alleviate) a contradiction
混淆两类不同性质的矛盾
hùnxiáo liǎnglèi bùtóngxìngzhì de máodùn 
mix up the two different types of contradictions
两国之间的矛盾进一步激化。
Liǎngguó zhījiān de máodùn jìnyíbùjīhuà。
The contradictions between the two countries are intensifying.
矛盾正在加剧。
Máodùn zhèngzài jiājù。
The contradictions are sharpening.
揭矛盾，找差距
Jiē máodùn，zhǎo chājù。
expose contradictions and find out where one is lagging behind
集中精力解决主要矛盾
jí zhōng jīnglì jiějué zhǔyào máodùn
concentrate one\'s effort on solving the main contradiction
联防巡逻队的建立，大大缓解了警力不足的矛盾。
Liánfángxúnluóduì de jiànlì，dàdà huǎnjiě le jǐnglì bùzú de máodùn。
Setting up the joint patrol has greatly eased the strain on police strength.
矛盾要分主次，不能一律看待。
Máodùn yào fēn zhǔcì，bùnéng yílǜ kàndài。
We should distinguish between major and minor contradictions and not treat them all alike.
他的话前后矛盾，漏洞百出。
Tā de huà qián hòu máodùn，lòudòngbǎichū。
His argument is full of holes.
矛盾的普遍性(特殊性)
máodùn de pǔbiànxìng（tèshūxìng）
the universality (particularity) of contradiction
矛盾的同一性(斗争性)
máodùn de tóngyīxìng（dòuzhēngxìng）
the identity (struggle) of opposites
主要(非主要)矛盾
zhǔyào（fēizhǔyào）máodùn
principal (nonprincipal) contradiction
双方发生矛盾已有多年。
Shuāngfāngfāshēngmáodùn yǐ yǒu duō nián。
The two sides have been in conflict for years.
他俩在闹矛盾。
Tā liǎ zài nào máodùn。
The two of them have fallen out.
矛盾百出
máodùn bǎichū 
full of contradictions
他说的话前后矛盾。
Tā shuō de huà qiánhòu máodùn。
He was contradicting himself in what he said.
这两种意见并不矛盾。
Zhè liǎngzhǒng yìjiàn bìngbùmáodùn。
These two views are not contradictory (or mutually exclusive).
他的心情很矛盾。
Tā de xīnqínghěn máodùn。
His feelings were mixed.
矛头所向
máotóu suǒ xiànɡ 
the target of attack
漫画家把讽刺的矛头指向官僚主义。
Mànhuàjiā bǎ fěngcì de máotóu zhǐ xiàng guānliáozhǔyì。
The cartoonist directed his satire at the bureaucracy.
闹矛盾
nào máodùn
be at loggerheads
他内心很矛盾。
Tā nèixīn hěn máodùn。
He is torn by conflicting thoughts.
矛盾的胚芽
máodùn de pēiyá
a contradiction in the bud
这样解释岂非自相矛盾？
Zhèyàngjiěshì qǐ fēi zìxiāngmáodùn?
Wouldn\'t it be self-contradictory to put it that way?
矛盾的一方各以其另一方为自己存在的前提。
Máodùn de yì fānggè yǐ qí lìngyì fāngwéi zìjǐ cúnzài de qiántí。
Each aspect of a contradiction presupposes the existence of the other aspect.
矛盾日益尖锐。
Máodùn rìyì jiānruì。
The contradictions are becoming increasingly acute.
矛盾的深化
máodùn de shēnhuà
intensification of a contradiction
抓住了这个主要矛盾，一切问题就迎刃而解了。
Zhuāzhù le zhège zhǔyào máodùn，yíqiè wèntí jiù yíngrènérjiě le。
Once this principal contradiction is grasped, all problems can be readily solved.
运能和运量的矛盾
yùnnénghé yùnliàng de máodùn
gap between transport capacity and the freight volume
主要矛盾
zhǔyào máodùn 
principal contradiction
他的话自相矛盾。
Tā de huà zìxiāngmáodùn。
What he says is self-contradictory.
你这不是自相矛盾吗？
Nǐ zhè búshì zìxiāngmáodùn ma? 
Aren\'t you contradicting yourself?
以子之矛，攻子之盾
yǐzǐzhīmáo，gōngzǐzhīdùn
set a person\'s own spear against his own shield —refute sb. with his own argument
他们之间矛盾很深，最后几乎恩断义绝。
Tāmen zhījiān máodùn hěn shēn，zuìhòu jīhū ēnduànyìjué。
They hate each other so much that all love and kind feelings are lost between them.
这两位将军，一个手持钢鞭，一个举着长矛。
Zhè liǎng wèi jiāngjūn，yígè shǒuchí gāngbiān，yígè jǔ zhe chángmáo。
One general is holding a iron staff, the other is holding up a long spear.
她嚎叫着把上门解决矛盾的民警赶了出去。
Tā háojiào zhe bǎ shàngmén jiějué máodùn de mínjǐng gǎn le chūqù。
She howled, and drove the police away when they came to solve the conflict.
人与人之间免不了会产生矛盾，这时我们应该学会互谅。
Rén yǔ rén zhījiān miǎnbùliǎo huì chǎnshēng máodùn，zhèshí wǒmen yīnggāi xuéhuì hùliàng。
Conflict between people is unavoidable. When it happens we should learn to understand each other.
一发生矛盾你就不问原因不论是非地向着自己的老乡，这不是拉偏手吗？！
Yì fāshēng máodùn nǐ jiù búwèn yuányīn búlùn shìfēi de xiàng zhe zìjǐ de lǎoxiāng，zhè búshì lāpiānshǒu ma？！
Whenever conflict happens, you are partial to your fellow villagers, regardless of reason or right and wrong.
这个老婆子可讨厌了，总是传闲话，勾惹矛盾。
Zhège lǎopózi kě tǎoyàn le，zǒngshì chuán xiánhuà，gōurě máodùn。
The old biddy is nasty. She always gossips and arouses conflict.
你们两个之间的矛盾也应该了账了吧！
Nǐmen liǎnggè zhījiān de máodùn yě yīnggāi liǎozhàng le ba！
The conflict between you two should be over now.
为这么点儿小矛盾就拿刀动仗的，太不应该了！
Wéi zhème diǎnr xiǎo máodùn jiù nádāo dòngzhàng de，tài bùyīnggāi le！
It was very inappropriate to fight over such a trivial conflict.
朋友之间吵架属于内部矛盾，你又何必较真呢？
Péngyou zhījiān chǎojià shǔyú nèibùmáodùn，nǐ yòu hébì jiàozhēn ne？
Quarreling between friends is just an internal contradiction, why do you take it so seriously?
孩子之间闹矛盾时，她这当妈的总是偏私自己的儿子。
Háizi zhījiān nào máodùn shí，tā zhè dāng mā de zǒngshì piānsī zìjǐ de érzi。
When her son has a dispute with others, she always takes sides with him.
我们不想用“以战迫和”的方式来解决政治矛盾。
Wǒmen bùxiǎng yòng“yǐzhànpòhé”de fāngshì lái jiějué zhèngzhì máodùn。
We don’t want to handle political contradictions by means of forcing compromise through fighting.
他们的夙怨很深，矛盾不是一天两天了。
Tāmen de sùyuàn hěnshēn，máodùn búshì yìtiān liǎngtiān le。
They bear a deep grudge against each other, which has been going on for quite a long time.
不管有什么矛盾也不能诉诸武力啊！
Bùguǎn yǒu shénme máodùn yě bùnéng sùzhū wǔlì a！
It\'s wrong to resort to force, no matter what contradiction you have.
任何事物都是矛盾的统一体。
Rènhé shìwù dōushì máodùn de tǒngyītǐ。
Everything is a unified system of contradictions.
要抓主要矛盾，不要只盯着那些细故末节的东西。
Yào zhuā zhǔyào máodùn，búyào zhǐ dīng zhe nàxiē xìgù mòjié de dōngxi。
You must target the principal contradiction, rather than the trivial matters.
夫妻俩之间就算有什么矛盾也不能拳脚相加。

No matter what happens, couples should not fight.
他肯定是在说谎，前后说的话自相矛盾。
Tā kěndìng shì zài shuōhuǎng，qiánhòu shuō de huà zìxiāng máodùn。
He must be lying, because what he said is self-contradictory.

Some regions have been long affected by sectarianism and troubled by complicated internal conflicts and the flames of war.

Jiějué rénmín nèibù de jīběn máodùn，bùxūyào yǒu rènhé de wàilái gānyù。
We don\'t need any foreign interference to solve our basic contradictions among the masses.
中国的“五行”，揭示了事物的内部矛盾。
Zhōngguó de“wǔxíng”，jiēshì le shìwù de nèibùmáodùn。
The five elements; metal, wood, water, fire and earth bring the internal contradictions of things to light.
遇到矛盾我们要多做自我批评。
Yùdào máodùn wǒmen yào duō zuò zìwǒ pīpíng。
When coming across contradictions, we should resort to self-criticism more often.
谣言加剧了他们之间的矛盾。
Yáoyán jiājùle tāmen zhījiān de máodùn.
The allegation made the tension between them worse.

chángmáo de jiānduān

In practice, relationships are frequently characterized by tensions and conflicts.

She was overcome with conflict over her seemingly immoral thoughts.

她为她看上去不道德的想法感到非常矛盾。

常常会有意见相互矛盾。
The main conflict is developed in the book from the very beginning.

本书中的主要矛盾从最开始就有了。

Zhè qiàqià shì wǒ xiǎngshuō de huà。
That\'s exactly what I wanted to say.
把事情搞糟的不是别人，恰恰就是你自己。
Bǎ shìqing gǎozāo de búshì biérén，qiàqià jiùshì nǐ zìjǐ。
It was you, rather than anybody else, who made a mess of things.
事实恰恰相反。
Shìshí qiàqià xiāngfǎn。
The facts are just the opposite. or The opposite is the case.
这恰恰是我们不想看到的。
Zhè qiàqià shì wǒmen bùxiǎng kàndào de.
This is exactly what we didn\'t want to see.
我不明白的，恰恰是这个
我正想找人问路，恰恰就遇上了你。
He is so joyful, the direct opposite of his twin brother.
他是那样的快乐，他的孪生哥哥则恰恰相反。
A good tiding will not be attractive on this occasion, while a bad one just contrary.
这种场合中好消息不会引人注意，但坏消息则恰恰相反。
Some older people think pains and problems are just a sign of old age.
Yǒuxiē shàng niánjì de rén rènwéi，tòngkǔ hé wèntí qiàqiàshì niánlǎo de yì zhǒng biāozhì。
有些上年纪的人认为，痛苦和问题恰恰是年老的一种标志。
They were happening right inside my own room.
Tāmen qiàqià fāshēngzài wǒ de fángjiān lǐ。
它们恰恰发生在我的房间里。
The real is the opposite of the imagined.
Shìshí yǔ xiǎngxiàng qiàqià xiāngfǎn。
事实与想象恰恰相反。
Pollution simply does not figure on the list of governmental priorities.
Wūrǎn qiàqià méiyǒu lièrù zhèngfǔ yōuxiān chǔlǐ de shìyí zhōng。
污染恰恰没有列入政府优先处理的事宜中。
The medicine\'s effect was opposite to that intended.
Yàoxiào yǔ yùqī qiàqià xiāngfǎn。
药效与预期恰恰相反。
He expected the very opposite.
Tā qīwàng de qiàqià shì xiāngfǎn de dōngxi。
他期望的恰恰是相反的东西。
This is exactly what the composer had set down on paper.
Zhè qiàqià shì nà wèi zuòqǔjiā suǒ xiě de qǔzi。
这恰恰是那位作曲家所写的曲子。
Her approach was the opposite of a passive front-porch campaign.
Tā de jìngxuǎn fāngfǎ qiàqià yǔ bèidòng de“qiánláng”shì jìngxuǎn huódòng xiāngfǎn。
她的竞选方法恰恰与被动的“前廊”式竞选活动相反。
您穿的尺码的鞋我们恰好有。
Nín chuān de chǐmǎ de xié wǒmen qiàhǎo yǒu。
We have just the size of shoes you wear.
我们赶到电影院，售票处恰好还有两张票。
Wǒmen gǎndào diànyǐngyuàn，shòupiàochù qiàhǎo háiyǒu liǎngzhāngpiào。
We got to the cinema just in time to buy the last two tickets left at the box office.
结果与我们的愿望恰好相反。
Jiéguǒ yǔ wǒmen de yuànwàngqiàhǎo xiāngfǎn。
The result turned out contrary to our expectations.
恰好整一年。
Qiàhǎo zhěngyì nián。
It\'s a year to the day.
他恰好也在。
Tā qiàhǎo yě zài.
Luckily he\'s here as well.
删节号用在这篇文章的末尾，恰到好处。
Shānjiéhào yòng zài zhèpiān wénzhāng de mòwěi，qiàdàohǎochu。
It is just fine to put the ellipsis at the end of the article.
每枚竹钉大约要削上十几刀，刀刀要恰到好处，也不是件容易的事情。
Měi méi zhúdìng dàyuē yào xuē shàng shíjǐ dāo，dāodāo yào qiàdào hǎochǔ，yě búshì jiàn róngyì de shìqing。
Every bamboo nail has been cut more than ten times. It is difficult to make every cut right.
不多不少，恰好一人一个。
可谓恰到好处。
不瘟不火，恰到好处。
Our interests coincide.
我们的利益恰好一致。
to run a race in ten seconds flat
恰好跑10秒
the very image of laziness
懒惰的恰好典型
This problem is precisely a chicken and egg situation.
这恰好是个鸡生蛋，蛋生鸡的问题。
I didn\'t know the answer. It was just a lucky guess.
我不知道答案，只是恰好猜中了。
Jones arrived in Beijing on the precise day that I left for a business trip.
琼斯到北京的那天恰好是我出差离开北京的日子。
The needle had broken the skin just above the knuckle.
Zhēn qiàhǎo cìpòle zhǐ guānjié de shàngfāng pífū。
针恰好刺破了指关节的上方皮肤。
I saw your picture in the paper just last week.
Qiàhǎo shàngzhōu wǒ zài bàozhǐ shàng kànjiànle nǐ de zhàopiàn。
恰好上周我在报纸上看见了你的照片。
The wall was plum square.
Zhè miàn qiáng qiàhǎo shì zhèngfāngxíng。
这面墙恰好是正方形。
The car came to a dead stop in the nick of time.
Qiàhǎo，zhè liàng chē tūrán tíngzhù le。
恰好，这辆车突然停住了。
She can hit it on the nose!
Tā kěyǐ qiàhǎo cāizhòng。
她可以恰好猜中。
I happen to have just what you need!
Wǒ qiàhǎo yǒu nǐ suǒ xūyào de dōngxi。
我恰好有你所需要的东西。
He was doing precisely (or exactly) what she had told him to do.
Tā zhèngzài zuò de qiàhǎo shì tā céngjīng gàosu tā yào zuò de。
他正在做的恰好是她曾经告诉他要做的。
She was saved in the nick of time.
Tā qiàhǎo huòjiù le。
她恰好获救了。
He had a bye in the first round.
Tā zài dì-yī lún bǐsài zhōng yīn qiàhǎo méiyǒu duìshǒu ér zhíjiē jìnshēng dàole xià yì lún bǐsài。
他在第一轮比赛中因恰好没有对手而直接晋升到了下一轮比赛。
to perfection
[+done，cooked] 恰到好处
This wine has aged perfectly.

这种葡萄酒储藏的年数恰到好处。
The horse\'s neck was well muscled, moderately long, slightly arched and without loose skin.
Nà pǐ mǎ de jǐngbù jīròu qiàdào hǎochù，bǐjiào cháng bìng shāowēi chéng húxíng，bìngqiě méiyǒu sōngchí de pífū。

Zhège yǎnyuán bǎi de zīshì qiàdàohǎochù。

它被演绎得恰到好处而美妙。

恰当
qiàdàng
proper; suitable; fitting; appropriate
恰当地称引名篇会使你的文章增色不少。
Qià dāngdì chēngyǐn míngpiān huì shǐ nǐ de wénzhāng zēngsè bùshǎo。
Using appropriate quotations from classics will add lustre to your essay.
他的行文措词恰当，有理有据。
Tā de xíngwén cuòcí qiàdāng，yǒulǐ yǒujù。
His article is written with appropriate wording and adequate reasoning and proofs.
你文章中的有些仂语使用得很不恰当。
Nǐ wénzhāng zhōng de yǒuxiē lèyǔ shǐyòng de hěnbú qiàdàng。
In your essay, there were some quite inappropriate phrases.
恰当
遣词恰当。
引用一句恰当的名言，给文章添色不少。
用了一个不恰当的字眼儿。
恰当地剪切电影镜头是为了增强艺术效果。
采取恰当的方式
用词恰当。
我的回答也许不太恰当。
恰当地选择用语。
a happy suggestion
恰当的建议
one might rather say
更恰当地说
a well-turned phrase
恰当的措词
A yellow card system will be used to monitor unsportsmanlike behavior, rough play and improper conduct.
黄牌警告制度是对那些没有运动精神的行为，粗野行为和不恰当行为的一种监督。
it is/seems appropriate to...
…是/似乎是恰当的
it is appropriate that...
…是恰当的
a case in point
恰当的例子
it would be inappropriate to comment
进行评论将是不恰当的
it would be inappropriate for me to interfere
我干涉将是不恰当的
Adequate supervision during children\'s swimming is essential.
孩子游泳时要有恰当的监督，这很重要。
She has no idea at all how to properly deal with such a complicated situation.
她根本不知道怎样恰当处理这么复杂的情况。
I hope that the everything all will be done properly very much.
我非常希望事事都要做得恰当。
Her teases were unappropriate and hurtful.
Tā de wánxiào jì bú qiàdàng，yòu shāng gǎnqíng。
她的玩笑既不恰当，又伤感情。
Therefore a child needs to be boosted up so the adult belt fits properly.

这些档案都用回形针别好，放在恰当的地方。
He wants to concrete the stones in place.
Tā xiǎng yòng hùnníngtǔ bǎ zhèxiē shítou jiāozhù zài qiàdàng de wèizhi。
他想用混凝土把这些石头浇注在恰当的位置。

他们正在商议怎样恰当地安装这个设备。
The secret of a successful outcome depends partly on setting the right reserve price.
Zài yídìng chéngdù shàng，chénggōng de mìjué shì zhìdìng qiàdàng de dǐjià。
在一定程度上，成功的秘诀是制定恰当的底价。
I tried hard to be sensible and do things right, but they never work out.
Wǒ jǐnliàng míngzhì ér qiàdāng de chǔlǐ shìqing，dàn zhè cóngwèi zòuxiào。
我尽量明智而恰当地处理事情，但这从未奏效。
In certain areas of historical linguistic research is it appropriate to use standardization as our main reference point.
Zài lìshí yǔyánxué de yìxiē yánjiū lǐngyù，bǎ biāozhǔnhuà zuòwéi wǒmen de zhǔyào cānkǎo diǎn shì qiàdàng de。
在历时语言学的一些研究领域，把标准化作为我们的主要参考点是恰当的。

The car did not have proper restraints fitted.
Nà liàng chē méiyǒu ānzhuāng qiàdàng de yuēshù xìtǒng。
那辆车没有安装恰当的约束系统。
The good player times his swing so as to hit the ball squarely.
Yōuxiù de qiúyuán huì qiàdàng tiáozhěng qí huīwǔ shǒubì de jiézòu，yǐbiàn nénggòu cóng zhèngmiàn jīqiú。
优秀的球员会恰当调整其挥舞手臂的节奏，以便能够从正面击球。

这些团体的成员不像他们的评论家们那样，能够准确或者恰当得体地表达出自己的观点。

Zhège chénggōng de guǎnggào zhuàngǎorén shì yí gè zhīdào rúhé yòng qiàdàng ér fùyǒu gǎnrǎnlì de yányǔ lái miáoshù xíngxiàng de yǔyán dàshī。
这个成功的广告撰稿人是一个知道如何用恰当而富有感染力的言语来描述形象的语言大师。
Greater inaptness of expression would be hard to imagine.
Nányǐ xiǎngxiàng háiyǒu gèng bú qiàdàng de biǎodá。

He retracted nothing that he had said about the inappropriateness of either a corporeal god or a god who is a person.
Tā méiyǒu shōuhuí tā suǒ shuō de guānyú yǒuxíng de shàngdì huòzhě yóu rén chōngdāng de shàngdì de bú qiàdàng yánlùn。
他没有收回他所说的关于有形的上帝或者由人充当的上帝的不恰当言论。

qià hé shíyí
just appropriate to the occasion

Wǎnxiá qiàrú yì fú túhuà。

恰如其分的评价
qiàrúqífèn de píngjià
an apt appraisal
给予恰如其分的批评
jǐyǔ qiàrúqífèn de pīpíng
give a balanced criticism
对成绩和缺点作恰如其分的估计
duì chéngjì hé quēdiǎn zuò qiàrúqífèn de gūjì
make an appropriate estimate of the achievements and shortcomings
我看他二人恰是一对天造地设的夫妻。
Wǒ kàn tā èr rén qià shì yí duì tiānzàodìshè de fūqī。

恰当
qiàdàng
proper; suitable; fitting; appropriate
反方辩手的辩词严密而恰切，给对手以有力的回击。
Fǎnfāng biànshǒu de biàncí yánmì ér qiàqiè，gěi duìshǒu yǐ yǒulì de huíjī。
The debaters from the opposite team attacked his opponent with a forceful, and convincing argument.
恰当地称引名篇会使你的文章增色不少。
Qià dāngdì chēngyǐn míngpiān huì shǐ nǐ de wénzhāng zēngsè bùshǎo。
Using appropriate quotations from classics will add lustre to your essay.
他的行文措词恰当，有理有据。
Tā de xíngwén cuòcí qiàdāng，yǒulǐ yǒujù。
His article is written with appropriate wording and adequate reasoning and proofs.
你文章中的有些仂语使用得很不恰当。
Nǐ wénzhāng zhōng de yǒuxiē lèyǔ shǐyòng de hěnbú qiàdàng。

删节号用在这篇文章的末尾，恰到好处。
Shānjiéhào yòng zài zhèpiān wénzhāng de mòwěi，qiàdàohǎochu。

他恰好也在。
Tā qiàhǎo yě zài.

恰切。
恰如其分
恰逢其时。
晚霞恰似一条彩绸

遣词恰当。
